Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Good evening, honey.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: As much as I miss the hustle and bustle of the city, I do love the valley in the spring.$3#$e#Before we moved here, I'd never tasted such clean air.$1#$b#Let's take a walk around the woods later if you aren't too busy. I love to see everything starting to grow again.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I look forward to the days I do yoga.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, dear.$1#$e#You seem well this morning.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: My, I'm a bit tipsy...$4
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning honey. Care for some coffee?[395]$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'm tired today. Let's get to bed early, @.
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Have you ever encountered any wild animals here in the valley, sweetie?$0#$b#I'm terrified of bears. I hope I never meet one.$2

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Sometimes I look at you and can't believe that we found each other. We've been so lucky.$3#$e#I love you, @.$4
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Rise and shine, sweetie. I cooked breakfast![195]$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: One of the people who I met while I was a trader called today to tip me off on a great investment.$3#$e#It's a little tempting, but I'm fine where I am.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'm feeling lazy today. I'm tempted to just stay inside and read.$6#$e#I do miss our library sometimes. I could pick any shelf and find a fascinating story to disappear into for hours.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Let's invite Victor over for dinner soon.$0#$b#I don't want him to feel like I'm leaving him behind by joining our family with yours. He should feel welcome here, too.$0
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Last night I had a dream about us growing old together.$1#$b#I know it's a little corny, sweetie. But it made me think about painting a portrait of us in our future, happy together.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'd like to introduce you to some of my friends in the city sometime.$0#$e#I'm sure you'd get along well.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, dear. I brewed us coffee. This is a special blend from Suki.[395]$3#$e#These coffee beans are only grown in the Gotoro Empire, where the climate is just right.$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I may attend a wine tasting next week. Would you care to join me, @?$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Shall we dine at the saloon tonight, honey?$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I don't regret giving up trading to come live with you on the farm.$3#$b#I've found so much peace here with you.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Up early, as usual.$6#$e#Take this, dear. This energy tonic will aid you in your adventurers.[349]$0

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: In the city... everything moved so fast. I was always on my way somewhere, never pausing to pay attention to the world around me.$0#$e#It feels nice to slow down and enjoy life with you, @.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good luck with the farm work today, dear.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Have a productive day, honey?$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: *yawn* Good morning.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Sometimes I feel so cooped up at home.$6#$b#I should go into the city more, sweetie. And you should come with me sometime!$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Have you figured out what you'll be planting this season, sweetie? I want to send some of this summer's crops back home to my parents.$0#$e#They don't believe me when I tell them I'm living on a farm!$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'm thinking of putting together a group order for the town from some far-away vineyards. We could get a few cases for fairly cheap.$0#$b#We have a nice little community here, don't we?$0
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'll be cleaning the farmhouse today, sweetie. Try not to track mud in on the floors.$0#$e#I know you're careful.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: The war with the Empire rages on, and the victims just keep piling up.$2#$e#It hurts to think about all of those people suffering...$2#$e#%You hug Olivia.
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I need to go into the city and pick up some painting supplies soon.$0#$e#I special order most of my supplies, but I still like to look around locally to see if anything unique pops up.$0

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Have you ever met the wizard who lives south of town?$0#$e#You're braver than I am. I admire your ability to befriend even the strangest people.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Ah, you're finally up!$1#$b#I brewed us a special blend of coffee. Here![395]$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Can we take a trip to the desert sometime?$3#$e#I'd like to try some fresh cactus fruit.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I have yoga class today, dear. I'll be away until this evening.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Too bad wine can't solve all of my problems. But it can try.$2#$e#Don't worry, I'm kidding. I won't drink too much, even when I'm down.$0
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, sweetie. Care for breakfast?$0#$e#Eat it while it's hot.[201]$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Hello, honey.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: The air on the farm smells so clean.$3#$b#If Victor comes over, we should have a picnic outside. He could use some fresh air.$0

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Should I pour us red or white tonight?$3#$e#Me? I just want whatever you're in the mood for.$6
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: *yawn* Up early, as usual.$6#$e#I have errands to run today, dear. Can I pick you up anything?$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: We should play a board game some evening.$0#$e#Watch out. I'm very competitive, and I love winning.$6
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: My, my. Your outfit is absolutely flawless today.$4#$e#Will you come home early tonight?...$9

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'm using a new sunscreen. It's doing wonders for my complexion.$3#$b#Let me know if you want try it.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, honey. Care for some coffee?$3#$e#Be careful, it's piping hot![395]$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I fetched a bottle of wine from the cellar for you. It's a wonderful vintage.[348]$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I have my aerobics class at Pierre's today. I'll be home in the evening.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Andy made me feel uncomfortable at the saloon tonight. He was staring at me constantly...$2#$e#I heard he's horrible at paying his tab. That's not too surprising.$6
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning.$3#$e#I may indulge myself with a nice glass of wine at the saloon tonight.$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Mayor Lewis is considering funding some dock repairs. The wood is quite old.$0
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I want to paint the leaves changing in Cindersap Forest. That way, we can remember how the autumn looks all year long.$3#$e#It's a great opportunity to learn how to use colors with more nuance. And what a lovely painting it would be, if done well!$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'm glad to see you, dear.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Fall is such a wonderful season for foraging in the valley. Even the most expensive imported mushrooms can't beat what you can find in the wild here.$0#$e#You should pick some mushrooms for our dinner tonight, sweetie.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Jodi's been stressed lately. I'm going to offer to watch Vincent for a day so she can take a break.$0#$e#Let me know if I can ever help you relax a little, @. I know you work hard.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, honey. I made us breakfast.[201]$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: You're working so hard, sweetie! This energy tonic from Doctor Harvey will help you get your energy back.[349]$3#$e#Have a wonderful day, my love!$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: *yawn* I must say I'm quite drowsy this morning.$6#$e#Any big plans today, dear?$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: The beauty of yoga is the enhanced flexibility it gives you, @...$4#$b#Working the fields on your farm will certainly keep your muscles toned too.$9#$e#%Olivia winks at you.
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'm attending my acrobatics class this afternoon.$0#$e#Drop by and say hi if you have the time, honey.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Well, I'm certainly quite tispy after those drinks at the saloon...$4#$e#Pardon me, dear. I must get ready for sleep.$9
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Such a chilly fall day. Want to join me in the saloon later for a little pick-me-up, sweetie?$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: If you ever need help with number crunching for %farm Farm, let me know.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: It's days like these that make me want to just stay in bed.$2#$b#Or shop. Maybe I'll take a trip into the city to cheer myself up.$6

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: You know, I could perhaps give you some private yoga lessons if you're interested.$3#$e#We would start off with the basics.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, dear. Care for coffee?$1#$e#Voila![395]$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I finally managed to order a vintage that's in high demand from a vineyard just north of Grampleton. They gave me an extra bottle!$3#$e#I want you to have it, dear. Everyone should get to enjoy nice things once in a while, especially you.[348]$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Caroline purchased an astonishing pair of shoes. She's showing Jodi and I at the town square this afternoon.$6#$e#Oh, that reminds me. I'm running errands today, dear.$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: My, my. Quite the chilly day.$0#$b#Perhaps we could settle on the couch with a nice cup of hot chocolate?$3#$e#There's a lovely mix from Grampleton in the cupboard.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Would a different wallpaper look better in our living room...? Or maybe a nice shade of paint...$1#$e#%You tell Olivia you don't want the wallpaper changed.#$e#Oh, of course.$3#$b#I'm just speculating.$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Would you like to visit Grampleton soon? The most divine weather you'll ever experience is under the shade of the tall redwood trees.$3#$e#Maybe we can take a trip there together sometime, honey.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Morning, honey.$3
Winter puts a nice blush on your cheeks, @. It's very sweet.$4#$e#What a lovely time of year.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I'm quite sore from yoga today...$2
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Stay warm today, sweetie.$0#$e#I'll be waiting with a glass of red wine so we can both warm you up when you're done with your work.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Winter in Pelican Town is beautiful. All of the colorful decorations alongside the bright white snow makes every day feel so festive.$3#$e#Gus, Pierre, and Mayor Lewis do a wonderful and tasteful job with their decorating.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I was up early and cleaned. Would you please take out the trash?$3#$e#Thank you, dear.[168]$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I ran into Sophia today, such a precious doll.$3
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Care for some breakfast?$3#$e#Eat up, dear.[195]$1

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I almost slipped on ice today.$6#$b#Be careful when you're walking outside, dear.$2
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'm running errands. Anything I can get for you, honey?$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Caroline had an argument with Pierre today and vented to me about it afterward.$2#$e#I hope their marriage is okay.$2#$b#They're both strong people. I know they'll get through this.$0#$b#...I should check in on her. I wonder if she's talked to Jodi yet...$0
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: My, it's chilly today, isn't it?$3#$b#I'd like to go paint somewhere scenic.

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Today has been extraordinarily busy. I've earned a glass of a good wine tonight.$3#$e#Care for a glass?$6
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Good morning, dear. I brewed coffee for us.[395]$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Victor dropped off a book for you, sweetie.$6#$b#He said he thinks you'll enjoy it - it's a memoir from the early days of the Adventurer's Guild.$3#$e#I'm glad you two are getting along.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Last night I had a dream about us growing old together.$3

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: I do love you, but some days I just think about Edward and how sad it all was...$2#$e#I'll tell you more about him someday... but not today.$2
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: I'm not feeling well. I should see Doctor Harvey.$2#$b#You might want to stay away, in case it's contagious.$2

Entries.funReturn_Olivia: Did you have a good day today?$0#$e#I found a bottle of some rare wine I've wanted to try up for auction, and managed to snag it for a great price.$3#$b#We'll have to find something to celebrate, so we have an excuse to open it.$1
I'm glad you're home, honey.$1
Entries.funLeave_Olivia: Perhaps I'll make us some mulled cider tonight. Does that sound good, dear?$3#$e#Oh, you're heading out? Have a productive day, sweetie.$1

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Olivia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Olivia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Olivia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Olivia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: My, my! My absolute favorite genre. Thank you for inviting me out, dear.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was splendid, @!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Caroline said this movie was frightening! I'll be prepared for any jump scares.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I had a wonderful time. We should see another movie again sometime, dear.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's head in early to get good seats, @.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The story was remarkable and engaging.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I've heard good reviews about this film.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The film was quite the experience, dear. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I have a feeling this film will be a disappointment...$2

AfterMovie.Text: I appreciate your company, dear.$3

Entries.Olivia: My, my. What a beautiful day for a festival.$0#$e#Are you participating in the egg hunt, @?$3
I just love celebrating the spring, don't you, sweetie?$1#$b#Are you going on the egg hunt? I'll be cheering for you.$3
Gatherings such as this give me a great opportunity to talk to Caroline and Jodi.$3
Lovely of you to make it to the festival, honey.$3#$e#Let's partake in the buffet soon.$1
The governor has honored us with his presence, @!$1#$b#I may try speaking with him after Mayor Lewis has finished his conversation. Perhaps he enjoys vintage wine?$3
The soup smells delicious. I might even have seconds, sweetie. Don't tell anyone.$1#$e#I love you, honey.$4
The sky is clear tonight. A flawless backdrop of moonlight for the jellies, wouldn't you say @?$3
The sea is beautiful at night. I'm so happy we can experience the moonlight jellies together.$3#$e#Maybe we can hold hands?$4
Are you enjoying the fair, sweetie?$3
Are you putting on a Grange Display, sweetie?$0#$b#Best of luck if you do. I know how hard you’ve worked this year.$3
I heard screams coming from the maze. What could possibly be in there!?$2
Come, dear. Seat yourself! There's plenty of food to go around.$0
Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider is astonishing. Here, let me pour you a glass.$3#$e#Happy Spirit's Eve, honey.$4
Brr... I should have worn an extra layer.$2#$e#Are you participating in the fishing competition?$3
It’s quite chilly out here, isn't it, sweetie?$2#$b#When we go home, let's get cozy in some blankets. I'll mull some spiced wine for us.$4
Merry Winter Star, dear!$3#$e#Isn't it wonderful how happy everyone is on a day such as this?$1
This time of year makes me so appreciative of family.$3#$b#I'm glad you came into my life, @.$4

BeforeMovie.Text: Heard about this here movie on the radio. Suppose' to be good!$0

AfterMovie.Text: Now that is what I call a movie. Thank you kindly for invitin' me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: That was a mighty good show.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Heh. Film was alright. Actin' could use some work.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Suppose I will give this genre a shot...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Was not a fan of that film. Brought back some memories I don't want to be doin' any thinkin' about...$2

Entries.Andy: The food at these festivals ain't so bad.$1#$e#It'd taste even better if Pierre and Lewis used my crops.$2
I found some leeks durin' our walk over here! This stuff is better than most of the food here.$1#$e#Nothin' like some ale with a leek.$0
Mayor Lewis has been chattin' up the governor this entire festival. What are those two talkin' about?$2#$e#I hope they're not talkin' bout me. He's probably got nothin' good to say.$2
If these jellies don't show in the next 10 minutes, I'm gettin' outta here. Wastin' my evening.$2
I know I don't have a snowball's chance in you-know-where at winnin'. Just wanna show everyone how hard I've been workin' this season.$0#$e#I pride myself in what I do.$1

Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider is amazin'! I wish he'd let me buy it off of him!$1#$e#He should at least sell some of it to Gus so I can get it at the saloon.$2#$e#Good luck in that there maze, farmer. I've heard some screams comin' from that direction.$0
These here sauteed mushrooms are amazin'. Gus really outdid himself.$0#$e#I heard somethin' about the town fountain missin'...$2
I overheard Willy talkin' about you. It'll be a close match between you two.$0#$e#Good luck fishin', @.$1
Best part about today is the free food and drink. Don't care much about gift givin'.$2

How are ya doin' on this fine sunny day?$0#$b#You caught me in the middle of tendin' to my crops. I'm spreadin' some new Joja fertilizer on my crop field.$0#$b#I always use Joja fertilizer. It makes my crops stronger and healthier.$1"/pause 450/emote Andy 40/pause 100/speak Andy "Say, you're just startin' out on %farm Farm. I have somethin' for ya to help you out.$0"/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move Andy 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Andy "I have some strawberry seeds for ya! Fairhaven Farm strawberries have a good reputation in Grampleton and Chestervale.$1"/pause 300/jump farmer/pause 900/speak Andy "I'll be sending them your way once I have the time. These here crops got me occupied.$0#$b#You have yourself a nice day, @. Go get some dirt on ya!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/friendship Andy 30/end dialogue Andy "Sure is nice havin' another farmer in this here valley. You keep up the good work, ya hear?$1"

You heard all of that, didn't you?$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 40/pause 300/speak Lewis "*sigh*... The Ferngill government is introducing new 'regulations'.$2#$b#I don't think they understand the negative impact it's having on small communities like this one.$2"/pause 500/speak Lewis "Kendra, the mayor of Grampleton, and I have tried negotiating, but they wouldn’t listen to us.$3"/pause 1000/speak Lewis "I'm aware Andy is... struggling, and he isn't doing well financially.$0"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Lewis "Rest assured, @. Entries.5000002/t 600 1700/z winter/w rainy/f An: rain/-500 -500/farmer -100 -100 3 Andy -101 -101 2 MarlonFay -200 -200 2 Wizard -202 -202 2 Krobus -203 -203 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 62 70 true/pause 2500/warp Andy 57 70/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/shake Andy 700/pause 1200/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 300/move Andy 10 0 2/move Andy 0 4 3/move Andy -8 0 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/halt/warp Andy -99 -99/warp farmer 74 74/viewport 62 70 true/move farmer -6 0 3/pause 1500/move farmer -7 0 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/pause 500/changeLocation Custom_ForestWest/pause 400/playMusic rain/warp Marlon 53 114/warp Wizard 55 114/warp Krobus 54 117/warp Andy 58 20/warp farmer 58 31/pause 400/viewport 58 22 true/pause 100/move Andy 0 0 0/move farmer 0 -8 0/pause 2000/speak Andy "...$8"/pause 3000/speak Andy "Jerry and Elizabeth used to live here. This was their vineyard.$0"/pause 2000/speak Andy "They were good friends of mine.$0"/pause 1500/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 1100/speak Andy "'Member the great recession? You still had that there office job of yours.$0"/pause 1000/showFrame Andy 22/pause 1200/speak Andy "That nosedive in the market had devastatin' effects on the demand for crops, 'specially artisan goods.$8#$b#Jerry and Elizabeth held out, long as they could, but eventually gave up.$8"/pause 1250/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Andy 0/pause 1200/shake Andy 1000/pause 1200/speak Andy "Jerry, you Yoba darn fool.$2"/pause 1000/speak Andy "I told 'em not to spend all their darn money on that project of theirs or else they'd..."/pause 750/shake Andy 1000/pause 1500/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 600/speak Andy "I was on the verge of bankruptcy myself. Luckily, I knew where to look for good forage.$0#$b#That forage saved me. Yoba was lookin' after me.$2"/pause 1250/speak Andy "Same thing happened to Alexa. That little farmhouse south of Fairhaven Farm...$0"/pause 1000/speak Andy "Now some freakish cretin of a mouse lives in there sellin' hats.$2#$b#I think that there wizard has something to do with it. I'm always seein' flashin' lights comin' from his tower.$2"/pause 2000/showFrame Andy 22/pause 600/speak Andy "...$8"/pause 1500/speak Andy "I need to do some ponderin' by myself. Why I came out here. Alone. Now leave.$8"/pause 1200/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 700/showFrame farmer 96/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Andy "I write to Jerry. We keep in contact. He and Elizabeth had a kid recently.$0#$b#They're livin' in Chestervale now. Not the best part of the Ferngill Republic, but it's cheap.$2#$e#I walk over to their old vineyard to ponder. Use' to visit 'em after I was done farmin' for the day.$0#$e#... I miss 'em.$8"

Entries.5000003/w sunny/f Andy 2000/z winter/t 9: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 91 74 2 Andy 77 84 0 MarlonFay 7 20 2 Wizard 7 22 0 Abigail 8 29 0 Marnie 54 21 0 Leah 112 34 0 Shane 86 54 3/pause 500/skippable/viewport 90 84 true/move farmer 0 10 3 true/move Andy 3 0 0 true/pause 1600/playSound leafrustle/pause 800/move Andy 4 0 0 true/pause 2300/playSound leafrustle/pause 600/emote farmer 8/pause 400/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 300/emote Andy 16/pause 250/speak Andy "Hey there, farmer! You caught me in midst of foragin'.$1#$b#Lots of the good stuff today. Rain helps 'em pop up.$0"/pause 500/move farmer -3 0 3/pause 400/speak Andy "I enjoy lookin' for forage in the forest. If I could, I'd make this my full-time job.$1#$b#Not much money in foragin' though. I'd be no better off than that Linus fella'. I for one enjoy sleepin' in a heated house with a fridge.$2"/pause 1000/move Andy 0 0 2/pause 1200/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Andy "Say, you busy? I have some things to talk with ya about.$0"/pause 750/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/warp Andy 45 106/warp farmer 45 108/pause 100/faceDirection Andy 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/viewport 45 108 clamp true/playMusic ocean/pause 3500/speak Andy "Things are tough when you're all on your own, farmer.#$b#I don't have many people I'd call close friends in my life.$2"/pause 300/emote Andy 40/pause 400/speak Andy "Ya know, I tried talkin' Mayor Lewis into lettin' the other farmers and I take over your grandpa's farm. It was good land bein' left to spoil.$0#$b#There was nothing Lewis could do 'bout it. Your grandpa still owned the deed to that there land.$2#$b#You showed up outta no where and took it over. Been doin' a Yoba darn good job too.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 650/shake Andy 700/pause 1100/stopMusic/speak Andy "... What I'm tryin' to say is.$0"/pause 1300/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Andy "I'm proud of you.$0"/pause 800/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 500/speak Andy "I won't lie. I use' to be jealous of ya. You only started farm work recently, relatively speakin'. I've been doin' this all my life and I haven't amounted to much.$5#$b#At first, I thought you'd move out of the valley because you couldn't handle the farmwork. City kid. Goin' from that office job to farmin' is a radical change in lifestyle.$2#$b#But you didn't. You kept at it. Kept improvin' and showin' me I was wrong. I can tell you're passionate about farmin' as best you can.$0#$b#You've brought more commerce to the valley with the publicity of %farm Farm. All the farmers are sellin' more as a result.$3"/pause 600/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 800/shake Andy 700/pause 1000/speak Andy "I suppose what what I'm really tryin' to say here is..."/pause 750/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 750/showFrame Andy 22/pause 1000/speak Andy "Thank you.$8"/pause 1000/faceDirection Andy 2 true/pause 700/speak Andy "Thank you for inspirin' me to be a better person and givin' Fairhaven Farm more business. It's helped my life more'n you know.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/playMusic ocean/pause 1000/faceDirection Andy 1/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 2000/speak Andy "Good view from here.$0#$b#Gotta say. This right here is the Ferngillian dream. Livin' in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Thanks for bein' a good friend and showin' me compassion, farmer."/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 250/friendship Andy 50/end dialogue Andy "Thanks for everythin', @. I know I might have a strange view on things, but that didn't stop you from bein' a good friend to an old oaf like me.$1#$b#Here, take this. Found it in the forest while foragin'. Not so sure what it is. Maybe you could use 'em.[114]$0#$e#Have an excellent day, farmer. Keep up all the good work you're always doin'.$1"

Entries.5000005/e 191393: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 Andy 12 16 0/pause 700/skippable/viewport 12 18 true/pause 1500/warp farmer 12 22/playSound doorClose/pause 400/faceDirection Andy 2/pause 350/textAboveHead Andy "Hey there, farmer!"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 400/speak Andy "What do ya think? Cleaned up the house and bought new furniture.$1#$b#Been usin' Pierre's seeds instead of Joja's and as a result I've been earnin' more.$0"/pause 800/faceDirection Andy 1/pause 600/faceDirection Andy 2/pause 300/speak Andy "Say, want something to eat? Just made a nice farmer's lunch.$0"/pause 300/emote farmer 32 true/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Andy's house is in good shape now! The meal we ate together was prepared with fresh forage outside. Delicious!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Andy "Since Joja left town, I've had a change in life style.$0#$e#Not gettin' rid of this here hat though. It's my favorite.$2"

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie is about a sapling. How cute.$0

DuringMovie.Text: Aww. The sappling is so adorable!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me out, @. I want to go home and water my little babies.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Brr... It's freezing. I'm glad the building is warm.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The film felt very authentic, with the story and special effects.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope there are still seats left.$0

AfterMovie.Text: I enjoyed the movie. Did anything stand out to you?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I haven't seen this genre in forever. I'm anxious to see it!$0

AfterMovie.Text: I wonder if this film will come out on VHS soon! I'll get it!$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It isn't my favorite genre, but I'll give it a go.$0

AfterMovie.Text: *yawn* Thanks for inviting me, @.$0

Entries.Susan: Jas and Vincent are so excited to hunt for the eggs around town. I hope they find lots of them!$1#$e#I'm thinking about getting a second helping of ham and veggies.$0
What a beautiful day for the Flower Festival.$4#$e#Are you planning on dancing with someone?$1
It's nice to have the governor in the valley. Mayor Lewis worked so hard to make the Luau perfect.$0#$e#I wonder if that slow roast ham Linus is making is almost ready.$1
I'm awfully afraid of large bodies of water. I'll be here on the beach, where it's safe.$0
I'm happy I get to showcase my best produce and artisan goods to everyone.$4#$b#Emerald Farm had a strong year!$1
So these are shadow brutes? They look menacing...$2
When I was younger, my father and I loved to fish together. Haven't fished at all since then.$0#$b#I think you'll do great in the contest, @.$1#$e#Best of luck to you, honey!$4
He loved the gift I gave him! I knew he'd appreciate it.$1

Entries.1000077/j 30: kindadumbautumn/-200 -200/farmer 2 2 2 Susan 3 3 0/skippable/pause 1500/speak Susan "Hello! I'm Susan, the owner of Emerald Farm up at the railroad.$4#$b#I've been trapped up there alone ever since Joja caused the rockslide, so I've got a little bit of cabin fever.$0#$b#Happy to finally meet you, @.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection Susan 1 true/pause 900/faceDirection Susan 0/pause 600/speak Susan "Stop by and visit Emerald Farm when you have the time!$1"/pause 250/end dialogue Susan "I'm thankful Joja cleared the rockslide. Lewis and I went through so much trouble getting them to remove the rocks.$2#$b#Joja still refuses to apologize...$3#$e#I'll see you again soon, dear!$1#$b#It's lovely having another farmer in the valley.$0"

Entries.1000078/f Susan 500/t 600 1150/z winter/: breezy/-500 -500/farmer 34 54 1 Susan 45 52 2 MarlonFay 15 20 2 Wizard 15 22 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 35 51 true/viewport move 1 0 6100 true/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 900/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Susan "@! Hello!$1#$b#I'm refreshing my little guys with patented homemade fertilizer.$0#$b#Nitrogen, potassium, and phosphorous are part of what makes Emerald Farm's produce delicious.$4#$b#Just add sunshine, water, and some love, and you've got yourself a profitable season!$1"/pause 900/move Susan -2 0 3/pause 1200/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Susan "Emerald Farm is small in comparison to %farm Farm. I can't imagine managing that much space.$0"/pause 1000/question fork0 "How are you able to keep up with all of that land?#Honestly, it's because I never take breaks.#I automate watering with sprinklers."/fork 1000078_NoBreaks/pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Susan "Oh! I've tried crafting sprinklers, but I can't seem to get the plumbing just right.$0#$b#I'm amazed you can craft such sophisticated devices.$4"/pause 700/speak Susan "With how many acres %farm Farm covers, if you want to use all that space, automation's probably a must.$1#$b#I don't think it'd be possible for one person to maintain, unless you hired a few farmhands to help.$0#$b#Most farmers near Pelican Town are small enough to be self-sufficient, but the orchards in Chestervale bring on seasonal help for the harvest.$1"/pause 1000/move Susan 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Susan "I need to finish fertilizing before the afternoon heat hits. Talk to you soon!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Susan was in a cheerful mood today!"/end dialogue Susan "Thank you for visiting me earlier, @.$1#$e#The way you handle running a farm that big makes me feel motivated to chase bigger dreams.$4#$e#Have a nice day, dear!$1"
Entries.1000078_NoBreaks: pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 700/speak Susan "I've noticed you work through every weekend, and sometimes don't head into town for days. Don't push yourself too hard, honey.$2#$b#Taking a day or two off won't be the end of the world.$0"/pause 1200/speak Susan "Maybe we can take a trip to Grampleton sometime? I'd love to introduce you to my crafting instructor.$1"/pause 1000/move Susan 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Susan "I need to finish fertilizing before the afternoon heat hits. Talk to you soon!$1"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Susan was in a cheerful mood today!"/end dialogue Susan "Thank you for visiting me earlier, @!$1#$b#My crafting instructor's name is Charlotte. She's an accomplished woodworker. You should meet her sometime!$0"

Entries.1000079/f Susan 1000/t 800 1500/z spring: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 38 51 1 Susan 54 50 0/pause 500/skippable/viewport 39 50 true/viewport move 1 0 9250 true/move farmer 9 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 200/emote Susan 16/pause 150/speak Susan "Hey there, @.$1#$b#I'm grateful you took time out of your day to visit me!$4"/pause 700/speak Susan "I'm harvesting my grapes. I use hand-crafted kegs to age them into wine.$0#$b#Right now I only brew small batches, but maybe Emerald Farm will become a full-fledged winery like Blue Moon Vineyard. Lots of money in wine!$1"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm positive Emerald Farm will do great.#What can you tell me about the cave up there?"/fork 1000079_WitchCave/pause 600/speak Susan "Aww. Thank you, sweetie.$0#$b#I've lived in Stardew Valley for a long time. Emerald Farm has grown so much in my time here!$1#$b#Seeing how much progress you've made on %farm Farm inspires me to work even harder!$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 200/emote Susan 32/pause 100/speak Susan "I'm thrilled there's another farmer in the valley.$1"/pause 1100/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 1300/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 700/speak Susan "I need to finish harvesting these grapes, then off to the kegs they go!$1#$b#Have a splendid day, @.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue Susan "I finished harvesting my grapes!$1#$b#Now they'll ferment in the kegs for a month. I like to make sure every part of the process is high-quality, so I even started culturing my own yeast for fermenting!$0"
Entries.1000079_WitchCave: pause 200/stopMusic/pause 300/emote Susan 8/pause 500/speak Susan "A cave by the railroad station? Honey, I've lived here for a long time. I assure you there's no cave.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 150/speak Susan "You want to show me? Be my guest. I'm actually very curious about this 'cave'...$0"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Susan 54 38/warp farmer 53 39/faceDirection Susan 0/faceDirection farmer 0/viewport 48 38 true/pause 600/emote Susan 8/pause 300/speak Susan "@, there isn't a cave here. Just a wall of solid rock.$2#$b#Is everything okay? Have you been eating enough? You work yourself far too hard, dear.$2"/pause 800/faceDirection Susan 3/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 600/speak Susan "I'm going to get back to harvesting my grapes.$0#$b#I have a wine shipment due next month, so I have to get them into the kegs pretty soon.$0"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "Susan can't see the cave. You wonder: who else can?"/pause 700/end dialogue Susan "I still don't know what you were going on about with that cave, sweetie.$0"

Entries.1000080/f Susan 1750/z spring/z summer/z: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 30 56 0 Susan 30 46 2/viewport 30 50 true/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/move Susan 0 4 2 true/pause 2000/speak Susan "Hello, @. Perfect timing!$1#$b#I just got back from Grampleton. During winter, the snow blankets the meadows there, and everything is beautiful and still.$1#$b#Every year, I try to get out there to see it at least once after the first snowfall.$4"/pause 850/speak Susan "I have a few close friends in Grampleton. We have crafting circles where we all get together and work on our projects.$1#$b#This time, I made some lovely hardwood flower pots!$1"/pause 400/emote Susan 40/pause 200/speak Susan "It's pretty chilly out here, @. Would you like to come inside? I'll make you a cup of hot cocoa.$0"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd love some hot cocoa.#I don't like hot chocolate."/fork 1000080_SusanHouse/pause 750/speak Susan "No worries, honey. Stay bundled up in this cold!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.1000080_SusanHouse: pause 550/speak Susan "Let's get inside, @!$4"/pause 150/emote farmer 32 true/pause 200/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/changeLocation Custom_SusanHouse/pause 300/warp farmer 24 15/warp Susan 26 15/pause 100/move farmer 0 0 1/move Susan 0 0 0/pause 800/playMusic 50s/pause 500/viewport 17 14 true/pause 900/playSound Milking/shake Susan 600/pause 1000/speak Susan "Here you are, sweetie.$0#$b#Be careful, it's a little hot.$1"/pause 400/move Susan 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 600/showFrame farmer 90/playSound pickUpItem/pause 500/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 93/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 750/playSound gulp/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 500/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 90/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/emote farmer 32/emote Susan 16/speak Susan "Well, that must be a record. Never before have I seen someone drink hot cocoa so quickly.$1#$b#You must have been freezing!$1"/pause 1200/speak Susan "Oh! I was going to tell you more about my trip.$4"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/stopMusic/pause 600/message "The hot cocoa was delicious! Susan told me about her friends in Grampleton. She also showed me a chest she's crafting and knicknacks from many places she's visited across the world."/pause 800/friendship Susan 50/end dialogue Susan "Stop by again for more hot cocoa!$1"

Entries.funLeave_Sophia: Good morning! If you're going out, mind picking up some snacks from Pierre's?$1#$e#I love snacks!$9

Entries.funLeave_Sophia: Um. Sooo tell me that story again about how you got my mermaid pendant!$1#$e#A ghost at the beach! So spooky!$9

Entries.funReturn_Sophia: Want to watch anime later? I'll make homemade snacks!$1
Entries.funLeave_Sophia: Good luck with the farm work today, you!$9#$e#Drop by the vineyard later if you wanna say hi.$1

Maybe the Fern Islands?$1#$e#We can talk more about it later. I definitely don't want to move anytime soon!$9#$e#S-sorry! I'm really chatty today.$1#$e#%You hug Sophia.

Entries.funReturn_Sophia: Hey, hey! Um. Do you have a moment?$1#$e#Just... wanted to say I'm proud of everything you do.$9#$b#I love the life we started together. It's... like a magical paradise.$1#$b#Lets always be there for each other!$9

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sophia in the bonds of marriage.

BeforeMovie.Text: I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was so so great! Thanks for taking me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope this movie is good! I think there's a cute character in it!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Raccoons are so so adorable!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's go get the good seats, @!$1

AfterMovie.Text: What part was your favorite?$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey, you! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies.$1

AfterMovie.Text: There were some silly parts, but I liked it.$9

BeforeMovie.Text: I-I don't know about this one. I'm just here for the snacks.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I think I'd rate that a 5 out of 10.$0

Entries.Sophia: I get nervous around large crowds of people...$2
Hey, you! Want to get some food with me?$4#$e#I already had a plate. This will be my second.$9
I'm here for the free cake.$1
Hey, you!$9#$b#Want to eat lots and lots of food with me?$1
I added aged Blue Moon Wine for the adult pot!$9#$e#I hope the other ingredients people put in are tasty!$1
Want to go swimming after we eat?$1#$e#I have a new bikini.$4
The jellyfish are so pretty!$1#$b#I love watching them every year.$9
Hey, you. See the faint glow out there?$4#$e#The moonlight jellyfish are coming to the shore!$9#$e#%You hold Sophia's hand. She smiles at you.
I'm presenting my best aged wine from Blue Moon Vineyard!$1#$e#I worked hard to make these!$9#$e#Oh. Um. So what's in your grange display?$1
We are competing against each other today.$1#$b#May the best one win!$3#$e#Oh. Um. I love you!$4#$b#Good luck!$9
I went into the maze and gave up.$2#$e#Why? Oh. I was hungry.$1#$e#Have you tried Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider?$9
Hey, you. Getting food too?$1#$e#Hey! Um. Those monsters in the cages. Have you fought those before?$0#$e#You're so brave, my hero.$4
It's so dark... I can't see.$2
Mmm. So pretty here.$9#$e#There's no food, but that's okay. I brought snacks.$1
I want to build a snowman!$9#$b#Come on! Let's make one, silly.$1#$e#Aww. Okay. After the fishing contest then!$1
Who's a good boy!? You are!$9#$e#Did you get a present yet?$1
Hey, you! I thought I'd pet Dusty for a little bit.$1#$b#He's Pelican Town's best boy!$9#$e#Oh. Um. I'll join you at a table soon. Save me a seat?$1

Entries.MarlonFay: This is a mighty gift, @. Thank you./244 413 437 439 680/Thanks. I'll find some use of this./346 303 348 459 205 422 287 288/Hmmm... that will be a hard pass. My apologies./-81/This unfortunately doesn't suit me./-80 283 233/Thanks./286 424 426 436 438 803 184 186 420 -28/

BeforeMovie.Text: Horror films test my integrity. Let us procure our seats.$0

DuringMovie.Text: No jump scare will get to me...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Thank you kindly for the invite, @. That was quite enjoyable.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: This genre of film is not my favorite, but I'll give it a go...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Hmm. I don't have much to say about the film...$0

BeforeMovie.Text: Well. Let us grab seats post haste, @.

AfterMovie.Text: Interesting film. Acting was a little sub-par, though.

BeforeMovie.Text: Hmm. There's something magical about this theater. I can feel it in the air...$0

AfterMovie.Text: I was engrossed in the film. Thank you kindly for the invite, @.

BeforeMovie.Text: Well. Let's watch the movie, @.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Hmm. I didn't pay too much attention.$0

Entries.MarlonFay: Even with my bad leg, I never miss a town festival.
I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.
Clint's blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do his prices...$2
Took a mighty amount of effort to catch these monsters.$2#$b#Most of the credit goes to the Castle Village adventurers.#$e#Don't get too close to the cage.
If you spot any frost slimes, alert me.$0#$e#We're deep in the forest. Anything can be out there in the woods.

Entries.1000034/j 10: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer 6 19 0 MarlonFay 6 13 2/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 17/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/playSound doorClose/pause 800/shake MarlonFay 600/textAboveHead MarlonFay "You've proven yourself!"/pause 150/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 700/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 600/speak MarlonFay "You've ventured into the mines with utmost courage, @!#$b#We could use someone with your skills. Do you want to join the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/jump farmer/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "@...$2#$b#Do you swear under oath, to protect humanity from monsters, and to do everything in your power to uphold the traditions, values, and ideology of the Adventurer's Guild?$0"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1400/move MarlonFay 0 1 2/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "On behalf of Stardew Valley and the Order of the Knights of Pythagoras, I officially accept you as the 23rd Adventurer's Guild member!$1"/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "As a member of the Adventurer's Guild, you will be allowed to purchase rare weapons we commission and discover!#$b#There are also bounties and quests you can access from the notice board behind me!"/pause 750/speak MarlonFay "Welcome to the guild, @. I expect great things from you."/pause 250/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue MarlonFay "Adventuring can be dangerous. If you need a sharper sword, I can put in a good word with Clint."

Entries.1090501/e 1000034/k 1090502/b 1/f Marlon: continue/-500 -500/farmer 51 16 2 Krobus -300 -300 3 MarlonFay 52 30 2/rustyKey/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 51 30 clamp true/move farmer 0 11 2/pause 1250/showFrame MarlonFay 18 true/pause 600/speak MarlonFay "Come join me, @."/pause 750/faceDirection MarlonFay 2 true/pause 600/move farmer 0 3 2/pause 2000/speak MarlonFay "@...$2#$b#There is something I've been meaning to show you...$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 800/showFrame MarlonFay 18 true/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "It's time you meet Krobus. They're a shadow person I've been hiding in the Pelican Town sewers.$0"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 600/faceDirection MarlonFay 3 true/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Come. Let's go meet him.$0"/pause 800/advancedMove MarlonFay false 0 -1 -1 0 0 -10/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -9 0 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/pause 500/changeLocation Town/stopMusic/pause 500/warp farmer 40 101/warp MarlonFay 38 101/viewport 35 97 clamp true/advancedMove MarlonFay false -3 0 0 -4/move farmer -6 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 8 true/pause 2750/faceDirection MarlonFay 3 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 400/speak MarlonFay "Let me unlock this first."/pause 450/faceDirection MarlonFay 0 true/pause 650/playSound openBox/shake MarlonFay 200/pause 700/shake MarlonFay 500/playSound trashcanlid/pause 900/faceDirection MarlonFay 3 true/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Alright. Watch your step."/pause 600/faceDirection MarlonFay 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 800/playSound stairsdown/warp MarlonFay -40 -40/pause 600/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer -39 -39/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/changeLocation Sewer/playMusic Upper_Ambient/warp Krobus 31 20/warp MarlonFay 17 11/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame MarlonFay 18/move Krobus -10 0 0 true/viewport 19 17 true/pause 2000/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer 16 11/pause 900/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 900/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/pause 400/move MarlonFay 0 6 2 true/pause 300/move farmer 0 5 2 true/pause 2000/speak MarlonFay "Krobus. I have someone here I'd like you to meet."/pause 500/shake Krobus 800/emote Krobus 28 true/pause 1300/move Krobus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Krobus "..."/pause 700/speed Krobus 2/move Krobus -4 0 0/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Krobus, meet @, our newest guild member."/pause 750/speak Krobus "P-pleasure to m-meet you..."/pause 700/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/speak Krobus "We've met before. B-but I ran away from you...#$b#I run away from most humans..."/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Krobus has... had bad experiences with humans. I stumbled into them during a mission many years ago.#$b#Unlike other shadow people, Krobus speaks our language and is friendly. It's... unprecedented."/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Adventurers often stab first and ask questions later. Shielding Krobus from them was imperative.#$b#Magnus and I arranged a temporary home in the sewers."/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 200/move MarlonFay 0 0 2/pause 400/speak Krobus "I'm grateful to them. They treat me nicely... like I'm a person.$1"/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 400/speak MarlonFay "@, if anyone in town saw Krobus, they could notify the Order. They would be taken away.#$b#You must keep what you've seen here secret."/pause 150/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "Let us return to the Guild. I have something to give you."/pause 600/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "We'll be taking our leave, Krobus. It's been a pleasure, as always.#$b#You'll be seeing @ again soon."/pause 500/speak Krobus "..."/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/playSound stairsdown/pause 1000/playSound stairsdown/pause 200/changeLocation AdventureGuild/pause 100/playMusic MarlonsTheme/warp farmer 6 5/warp Krobus -300 -300/warp MarlonFay 8 5/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 100/move MarlonFay 0 0 3/viewport 7 5 true/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "You've proven your trust to me.#$b#This is a key to the sewers. Until now, only Magnus, Gil, and I had a copy. Now you do too."/pause 500/playSound reward/message "You received a key to the sewers!"/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "You should speak to Krobus. They seem fond of you.#$b#And don't forget, they're to remain a secret."/pause 400/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end dialogue MarlonFay "The world is filled with mysteries.$0#$e#Will we ever unravel them?...$2"

Entries.1090502/e 1090501: Upper_Ambient/-500 -500/farmer 20 21 1 Krobus 31 17 2/pause 500/skippable/viewport 28 23 true/viewport move 0 -1 5000/move farmer 11 0 0 true/pause 4000/emote Krobus 16 true/pause 2500/speak Krobus "Oh? You're back. Marlon gave you a key?"/pause 500/question fork0 "#He did. It's nice to meet you.#Why are you hiding in the Sewer?"/fork 1090502_MeetYou/pause 500/speak Krobus "Oh... I...#$b#I'm not ready to talk about that yet."/pause 600/emote Krobus 40/pause 500/speak Krobus "I've collected many exotic goods throughout my travels.#$b#If you have gold, you're welcome to purchase them."/pause 700/speak Krobus "Come, take a look!"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end position 31 18
Entries.1090502_MeetYou: pause 500/speak Krobus "I'm happy to meet someone new. It gets lonely down here...$4"/pause 750/speak Krobus "I've collected many exotic goods throughout my travels.$1#$b#If you have gold, you're welcome to purchase them."/pause 700/speak Krobus "Come, take a look!$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 0 -3 0 true/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/end position 31 18

Entries.1004200/b 1/w rainy/f MarlonFay 1000: continue/-500 -500/farmer 24 37 0 MarlonFay 24 15 2/pause 1000/skippable/viewport 22 28 true/viewport move 0 -1 4000 true/move MarlonFay 0 9 2 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/pause 5000/speak MarlonFay "Greetings, @. I don't believe I've seen you up here before."/pause 1150/speak MarlonFay "I visit this graveyard to pay my respects to those who sacrificed their lives to keep the valley safe."/pause 1200/showFrame MarlonFay 19/pause 1600/speak MarlonFay "Many of these adventurers were my friends...$2"/pause 750/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1250/speak MarlonFay "I went on an expedition in the mines with a couple First Slash adventurers who were eager to test their mettle.#$b#Imagine their disappointment when we found that the monsters have been thinned out! The progress you've made single-handedly is impressive.$1#$b#Your assistance in keeping the valley safe is a debt I don't think I'll ever be able to repay.$0#$b#To tell you the truth, you remind me of myself when I was your age.$2"/pause 500/emote MarlonFay 40/speak MarlonFay "Magnus Rasmodius and I privately meet regarding new monster hunters, wizards, witches, and adventurers who join our order."/move MarlonFay 0 1 2/pause 700/speak MarlonFay "I want you to join our meetings, @. Your insight would prove most helpful. What do you say?"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I would be honored to join the meetings.#I'm humbled, but I'll leave that to you two."/fork 1004200_Agree/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I understand, @. Keep up the good work protecting Stardew Valley."/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I'll speak to you again regarding other matters.$2"/move MarlonFay 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end position 21 27
Entries.1004200_Agree: pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "I'll let you know when we have our next meeting.#$b#We usually meet at the guild building or at Magnus' tower.#$b#Sometimes we rent a room at the Stardrop Saloon so we can enjoy good food and drink too."/pause 1500/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 1500/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "I must be on my way, @...$2"/pause 800/move MarlonFay 0 8 2 true/move farmer -1 0 2 true/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/end dialogue MarlonFay "I'll inform you the next time there's a council meeting."

It's paramount the council be notified of these events.#$b#Join me in the warp hall."/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/changeLocation Custom_WizardBasement/warp MarlonFay 22 22/warp farmer 24 22/warp Wizard 23 20/pause 100/positionOffset MarlonFay 20 -10/positionOffset farmer -20 -10/viewport 23 21 true/pause 1200/speak Wizard "I'm teleporting to the Ferngill Republic Ministry of Magic to discuss the 'Void Shard'.#$b#By law, only I may go."/pause 700/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 250/move Wizard 0 -2 0/pause 150/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 150/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 600/speak Wizard "Your accomplishment won't go unnoticed, @.#$b#I'll ensure you're given proper credit."/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/screenFlash 2/playSound wand/playSound wand/warp Wizard -105 -105/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/end dialogue MarlonFay "Magnus' warp hall was constructed for long distance teleportation - a true triumph of magical ingenuity.#$b#It's what makes travel to Castle Village and other far away locations possible.#$e#So. Entries.Introduction: Um... Greetings! My name is Morgan. I'm a pupil of Razolyn the Magnificent. What's your name?$0#$e#It's been a pleasure!$1
Entries.spring_12: Razolyn and I are traveling deep into the forest tomorrow.$1#$b#I won't be attending the town festival.$0#$e#She found a place with a really high concentration of raw magic. I'm excited!$3
Entries.Mon4: Razolyn is teaching me about the magical properties of mystical ancient plants.$3#$e#She tells me the valley used to be full of them a long time ago.$1
Entries.Tue2: I have an exam soon. I'm ready to pass it!$1#$e#I want to protect people.$1
Entries.Thu: Do you like my hat?$1#$e#Razolyn made it for me!$3
Entries.Thu2: Razolyn told me there's forest sprites deep in the woods.$1#$b#Their magical powers are intertwined with the valley.$3
Entries.Sun4: Razolyn is showing me a place called 'Sprite Spring'. She's gonna introduce me her forest sprite friends.$1#$e#One of them goes by 'Claus'. He gave her the ancient seeds for her arcane studies.$1
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm going on a special quest to gather something called 'fiddlehead' in the forest.$1#$b#Razolyn needs it for a potion.$3
Entries.summer_Tue: Sometimes I ask Razolyn if Vincent or Jas can come visit.$1#$e#She always says no....$2
Entries.summer_Wed8: I'm going on a field trip tomorrow!$3#$e#I asked if you could come but Razolyn said no.$0
Entries.summer_Thu: *yawn*...$3#$b#I didn't sleep much last night.$0#$e#Why? I was practicing magic!$1#$e#Don't tell Razolyn!$5
Entries.fall_15: Welwick is running her clairvoyance booth tomorrow.$1#$e#Razolyn says she's really powerful.$0
Entries.fall_Mon: Did you know someone named Magnus Rasmodius built the tower on a 'magical field'?$0#$e#I wonder who he is...$3
Entries.fall_Fri: Razolyn is teaching me the 'Merlin Doctrine'. It's like a big rulebook for mages.$0#$e#It's reeeeeally boring.$2
Entries.fall_Sat6: There's a blocked warp with the sign scratched off in the warp hall. I wonder what it was?$0#$b#Razolyn forbids me from asking about it. But She'll tell me someday.$4
Entries.fall_Sun: I want to try fire magic but I'm not allowed to.$8#$e#Razolyn says it's very hard to control.$0
Entries.winter_7: The area where the ice fishing festival takes place has a great mana pool too.$1#$e#Um. Razolyn and I will be nearby. Try to find us!$1
Entries.winter_Tue: Since it's freezing outside, I'm gonna convince Razolyn to let me try fire magic.$1#$e#Hmm, you're right. I guess it could be dangerous.$2
Entries.winter_Thu: I've asked Razolyn about adopting an animal from Marnie's. She said 'maybe'!$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, @!$1

AfterMovie.Text: It was a magical film! Thank you, @.$1#$e#Maybe I'll try creating the 'Brave Little Sappling' myself with magic some day!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: A horror film? Okay...$8

AfterMovie.Text: That was scary...$2

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me, @.$1

AfterMovie.Text: *yawn* that was kinda boring.$0#$e#Oh! Um. I enjoyed the movie!$3#$e#...$3

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: I was on the edge of my seat there at the end!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: People are staring at my hat.$8

AfterMovie.Text: That was a good movie! I can't wait to tell Magnus about it!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Can we play the 'crane game'?$1#$e#I could use a little magic to 'sweeten the odds'.$7

AfterMovie.Text: Thank you for the invite, @!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Can we play the 'crane game'?$1

AfterMovie.Text: Um. Thanks, @.$0

I must do as they command.$0"/pause 700/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "Morgan arrives tomorrow.$0#$b#That is all.$0"/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 600/screenFlash 2/warp Wizard -100 -100/playSound wand/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "Someone new is arriving in the valley tomorrow!"/pause 1000/end dialogue "Morgan's family made the request to visit once a season, but I denied it.#$e#Allow me to explain.#$b#Mages take an oath to follow the 'Merlin Doctrine'.#$b#The Ministry of Magic has the final say in all things.#$e#Now, I must prepare their reading material."

It outlines the magical properties of a number of mystical plants.#$b#Recently, I was fortunate enough to obtain several seeds of Ancient Fruit, previously believed to be long-extinct, and I'm cultivating them outside.$0#$b#I hope to study their arcane energies as they grow."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 19/pause 700/speak Wizard "The world holds countless mysteries waiting to be discovered and studied.$0#$b#Our knowledge of some of these mysteries has been passed down among magic practitioners through these books for many generations."/pause 200/showFrame Wizard 4/pause 500/speak Wizard "Visitors from the town here are rare, and not one of them has been drawn to my books, @.#$b#If you choose to pursue deeper arcane knowledge, I'll be delighted to assist."/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 4 true/pause 700/speak Wizard "Perhaps one day, I'll teach you some 'light magic', such as changing your appearance."/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 800/speak Wizard "Glad to see the prospect excites you. Entries.Apples: You find me! You win!#$e#You are good friend!$1
I follow humans into forest!#$b#Me curious what you all doing!$1#$e#People with funny hats can't see me!$1
I decide to visit your village for festival!#$e#No one here see me! Only you!$1

Entries.Wed: 0 Custom_Claire_WarpRoom 1 3 3

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Claire in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Claire in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Claire... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Claire... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

Entries.Mon8: Hey @. Here's a free movie ticket![809]$6#$e#The showings this week are incredible.$1
Entries.Thu4: I've never worked somewhere as nice as the theater.$1#$e#I look forward to seeing the birds everyday!$5
Entries.Sat8: There's a family of blue jays nesting in a tree near the movie theater.$1#$e#Birds are majestic creatures, wouldn't you agree?$5
Entries.summer_10: The air conditioning at the theater is perfect.$0
Entries.summer_Wed4: I can recommend some movies you should see...$1
Entries.fall_Tue4: Leaves keep finding their way into the theater and I have to sweep...$0#$e#Sometimes the birds help.$1
Entries.winter_Sun4: There aren't many jobs where I live. When the position opened up at the movie theater, I took it!$1#$e#It's fun working there...$1

Entries.Claire0: This is the start of something wonderful...$4
Entries.Claire1: This is the start of something wonderful...$4

Entries.funReturn_Claire: Work was exhausting today... but I did talk to some interesting people.
Entries.funLeave_Claire: Happy new year. I have a feeling this year will be eventful...$1

Entries.funReturn_Claire: How was your day, dear?$1
Entries.funLeave_Claire: Good morning. I got up early and made coffee. [395]$1

Entries.funReturn_Claire: I met some interesting people at work. Someone traveled from Zuzu city!$5
Entries.funLeave_Claire: I'm going to work soon. What will you be doing today?$1

Entries.funReturn_Claire: My skin is getting a bit pale... a little sunshine should help.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, @. This film in particular strikes my interest! Shall we procure seats?$1

AfterMovie.Text: I felt youthful again watching that film! Certainly a gratifying experience!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Thank you for inviting me to the cinema, @. Best to get use out of the theater you paid for.$1

AfterMovie.Text: That film presented a... unique perspective. Perahps I should follow it by example?$0

BeforeMovie.Text: It's good to present yourself at the cinema, @. Everyone knows you single-handely paid for the establishment!$1

DuringMovie.Text: Haha! Quite the show this is!$1

AfterMovie.Text: Well, I must say that was quite entertaining. Until next time, @.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: After the countless hours I've put into work, I'm looking forward to this delightful film.$0

AfterMovie.Text: A magnificent film that certainly was. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, yes. I've heard... poor reviews of this movie but never had the chance to inspect it yet...$0

DuringMovie.Text: What. No! That makes no sense!$3

AfterMovie.Text: I will look into removing this movie from the master show list. Can't have poor films ruining our establishment!$3

Entries.6665290_JojaWarehouse: pause 500/move Morris 0 -4 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/playSound doorClose/pause 700/playSound doorClose/pause 600/warp Jas -303 -303/warp Vincent -202 -156/warp Olivia -200 -200/warp Caroline -199 -199/warp Jodi -198 -198/warp Demetrius -197 -197/warp Penny -195 -195/warp Gus -150 -150/warp Morris 32 13/warp farmer 32 16/pause 200/changeLocation CommunityCenter/viewport 32 15 true/pause 2100/speak Morris "Corporate has been stockpiling materials and supplies in the warehouse for quite some time now.$4#$b#I am still surprised Mayor Lewis allowed us to buy it - signed the papers and all.$0#$b#But because he did, we now have a staging point for our next phase.$1#$b#I wonder what changed the Mayor's mind...$0"/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 3/pause 800/move Morris 0 0 1/pause 1000/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 500/speak Morris "These crates and boxes...$0#$b#What you see before you is the future of Stardew Valley.$1#$b#With these materials, we can soon start paving a better life for everyone... literally.$4#$b#Miles of paved lit roads, next-generation housing, commercial zones, standardized plumbing, full electrical grids...$0#$b#Stardew Valley will finally become part of the developed world, and it's all thanks to your help.$1"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 600/showFrame Morris 34/pause 800/speak Morris "Now... about the other local farmers and businesses.$0"/pause 1100/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/shake Morris 400/pause 600/move Morris 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Morris "Erm...$2#$b#I must admit I was... incorrect in my approach towards the public when our branch first opened here.$2"/pause 700/move Morris 0 0 2/pause 800/showFrame Morris 32/pause 700/speak Morris "@, you...$2"/pause 500/shake Morris 600/pause 1200/showFrame Morris 0/pause 500/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 29/pause 700/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 500/speak Morris "You've accomplished incredible feats on %farm Farm, making national news, all while building up the community and respecting the environment.$8#$b#If you can do that... it's possible Joja can too. I'm inspired to take the same approach.$9#$b#What's the point of all this development if the very people meant to occupy it are cast off?$8#$b#That goes against my own goals of building a better Ferngill Republic.$7"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 27/pause 1000/speak Morris "I have been going about this all wrong.$7"/pause 800/showFrame Morris 30/pause 500/speak Morris "The greatest challenge facing Joja is public relations. The current situation looks dire. The public's opinion of us has never been lower.$7#$b#Moving forward, I will seek resolution with the local businesses and established farms.$8#$b#I just need to think of a way to make amends.$9"/pause 1000/showFrame Morris 29/pause 600/playSound bob/showFrame Morris 28/pause 600/showFrame Morris 0/pause 1000/speak Morris "Would you care to brainstorm with me, @?$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/message "With Joja's help, the future of Pelican Town looks bright! Morris seems like a completely new person."/pause 1000/end dialogue Morris "I appreciate our conversation in the warehouse, @.$0"

Hehehe.$1"/pause 1000/speak Morris "The president of the company asked me to give you this exclusive gift as a way of saying 'thanks'.$1"/playMusic none/pause 1000/awardFestivalPrize joja/null/itemAboveHead joja/null/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end Position 52 27/end

I demand a recount of those votes!$3"/pause 200/shake Demetrius 200/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 125/faceDirection GuntherSilvian 1 true/pause 100/shake Caroline 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/showFrame Lewis 0 true/pause 125/move Marnie 0 -1 3/emote Marnie 16 true/pause 100/emote Harvey 16 true/pause 225/faceDirection Sophia 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Victor 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Gus 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Willy 0 true/emote Gus 16 true/pause 150/emote Demetrius 16 true/pause 250/speak Morris "...$2"/pause 400/move GuntherSilvian 2 0 1/move GuntherSilvian 0 0 2/speak Gunther "Although it was close, the results are clear as a polished gem stone, Mr. Williams.$5"/pause 200/speak Abigail "But... what will happen to our store?$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 2 true/pause 200/speak Caroline "I don't know, sweetie...$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead George "What's all this ruckus!?"/shake George 400/pause 500/faceDirection Evelyn 3 true/pause 500/shake Pierre 500/pause 400/speak Pierre "Morris! Allow Morris to get a word in.$0"/speak Pierre "...$4"/pause 1250/speak Pierre "Fine.$2#$b#But don't expect to win me or my family over, Morris.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/pause 350/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 0 0 1/pause 150/faceDirection Pierre 0 true/pause 200/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Marnie 2 true/pause 200/move Marnie 0 1 2/pause 75/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 150/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/pause 100/move GuntherSilvian -3 0 2/pause 750/speed Morris 1/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 750/showFrame Morris 28 true/pause 600/showFrame Morris 29 true/pause 75/playSound dwop/pause 500/showFrame Morris 30/pause 1000/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 200/speak Morris "When I established Joja Mart in Pelican Town, under the direction of the Governor, my goals were nothing short of self-serving.$8#$b#My only desire was to work myself up in the ranks of Joja Co., and live an affluent life in the city.$8#$b#But since rebuilding Stardew Valley's infrastructure, making new friendships, and spending the majority of my time in this thriving town...$7#$b#I've come to realize how important community is.$7#$b#I'm not asking for forgiveness... but a second chance to prove I can be better.$7"/pause 750/shake Morris 500/pause 250/speak Morris "I'm through with putting profits over people...$7#$b#I've found a new purpose! And that is improving the lives of all of you, and presenting opportunity!$8#$b#Starting with several major announcements!...$9"/pause 1000/speak Morris "Pierre! Get up here!$9"/pause 400/emote Pierre 40 true/pause 250/faceDirection Caroline 3 true/pause 400/move Pierre 0 -1 0/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 500

Entries.Wed10: Have you grown the new Joja crops? They're magically modified organisms.$0#$e#Although the seeds are expensive, the return on investment is nothing to scoff at!$1
Entries.summer_Mon10: Joja Emporium is a wild success!$1#$e#More tourists are flocking into town by the day!$4
Entries.summer_Tue10: Hmm... what should my next development project be for the city...?$0#$e#%Morris is pondering.
Entries.summer_Thu10: I feel as if I'll never gain the trust of certain individuals in town...$2#$e#I guess some of the things I've done are unforgivable...$2#$e#But I like to believe it's never too late to change.$0
Entries.summer_Fri10: Good day, @.$1#$e#Busy as always I see!$0
Entries.summer_Sun10: Being Mayor is a lot of work. Countless mounds of paperwork!$3#$e#Nothing I'm not used to. Being a manager trained me for my true destiny!$1
Entries.fall_Mon10: I rather enjoy fall in Stardew Valley.$1#$b#How do I put it? There's more... depth and appreciation to the season compared to the city.$0
Entries.fall_Tue10: Ah, I'm looking forward to lobster bisque this weekend.$1
Entries.fall_Wed10: I never thought I'd become a mayor. Strange how life works, isn't it?$0
Entries.fall_Thu10: Perhaps I should open a suggestion box...$0
Entries.fall_Fri10: Ah, @! How are the new roads?$0#$b#A good friend of mine is a contractor. Certainly made securing the development project a breeze in the wind!$1
Entries.fall_Sat10: The city council is an interesting group of people...$0
Entries.winter_Tue10: Pierre's store is struggling. I must find a way to help...$2#$e#Perhaps if Joja Mart sold different products? Stopped selling seeds?$0#$e#No, no. I'd never convince corporate...$3
Entries.winter_Thu10: I had to 'pull some strings' to remain as a manager for Joja Mart - while also serving as Mayor.#$e#I'm friends with powerful people. Perhaps I'll introduce you to a few one day...$4
Entries.winter_Fri10: Although Lewis and I don't meet eye to eye on policy, there is much I can learn from him.$1
Entries.winter_Sat10: I'm bone-tired lately. I should take a vacation soon...
Entries.winter_Sun10: I have a responsibility for the general welfare of Pelican Town.$0#$b#If you think of any improvements, do please inform me!$1#$e#Yes, yes. I'm aware of Pierre's store struggling.$0

Entries.election: *sigh* Being Mayor for as long as I was... you can get caught up in your ego and and lose sight of your duties to the public...$2#$b#I believe Morris will be a good Mayor, and bring positive change to the valley.$2#$e#At least I still get to plan and host festivals as the event coordinator!$1#$e#I'll look at this retirement as an opportunity to focus on myself and spend time with those I care about.$0#$e#Hmm. I wonder if Marnie would be interested in going to the saloon tonight.$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Joja Emporium sure is an impressive building.$0#$e#I feel as if Pelican Town gets more modernized by the day.$0

Entries.election: What will happen to our store?...$2#$e#Dad's been really upset.$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: Mom got a job in the city. Dad isn't giving up on the store.$2

Entries.election: I don't trust Morris...$2#$e#Our store is in jeopardy. I might need to find part-time work in the city.$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: I'm earning a modest amount from my clerk position. Still getting used to the long commute...$2#$e#I didn't think I'd return to my office job.$2

Entries.election: Morris must have cheated! It isn't possible he won the election!$3#$e#Pierre's General Store is done for...$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: Caroline went back to her day job to keep the store afloat.$2#$b#We will overcome this!$3#$e#Oh. @. Give Morris my regards next time you chat with him!$1#$e#%Pierre called me out...

Entries.election: So... Morris is Mayor now...$2#$e#I wonder how Lewis is doing...$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: There's a parking lot behind my house now.$2#$e#I'll miss that park...$2

Entries.election: Joja Co. has a history of treating the environment poorly. And now Morris is our Mayor...$2#$e#Robin is worried her carpentry trade will be replaced with a cheaper alternative...$2
If I wanted roads developed outside the home I built, I would've done it myself...$3#$e#I'm afraid Morris will try running my carpentry trade out of business...$2
I suppose I'll be anglin' more Joja CD's and cola...$2
A change in leadership could be a great thing for a small community.$0#$e#I do have my reservations about Morris...$2#$b#But he did win the election, which means he has the faith of the majority.$0
Lewis looks so sad...$2#$e#I know! I'll sew him some new socks!$0
Hmmph! Morris will bring about much needed change here.$0
A more developed Pelican Town could bring in more tourists and help the saloon financially!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Joja Emporium is bringing tourists to the saloon!$1

Entries.election: I'm SO looking forward to actual roads. My shoes always get muddy.$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: Oh my god! There's a new shopping center in town now!$1

Entries.election: Must say, I didn't expect Morris to pull out a victory.$0
Why isn't Lewis Mayor anymore?$2
I'm overjoyed Morris won! He's a man of his word!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Have you been to the emporium yet, @?$0

Entries.election: I've never voted before. That was fun.$0
I don't want paved roads by my house...$2
Lewis needs our support more than ever, @.$2#$e#I'll bake one of his favorite meals to cheer him up...$2
Entries.jojaEmporium: There's a road beside our property now.$0#$e#It looks nice, but I prefer a natural dirt road...$2

Entries.election: I imagine there will be light pollution from the paved lit roads.$2#$b#It'll make stargazing difficult...$2
Hah! 'Bout time there was change in leadership here.$1#$e#More tourism means a bigger paycheck for me! All aboard!$1
Our little community won't ever be the same...$2
Hey there. Can you believe my boss is the Mayor of Pelican Town now? Crazy!$1
Entries.jojaEmporium: Did you see me during that ceremony? Got a new uniform for work!$1

Entries.election: I don't care about the election results.$5#$e#Nope. I didn't vote.$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: Can't smoke on the roof of the emporium...$0#$e#It's a shame. I almost thought it was a cool place.$0

Entries.election: Morris won... What a series of events.$0#$e#My aunt isn't taking it too well...$2
Mommy has been really happy lately!$1#$e#Did something happen?$0
The election? Yes, I'm aware of it.#$e#I don't concern myself with those matters...
I heard you guys have a different Mayor now!$1#$e#What's he like?$0
Morris has experience in real estate development. It's something good for the community.$3

Entries.jojaEmporium: The emporium rooftop is so lavish! I must dine there again with Morris.$3#$e#He has a charming personality...$1

Entries.election: Oh, dear! Morris won the mayoral election!$1#$b#Let us celebrate with a glass of wine!$3
Entries.jojaEmporium: The emporium rooftop is absolutely lavish! We must dine up there sometime, dear.$3

Entries.election: Why... why does it have to be Joja?$2#$e#...$6
Good day, @.$0#$e#No. I don't have an opinion about the election results... it's irrelevant to my work.$0
Things couldn't be worse, dear. Morris is our Mayor now...$2#$e#I will never forgive Joja for trapping me behind those boulders for so long.$3
It was a close election, but the results were as clear as a polished gem.$5
My manager is a Mayor now. Who would've thought...$0
Entries.jojaEmporium: I think the trucks at the ceremony were a bit much...$0

Entries.election: I'm not old enough to vote.$4
Entries.jojaEmporium: That ceremony was really cool. I liked the part with the balloons!$1

Entries.HaleyHouse_5_20: Emily invited me to sleep over tonight.$0

Entries.Forest_71_50: Why hello there, @.$1#$b#Cindersap forest is... beautiful. I don't often see so many trees all in one place.
Entries.CommunityCenter_11_23: Isn't it lovely seeing everyone gathered in one place?$1
Entries.Thu4: I closed the shop today so I could visit Emily!$1

Entries.Emily: If you stand in the rain and listen carefully, the raindrops sound like little whispered conversations.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Linus: I..I haven't seen this much food in one place in years. And the Mayor said I could eat as much as I wanted...$3#$b#I never thought of myself as part of this community, but I guess today's my day too.$1
This reminds me of one of a place I lived when I was younger.$0#$b#We used to have big parties like this almost every night, everyone sharing stories and food.$0
I was able to help out with the event this season. Brought some berries that I foraged up in the woods.$1
Mayor said it's okay if I come sleep in here on the coldest nights.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey: A lot of people think there's some magical food you can eat to boost your metabolism, but it's really just about eating a balanced diet.$0
Body and mind..they're connected, you know. Living in a place like this, where everyone cares for each other..$0#$b#It's good for your mind, body, and soul.$1
Everyone's looking very well. It's nice to see, although I guess it might mean I'm out of a job.$1
Susan, Andy, and Pierre all contributed local produce to make sure these meals are as healthy as can be.$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Harvey_Married: The food that we grow on our farm makes for a great start to a balanced diet, which is the key to a healthy metabolism.$0#$b#And since we grow it all organically, it tastes great, too.$1
As a doctor, I have to deal with people who are sick, in pain, and suffering.$0#$b#So it means more than I can tell you that being with you has brought me a sense of peace.$4
This town has really improved since you arrived, hasn't it? We're all healthier and happier, thanks to you.$1
Make sure you have something to eat here. It's all delicious, and I don't want to have to carry you home when you get tired!$1
