Entries.CommunityDay_Victor: Huh... I have a pretty thorough collection of books on the history of the Gotoro Empire, but there's one here I haven't seen before.$7#$b#I should visit this place more often.$1
*mumbling* So that's how the engineers did it...there are so many tricks to structural integrity I have to learn...$0
I'm thinking about doing some traveling soon. Things have been a little stagnant for me lately. I could use some variation.$3

Elliott? I've read a few of his short stories. They're not my usual style, but the way he describes the beauty of the natural world is pretty phenomenal.$0#$b#Maybe I'll work up the courage to tell him sometime.$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Victor_Married: This is an impressive collection. Did you help assemble it? ...You just keep surprising me with all these new ways you're amazing.
There are a few tricks in this book that I want to try out on the farm. You don't mind a few small renovations, right?
I'd love to travel to the Fern Islands together sometime. I've read so many books set there...I want to see what it's really like.
How well do you know Elliott? ..No, I'm not jealous! I was just wondering if you could introduce us. It's silly, but I've read some of his work, and I feel like we could have a lot to talk about.$0

Entries.22: 630 Custom_JenkinsHouse 19 8 2 Olivia_Yoga/910 Custom_JenkinsHouse 33 37 2/1050 Custom_JenkinsHouse 22 39 3/1120 CommunityCenter 26 9 2 Olivia_Wine2/1310 CommunityCenter 26 9 3 "Strings\schedules\Olivia:CommunityDay_Olivia"/1730 Custom_JenkinsHouse 20 5 3 Olivia_Sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Olivia: Oh, hello, sweetie. I was just making a note to myself to donate a few cases of wine for the next event like this. I'm absolutely parched.$3
Mmm... I hope Victor's doing all right over there. I worry he's not integrating into the town well.$0#$b#Even at an event like this, he hides his nose in a book.$6
Hmm... I wonder if I could sweet talk the Mayor into letting us hold our yoga classes here.$0#$b#The group is starting to outgrow Caroline's living room, I think.$1
I'm going to have to sit down soon. I'm getting tired just listening to how hard Caroline's been working.$2#$b#I never imagined a little shop would take so much work to run...$6

Entries.CommunityDay_Olivia_Married: Oh, hello, sweetie. Let me know whenever you're ready to get going. I want nothing more than to curl up with you and a glass of wine.$3
Mmm... Have you talked to Victor yet, sweetie? He looks like he could use a friend.$6
Fall's here. Beautiful colors, fabulous clothing, and most importantly, time for you and I to break out the bottles of red at the end of the day.$3
Listening to Caroline talk about herself and Pierre reminds me of us. You and I are a team, too, sweetie.$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Jodi: The furniture in here is so comfortable.$1#$b#I can't believe how much this place has changed from that old trodden-down wreck into a place everyone can come together and enjoy themselves.$0
It's good to see Kent socializing with people in town. I get worried when we're the only ones he sees.$0
Olivia always looks so stylish.. It makes me feel positively frumpy.$0
I wonder if Kent and I could open a place together someday? Maybe when Vincent is older.$0#$b#I wouldn't mind converting the house into a cute little bed and breakfast...$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Kent: You're an adventurer, right? Give it to me straight: do I have what it takes?$0
Can't even imagine how much time and money went into fixing this place up. You deserve to relax and enjoy the celebrations.$1
We have this every month, huh? It's kind of reassuring.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Sam: Wonder if I could convince the Mayor to let us play a gig at this thing next time.$0#$b#Some music could be just what a festival like this needs to get people really into it.$1
Vincent and I walked over here together. He's growing up really fast. My big brother duties are about to get way harder, I bet.$0
Is it cheating in the race if I ride my skateboard?$1
I'm not looking forward to the cold walk home from here.$2

Entries.CommunityDay_Sam_Married: If the Mayor lets us play a gig here next time, will you stand up front and dance?$0
We should invite Vincent over to the farm soon.$0#$b#I wanna make sure he knows that even if I'm starting my own family, I'm still his big brother.$1
Can you watch my stuff while I go lose this race? ...Better yet, can you tell Alex I'm not allowed to go?$0
It's gonna be a cold walk home, but you'll hold my hand to keep me warm, right?$4

Entries.CommunityDay_Abigail: Mom and dad sorta dragged me here, but I'm glad they did.$0
Hey there. Got any Quartz on you? I'm feeling kind of peckish. *giggles*$1
Alex has so much energy... I don't know where it all comes from, but I hate losing.$3#$b#So I'm gonna win this race!$0

Have you been down in the mines recently? Winter might be the perfect time for me to sneak away and try my luck adventuring there.$0#$b#Might go next time I'm supposed to be doing the shop's inventory. Hmm...$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Abigail_Married: Oh, hey, you. I'm just telling the story about the time I stole Sebastian's bike out from right under his nose!$1
Hey there, sweetie. Did you bring any Quartz with you? You know how hungry I get after the walk from the farm. *giggles*$4
I need you to understand something... There is absolutely no way I'm going to let Alex challenge me uncontested.$0#$b#So you better cheer me on in this race!$1
I get so bored in the winter. If you aren't careful, I'm going to sneak off and follow you on whatever adventures you get up to!$0

Entries.CommunityDay_Caroline: Pierre would never show it, but he's tremendously excited to have everyone so invested in being part of a community again.$0
When I was pregnant with Abigail, I used to come here when I needed some time to myself.$0#$b#Funny to see this place full of people, instead of being a place to run and hide.$0
I finally got all my plants moved into my sunroom for winter. They cheer me up when it's grey outside.$0

You might think there's less to do because the shop is slow in the winter, but Pierre puts the whole family to work getting ready for the explosion of business in the spring.$0#$b#Inventory, cleaning, ideas for new stock for the upcoming year...it's a labor of love.$0

Entries.22: 700 SeedShop 39 5 0/900 SeedShop 37 6 3/1000 SeedShop 20 5 1/1130 SeedShop 6 24 0/1230 CommunityCenter 31 15 0 "Strings\schedules\Pierre:CommunityDay_Pierre"/1810 CommunityCenter 24 11 0 "Strings\schedules\Pierre:CommunityDay_Pierre"/1900 SeedShop 23 4 1 pierre_sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Pierre: I might hand out some free samples of seeds at the next Community Day. Keep the spirit of growth in the Valley strong!$1
I feel like I'm missing something in this conversation...$2

I might ask Caroline to go for a stroll with me around town after this. I'm trying to rekindle our spark.$0#$b#Between difficulties with Abigail and running the store, there's been a strain put on us.$0
Abigail keeps disappearing for long stretches of time...$2#$b#You'd tell me if she was getting herself into trouble, right?$4

Entries.22: 720 ElliottHouse 1 5 0/840 Beach 49 19 2/1010 Beach 36 15 3/1050 CommunityCenter 24 17 2 elliott_read "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott"/1600 CommunityCenter 23 18 3 "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott"/1650 CommunityCenter 24 17 2 elliott_read "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott"/1900 ElliottHouse 1 5 0

Entries.CommunityDay_Elliott: Ahh...How wonderful it is to see everyone coming together.$0#$b#Maybe my next short story should tell the tale of a small town, and how everyone's lives become interwoven in communities like this.$1
Life by the ocean is beautiful, but solitary.$0#$b#It's nice to be surrounded by people's chatter instead of the sound of the waves meeting the shore, once in a while.$1

To be a good writer, it's important to read just as much as you write.$0#$b#And to take the opportunity at events like this to observe people - listen to how they talk, what they care about, what drives them...$1#$b#You have to be a great student of the human mind.$0
Hmm... I wonder if Victor's read any of my work? I should ask him sometime.$0#$b#...It might be vain to say, but if he has, I hope he liked it.$0

Entries.marriage_Mon: 1030 CommunityCenter 24 17 2 elliott_read "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott_Married"/1600 CommunityCenter 23 18 3 "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott_Married"/1650 CommunityCenter 24 17 2 elliott_read "Strings\schedules\Elliott:CommunityDay_Elliott_Married"/1900 BusStop -1 23 3

Entries.CommunityDay_Elliott_Married: Would it be terribly self-centered if the next thing I write is about our life together?$1#$b#I feel like we make too many stories together to keep to ourselves.$0
Being here around everyone reminds me.. Living by the ocean was an inspirational time in my life, but it was really very lonely.$0#$b#Now that I have you, I never have to feel that way.$4
I love how I can look at you and know exactly what you're thinking, no matter where we are.$0
How well do you know Victor? ..No, I'm not jealous! I was just wondering if you could introduce us.$0#$b#It's silly, but I feel like we might be kindred spirits.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Willy: Did you catch all the fish in that tank? Impressive anglin'.$1
Angling been going well for you lately? Been chasing pufferfish this summer, myself. Right people will pay a mint for 'em.$1
Nice to see people using the ole bulletin board again.$0#$b#Might post a sale on bait up there, see if I get any bites.$1
Nice to see the whole community come together to make this day happen.$0#$b#I contributed a few fish to the pot to make sure everyone gets fed.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Leah: Hmm... I think I saw a bear wandering around Cindersap Forest the other day. Wonder if he'd pose for a sculpture?$7
I've never tried squeezing juice before, but the prospect of some nice fresh melon juice on a hot summer's day is too good to pass up.$1
I had a new idea for a sculpture, but it's a little experimental. Don't be too hard on me when I finally show you!$0
Winter is just the perfect season for festivals in a small town.$0#$b#Being in here by the fire all cozy with friends and family is a perfect way to wrap up the year.$3

Entries.CommunityDay_Leah_Married: I'm going to need you to sit for another sculpture soon. I promise this one won't be as abstract as the last one!$0
Susan's going to give me some fresh melons! I'll squeeze some juice for us with our breakfast.$1
It's cute that I have a date for every festival like this one now. I'm glad we get to experience them together.$0
You've always been so supportive of my art, from the moment we met. It's one of the reasons I love you.$4

Entries.CommunityDay_Andy: Gotta say... didn't know if a 'Community Day' would be my cup o' tea, but I'm enjoyin' it just fine.$3
Startin' to think Gus is a dang fool if he can't see a great opportunity when it's sittin' plain as day in front of his face.$2
The way Susan talks about her farm makes me wanna rethink the way I do things.$0#$b#Been so focused on profit an' productivity, don't always stop to care the way she does.$2
I got a feelin' the strawberry crop next spring is gonna be a real great one.$1

Entries.22: 650 Custom_SusanHouse 24 15 0/740 Custom_SusanHouse 26 15 0/820 Custom_SusanHouse 3 19 0 Susan_Craft/1010 CommunityCenter 36 18 1 Susan_Farm1 "Strings\schedules\Susan:CommunityDay_Susan"/1240 CommunityCenter 37 16 2 Susan_Farm2 "Strings\schedules\Susan:CommunityDay_Susan"/1410 CommunityCenter 42 16 2 Susan_Farm2 "Strings\schedules\Susan:CommunityDay_Susan"/1530 CommunityCenter 46 13 0 "Strings\schedules\Susan:CommunityDay_Susan"/1740 Custom_SusanHouse 24 6 1 Susan_Sleep

Entries.CommunityDay_Susan: Once these little sprouts I started in here are strong enough, I'll plant them in the community garden.$0
Are you growing melons this season? I just promised Leah a few from my next batch - I think she'll really enjoy them!$0
During the fall, I get so antsy when I step away from the farm.$4#$b#So many crops in the ground, and so close to the time for frost! I'm worried about my babies.$0

I get a little lonely in the winter, when everything's so dark and dreary. I know the world's just sleeping, but the nights seem so long...$2#$b#This event has revitalized me a little.$0#$b#Thank you for helping to make it happen.$1

Entries.22: 730 AdventureGuild 6 16 2/800 CommunityCenter 54 13 2 Marlon_Sneaky "Strings\schedules\Marlon:CommunityDay_MarlonFay"/1320 CommunityCenter 54 13 2 Marlon_Look "Strings\schedules\Marlon:CommunityDay_MarlonFay"/1830 CommunityCenter 50 12 2 "Strings\schedules\Marlon:CommunityDay_MarlonFay"/1930 Custom_AdventurerSummit 33 22 2 Marlon_Sneaky

Entries.CommunityDay_MarlonFay: Kent's thinking about taking up adventuring.$0

I always feel a little out of place at these events. But communities like this are what we fight to protect.#$b#It's important to see that joy we fight for, even if I'm not really fully a part of it.$0
Winter is coming... when you get old enough, you'll be able to feel it in your bones, too.$0
Been staying safe? Courage doesn't get diminished by being careful, you know.$0

Entries.22: 0 Custom_Claire_WarpRoom 3 3 2/1130 CommunityCenter 25 11 0 "Strings\schedules\Claire:CommunityDay_Claire"/1710 BusStop 12 8 0/1900 Custom_DayEnd_WarpRoom 2 2 0

Entries.CommunityDay_Claire: It was so nice of the Mayor to invite me to this event... we never get days like this in the country.$1
It's sad that Martin has to work while we're all here celebrating.$2#$b#Maybe I'll try to sneak him something to eat.$1
I wonder if the Mayor would be open to having more dancing at events?$1#$b#The Flower Dance is nice, but so traditional, and only once a year.$1
The way Caroline and Pierre run the shop is so different from the way things work at Joja... It's much more personal. I really like it.$1

Entries.CommunityDay_Claire_Married: It's so nice that we have these events to look forward to at the end of every month now.$1#$b#All thanks to you! What a wonderful way to feel more like part of the community..$5
Do you mind if we box up some food and bring it to Martin before we head home to the farm? I want him to get at least a little of the fun.$1
Do you want to dance? ...I know no one else is, but who cares? We could start a trend.$1
Do you think maybe we could ever open our own store together someday, like Caroline and Pierre?$1#$b#We could sell your farm's produce. Or whatever we wanted!$5

Entries.1000018_TalkToMe: pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1200/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 800/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#It's Kent...$2#$b#I love him and I'm so glad he's finally home but...$2"/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1100/speak Jodi "Ever since he got back, he just... he hasn't been the same person.$2#$b#He never laughs anymore. He won't talk to me. He practically ignores Vincent and Sam. He hardly eats any food. We haven't had-$2"/pause 200/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Jodi 12/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 450/speak Jodi "He's opened up a little about some of the horrors he experienced. The things he's seen. The friends he lost. What he went through when he was captured...$2#$b#Yesterday, Vincent was watching a cartoon and he accidently pushed a button on the remote and made the TV go static.$2#$b#Kent immediately fell to the floor and put his hands over his head...$2#$b#Later, he told me that at his base, the TV screens would go to static right before an alarm sounded. When they heard it, everyone knew they had to take cover.$2"/pause 200/emote Jodi 28/pause 200/speak Jodi "Harvey gave him some medicine that should help with the symptoms of PTSD.$2#$b#I can't tell if it's made a difference.$2"/pause 600/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "*sniff*..."/shake Jodi 1000/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 700/speak Jodi "He's hurting so much, and I don't know how to help him, @. I feel helpless...$2"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event1#Kent needs you now more than ever.#$r -1 0 jodi_event2#You might want to look for a therapist in Zuzu or Pine-Mesa City."/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 1000/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Jodi "...$2#$b#I'm sorry, @. I had all of that bottled up, and I might have said too much.$2#$b#Thank you for listening to me. You, Olivia, and Caroline are my closest friends, and you're always there for me$2."/pause 1500/speak Jodi "I hope one day I can be there for you, too.$0"/pause 500/speak Jodi "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 jodi_event3#If you ever need anything, don't hesitate to ask.#$r -1 0 jodi_event4#With a combined effort, there's nothing you two can't accomplish."/pause 1700/move Jodi 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Jodi "I'll follow the advice you gave me.$1"/pause 750/move Jodi 0 0 0/pause 550/speak Jodi "I need to finish watering these flowers, okay? I'll talk to you later. Thank you again.$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Jodi "Thank you for talking to me earlier, @. I know what to do to help Kent. I think things will be better soon.$0"

I've said too much. I know we're close friends, but...$2"/pause 800/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Caroline "...$2#$b#@, can you keep a secret? Can I trust you?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#You can trust me.#That will depend on what you tell me."/fork 1000013_KeepSecret/pause 650/emote Caroline 12/pause 1400/speak Caroline "...Well, you have yourself a nice evening, @. It's late. You should be getting back to your farm.$2"/friendship Caroline -100/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Caroline "Please don't tell Pierre or Abigail I was visiting the wizard late at night, @.$2"
Entries.1000013_KeepSecret: pause 700/speak Caroline "Thank you, @.$0"/pause 600/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 900/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "First, you need to understand Pierre and I have a complicated relationship, but I love him, and I always will.$2#$b#We got together when we were very young. Not long into our relationship, I caught Pierre fooling around with a girl in Grampleton.$2#$b#I was devastated when I found out. My naive self thought the appropriate response was to... get involved with someone else to get back at him.$2#$b#That other person...$2"/pause 1250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Caroline "That other person was Magnus Rasmodius...$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Caroline "Pierre and I had some horrible fights and... broke up. We got back together after a couple months.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1100/speak Caroline "Soon after that, I found out I was pregnant. I... I didn't know if it was Magnus' or Pierre's.$2#$b#I never told Pierre I saw someone else, so he had no reason to suspect Abigail wasn't his.$2"/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 900/speak Caroline "Ever since Abigail dyed her hair purple several years ago, it's never faded. I thought that was very strange...$2#$b#Now my daughter is seeing magical creatures in the forest and taking an interest in fighting monsters...$2#$b#There's only one explanation. Abigail isn't my husband's daughter. Rasomodius is her father.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 550/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I hadn't spoken to Magnus in so many years. What we had was a long, long time ago. He was surprised to find me at his doorstep.$2#$b#I told him about Abigail, and that she's his daughter. He said he had a feeling one of the residents here in Stardew Valley was his child.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 0/pause 250/emote Caroline 28/pause 1200/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Caroline "I... I cried so much. I felt horrible he was just now finding out he was a father.$2#$b#He brewed me some kind of potion to calm me down and explained what Junimos were, and why she is able to see them.$2#$b#He comforted me and gave me some advice.$2"/pause 1500/speak Caroline "...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "I still don't know what I'm going to tell Pierre, or if I should tell him anything at all. And then there's Abigail...$2#$b#Magnus told me it's up to me to decide if she should know.$2#$b#I appreciate he isn't forcing me to say anything, or demanding I let him have a relationship with her. I... I feel horrible and guilty.$2"/pause 2250/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 3000/speak Caroline "I will tell my family, but not now. In the meantime, you MUST not tell anyone about this, @. Please...$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#I'm sorry you're going through all of this.#I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail - they have a right to know."/fork 1000013_SwearGranpaGrave/pause 500/move Caroline 0 0 3/shake Caroline 9999999/emote Caroline 12/speak Caroline "!!!$3#$b#I TRUSTED YOU! YOU ARE THE WORST!$3"/emote farmer 28/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Caroline -2500/end dialogue Caroline "I see you haven't told Pierre and Abigail yet, so what are you waiting for exactly, @?$3#$e#%Caroline is ignoring you."
Entries.1000013_SwearGranpaGrave: pause 750/speak Caroline "...Thank you.$2"/pause 1500/move Caroline 0 0 3/pause 750/speak Caroline "I... I know that's a lot to take in. Thanks for promising to keep this a secret.$2#$b#When the right time comes, I'll tell Abigail Magnus is her father. As for my husband...$2"/pause 2000/emote Caroline 28/emote farmer 60/pause 650/speak Caroline "I don't know what his reaction will be. It's going to be devasting for Pierre when I tell him Abigail isn't his biological daughter.$2#$b#He might even leave us...$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "...$2#$b#I'm...$2#$b#I'm happy I have a good friend like you I can talk to during times like this.$2"/pause 1500/emote Caroline 24/pause 1000/speak Caroline "I'm going to go home and go to sleep. I'm emotionally exhausted...$2"/pause 500/move Caroline 9 0 1 true/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Caroline "Hi, @. Umm... hopefully you have a moment?$0#$b#I just wanted to say I appreciate the conversation we had about Abigail.$2#$b#I need to think about what I'm going to tell Pierre and Abigail...$2#$b#I'm terrified it's not going to go well...$2"

Entries.1000020/z winter/f Gus 500/w sunny/t 600: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 18 50 1 Gus 25 55 2/skippable/pause 500/viewport 24 55 clamp true/pause 250/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 350/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 0 5 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 16/pause 500/speak Gus "Ah, hello, @!$0"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Gus "The view of the Gem Sea is mighty incredible from this height!$1"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "So, what brings you to Blue Moon Vineyard?$0"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event1#I came by to see if Sophia was here.#$r -1 0 gus_event2#I'm on my way to the beach.#$r -1 0 gus_event3#Why are you up here?"/pause 1000/speak Gus "I bought five cases of premium iridium-quality wine from Sophia.$1#$b#The saloon only had one bottle left. I thought it'd be a good idea to restock.$0"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Gus "Blue Moon Vineyard is one of the largest vineyards in the Ferngill Republic. It was first established many years ago, and has always had a great reputation.$1"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#I don't know that much about the Vineyard.#That's interesting. Good luck with your errands."/fork 1000020_Mystery/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Gus "Thank you, @! Have a great day. Stop by and try a glass of this vintage sometime!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end
Entries.1000020_Mystery: pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/emote Gus 40/pause 300/speak Gus "Hmm... that's right. You don't know.$2"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 600/speak Gus "Something very tragic happened to Sophia's parents. I was close to them. They were good people.$3#$b#Sophia inherited the Vineyard, and she's been doing a great job. It's a lot of work for one person, though.$3#$b#She doesn't show up in town very often. Not since her parents were...$2"/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 400/emote Gus 28/pause 850/question fork1 "#What happened to Sophia's parents?#Sorry, Gus. I didn't mean to bring up bad memories."/fork 1000020_SophiasParents/pause 500/speak Gus "That's okay, @.#$b#I need to go stock the saloon for tonight...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem out of it, @.$2#$b#I've been thinking about Sophia and her parents lately.$2"
Entries.1000020_SophiasParents: pause 1000/speak Gus "Sophia's parents were...$2"/pause 650/playMusic echos/pause 1250/speak Gus "They were killed in a terrible car accident...$2#$b#It happened on I-63Z, south of Zuzu City. You may have heard about it on the news. A number of people were hurt and killed.$2#$b#A Joja cargo truck caused the crash. It was overloaded with a shipment that well exceeded the weight limit the truck could handle.$2"/pause 300/emote Gus 28/pause 150/speak Gus "Sophia was devastated when she heard the news...$2#$b#Stardew Valley is a small community. Robert and Alice's deaths impacted everyone. We all comforted Sophia as best we could.$2#$b#I did everything I could to help her. I've known her since she was a child.$3"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 400/speak Gus "Sophia is a little younger than you, but she's one of the strongest people I know.$3#$b#I'm pretty sure she gets that from her mother.$3"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event4#That's a lot to take in.#$r -1 0 gus_event5#It was all because of Joja's negligence."/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1250/speak Gus "@, if you see Sophia, don't tell her I told you about her parents.$3#$b#As you can imagine... it's a touchy subject for her.$2"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "I need to get back to the Saloon to prepare some things before opening for the day.$3#$b#Drop by later if you want to.$3"/pause 1250/faceDirection Gus 1 true/pause 500/emote Gus 28/pause 200/move Gus 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail GusSophia/pause 700/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem a bit out of it, @.$2#$b#I've just... been thinking about Sophia and her parents lately.$2"

Entries.1000019/f Dwarf 2500/w sunny/z spring/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 69 12 1 Dwarf 80 9 1/skippable/pause 1000/viewport 77 10 true/pause 250/move farmer 9 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 250/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1800/speak Dwarf "The stars shine brightly tonight.#$b#They remind me of the luminous caves of Vataku, where a full moon brings with it the glow of a thousand moon stones."/pause 500/question fork0 "#What's Vataku?#Is that place your home?"/fork 1000019_Venture/switchEvent 1000019_Venture
Entries.1000019_Venture: pause 1000/speak Dwarf "..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Yes. Vataku was my home. It's a long forgotten mine founded by my people - a large cave network that resides underneath the Cascadian Mountains.#$b#I hope to visit the mines again someday. I have many memories of my friends and family attached to those mines."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 650/speak Dwarf "Less chance of a human discovering me if I leave the cave at night...#$b#Humans destroy what they don't understand."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "But you aren't like other humans. I'm happy to call you 'friend'."/pause 900/speak Dwarf "Your kind does frighten me though. They are more threatening than the Shadow People.#$b#I hold my grudges against them, but the trouble they cause is nothing compared to the destructive potential of humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 dwarf_event1#Why do humans frighten you?#$r -1 0 dwarf_event2#Why do you feel that way about humans?"/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 1/pause 600/speak Dwarf "Human technology is terrifying."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "Your race has devices that shoot tiny projectiles at lightning fast speeds, flying machines that spit fire...#$b#Indestructible moving metal boxes with horrifying weapons, and bombs that level cities in an instant."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Dwarf "Human technology is reaching a critical point where your race may be unable to fully control it.#$b#You use your gift of pattern recognition to create weapons of death. I fear these very weapons will end in the eradication of your race, just like the Elves.#$b#The Elves wiped themselves off the face of the world many hundreds of years ago. Their power, too, grew too great for them to control..."/pause 1000/move Dwarf -1 0 3/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "I see many similarities between Elves and humans."/pause 1000/speak Dwarf "With great power comes great responsibility."/pause 700/emote Dwarf 40/pause 300/speak Dwarf "But not all hope is forgotten. There are many humans who are like you, @.#$b#I have faith that the new generation of humans being born into this world will be wiser, kinder, and gentler than those who came before."/pause 1000/move Dwarf 0 0 2/pause 1000/emote Dwarf 40/pause 1400/move Dwarf 0 0 3/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 dwarf_event3#There is also a lot of good in us.#$r -1 0 dwarf_event4#I don't agree. You're misunderstanding us."/pause 1300/move Dwarf 1 0 1/pause 1500/speak Dwarf "I wish to watch the stars for a little longer before returning to my cave.#$b#You must be cold from standing out here for so long. You should return home."/pause 1200/speak Dwarf "Farwell, @."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end

Entries.1000005_EverythingOkay: pause 1300/stopAnimation Sebastian/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Look... I have a lot on my mind right now. I just wanted to be alone to think outside.$0"/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 0/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "But maybe... I guess talking to someone might help.$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#You can talk to me.#Go find Sam or Abigail."/fork 1000005_Friends/pause 500/emote Sebastian 12/pause 250/speak Sebastian "Okay, so you can leave...$5"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Sebastian -150/end dialogue Sebastian "Abigail and I had a little chat. It was just what I needed.$1"
Entries.1000005_Friends: pause 900/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1200/speak Sebastian "I had a... horrible nightmare last night about my dad. Not Demetrius. My biological father.$2#$b#I try to not think about him at all. It only brings back bad memories.$2#$b#There's a reason my mom divorced him.$2"/pause 1000/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Sebastian "He was abusive, a drunk, and a gambler. Whenever he lost money, he'd take it out on Mom and me...$2#$b#Took all her savings and gambled it away. He even stole my paychecks from the part time job I had before I started doing web design.$2"/pause 1500/speak Sebastian "My father would never take no for an answer...$2"/pause 1500/move Sebastian 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "Eventually, mom had enough. She was sick and tired of him stealing everything from us, so she hid our money. He...$0#$b#He didn't like that...$2"/pause 1500/emote Sebastian 28/pause 2000/move Sebastian 0 0 2/pause 250/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 1300/speak Sebastian "We'll never see him again. Good riddance.$0"/pause 1300/emote Sebastian 40/pause 1600/speak Sebastian "I... I don't know why I'm telling this. I haven't told anyone about my dad, not even Maru.$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "...$2"/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "But you know what? I feel like a 20-ton weight has been lifted off my chest and I can breathe again.$0#$b#I've been feeling awful about this for a long time.$2"/pause 500/move Sebastian 0 0 3/pause 600/question fork1 "#You've gone through so much in life...#I listened to most of what you were saying."/fork 1000005_Promise/pause 400/stopMusic/pause 400/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "...Get away from me, @. You're unbelievable.$5"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Sebastian -750/end dialogue Sebastian "...$5#$e#%Sebastian is ignoring you."
Entries.1000005_Promise: pause 750/speak Sebastian "...$1"/friendship Sebastian 100/pause 500/speak Sebastian "Gonna ponder for a little longer. Still a lot I need to process.$2#$b#...Thanks for talking to me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end dialogue Sebastian "You know... what I told you was something I thought I'd take to the grave.$2#$b#You need to keep what I told you a secret.$0#$e#%Sebastian smiles. You sense he's more trusting of you."

Entries.1000001/f Alex 1750/k 911526/e 2481135/z: winter_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 29 55 0 Alex 29 46 0/pause 550/skippable/viewport 29 48 clamp true/pause 500/move farmer 0 -6 0/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 2 true/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey there. Didn't expect to run into anyone.$1#$b#I come here to use the gym. They have better equipment than I have in my room!#$b#Not to mention there's a sauna to relax after a tough workout!$0"/pause 700/move Alex 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Alex "Remember when the entrance to this place was blocked off?$5"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 500/speak Alex "Joja was moving large crates off a train and a truck slammed into the rocks, causing the rockslide.$2#$b#Joja sure did take their time fixing their mistake. Susan was isolated from Pelican Town for months and no one could get to her.$5"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 450/speak Alex "You may have heard a huge blast that almost felt like an earthquake pretty soon after you moved here.$2#$b#That was Joja using dynamite to blow up the rocks...$5"/pause 1000/pause 700/speak Alex "Anyway.$0"/speak Alex "$q -1 null#Why are you at the railroad?#$r -1 0 alex_event1#I wanted to use the sauna.#$r -1 0 alex_event2#I wanted to say hi to Susan.#$r -1 0 alex_event3#I'm hiking up to the summit!"/pause 1300/faceDirection Alex 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 0 true/pause 500/emote Alex 28/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Alex "You know... I didn't always work out every day.$2"/pause 700/faceDirection Alex 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Alex 2 true/pause 400/playMusic desolate/pause 600/showFrame Alex 27/pause 700/speak Alex "I told you I lived with my father when I was younger. The living conditions were... harsh.$2"/pause 650/shake Alex 500/pause 900/speak Alex "I used food to cope. At one point, I was eating over 4,000 calories a day. I was considered... obese.$2#$b#I knew what I was doing wasn't healthy. I would keep telling myself 'tomorrow is the day' or 'I'll work on it'. I'd exercise for a few days and just... give up.$5#$b#Days turned into weeks. Weeks turned into months. It was all talk, no action.$2"/pause 600/showFrame Alex 0/pause 500/speak Alex "Then one day, I finally had enough. I realized my dreams would never come true unless I took control of my own destiny. So I forced myself into a routine.$0#$b#It was really tough at first, but after a while, I started seeing results that made me want to keep pushing myself.$0#$b#I used to not be able to do a single pull up. Now? I can do thirty in a row.$1"/pause 800/speak Alex "You should chase your dreams too, no matter how much work it'll take, or how distant the goal is.#$b#You transformed an overgrown dump into a beautiful farm. That's huge, and I'm jealous of how much you've accomplished.$0"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Alex "Heh, sorry. I tend to rant about things sometimes.$1"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#It was a lot of work. You've achieved a lot too.#You talk about yourself too much."/fork 1000001_Inspiring/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/emote Alex 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh... Sorry, @. Uh... well, I'll see you around...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex -500/end dialogue Alex "...Sorry about my rant earlier.$2"
Entries.1000001_Inspiring: pause 300/speak Alex "Thanks, @! I appreciate it. You've become a good friend - I knew I could trust you to listen.$1#$b#I'll let you get back to your day. See you around!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Alex 50/end dialogue Alex "Hey. Thanks for hearing me out up there.$1#$e#If you want to spot each other, we could do that sometime.$1"

Entries.1000014/t 1000 1600/f Clint 2000/w sunny: playful/-500 -500/farmer 92 90 0 Clint 94 77 0 Penny 102 68 1/showFrame Penny 18/pause 700/viewport 99 77 true/pause 250/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -4 1/playSound clank/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound hammer/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/move farmer 3 0 1/playSound clank/move farmer 2 0 1/playSound clank/move farmer 4 0 0/playSound clank/textAboveHead Clint "Hmmmpff!!"/move farmer 0 -4 0/playSound clank/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -2 0 3/playSound clank/pause 700/textAboveHead Clint "Ah! Hello there."/pause 1000/playSound hammer/pause 550/playSound clank/pause 2000/move Clint 4 0 1/pause 500/speak Clint "Phew! I'm finishing up an iridium-infused sword for a monster hunter from Castle Village. You might have heard of him. He goes by the name 'SCYTHER'.$1#$b#Castle Village is home to the best monster slayers and artisans in the region!$1#$b#I have contracts with various guilds in the Ferngill Republic to provide custom crafted weapons, shields, and armor.$0"/pause 1000/move Clint 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Clint "It's not much, but it's honest work.$0"/pause 1000/move Clint 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Clint "Right now, I'm not getting any orders from the Adventurers Guild here in Stardew Valley.$0#$b#When there were more members, there was a steady demand for new weapons. The guild used to be a lot bigger, but they've lost some good people over the years.$2#$b#The summit has gotten crowded...$2"/stopMusic/pause 1500/speak Clint "Sorry, @. I didn't mean to bring that up, especially with you being a Guild member and all...$2"/pause 800/speak Clint "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 clint_event1#We all accepted the risks when we joined.#$r -1 0 clint_event2#I didn't know any of them.#$r -1 0 clint_event3#I've visited their graves and paid my respects."/pause 1000/speak Clint "@, you've made excellent strides in protecting the valley from monsters, while also building up an impressive farm. I envy that.$0#$b#I'm not brave enough to fight monsters...$2#$b#But I do what I can to ensure the safety of those who do. That's why I pride myself on my smithing work.$0"/pause 1100/move Clint 0 0 3/pause 1100/move Clint 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Clint "...I know I'm a bit awkward sometimes, @. But thanks for stopping by.$0#$b#I need to get back to finishing this sword. I'll see you next time you drop by, or maybe at the saloon!"/pause 1200/move Clint -4 0 3 true/pause 150/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Clint "Hey, @.#$e#Err. Keep up the good work, adventurer.$1"

Entries.1000015/m 60000/w sunny/z winter/z fall/: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 19 39 0 Demetrius 27 29 0 Jodi 21 24 1 Caroline 23 24 3 Penny 47 33 2/skippable/showFrame Penny 18/pause 600/viewport 26 29 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Demetrius "The fountain is stunning today."/move farmer 0 -10 1/move farmer 1 0 1/emote farmer 8/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 300/textAboveHead Demetrius "Hello!"/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "Hi, @!$1#$b#The weather is astonishing, wouldn't you say?$0"/pause 800/move Demetrius 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Demetrius "Did you know this fountain is thirty years old?$0#$b#It's maintained and repaired by a technician from Grampleton.$1"/pause 500/move Demetrius 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "Are you making progress cultivating your farm?$1#$b#I haven't visited it since you allowed me to set up my experiment in the cave, which I'm still thankful for!$0"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 demetrius_event1#Robin constructed buildings on my farm!#$r -1 0 demetrius_event2#I'm looking into crafting sprinklers to automate watering.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event3#I've been focusing on honing my combat skills and fishing."/pause 1100/speak Demetrius "Glad you're doing fine here in Stardew Valley. Owning a farm is a lot of work and may be overwhelming at times.$0"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "Speaking of Stardew Valley...$0"/pause 200/speak Demetrius "$q -1 null#Do you know where our valley gets its name?#$r -1 0 demetrius_event4#Does our valley get its name from space stuff?#$r -1 0 demetrius_event5#Because star... dew? Something? I don't know.#$r -1 0 demetrius_event6#Where does the name come from?"/pause 800/speak Demetrius "A thousand years ago, a huge meteor shower periodically bombarded this specific area of the Ferngill Republic.$0#$b#Of course, back then, the Republic didn't exist yet.$3#$b#The meteors were so plentiful that their trails looked like fibers stretched across the sky.$0#$b#The meteorites looked like tiny drops on the trails, like morning dew on a spiderweb. So our ancestors called these showers the 'Silk Dew of The Stars'.$0#$b#When the Ferngill Republic was first established 150 years ago, the Admission Union named this valley 'Stardew' in honor of our ancestors.$0#$b#Have you ever wondered why your crops are always healthy? Or why they so easily bear high-quality produce?$0#$b#That's because of the meteor shower! The soil in the valley is extremely fertile. It has an abundance of nutrients such as nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium!$1#$b#There's also a high concentration of minerals present in the soil, including zinc, manganese, boron, iron, sulfur, cobalt, copper, magnesium and so on.$0#$b#You can grow just about anything with ease thanks to the fertile soil. It's the reason so many farmers have established their livelihood in Stardew Valley!$1"/pause 100/emote Demetrius 32/pause 100/question fork0 "#I learned something new! Thanks!#You talk way too much."/fork 1000015_InformativeConversation/stopMusic/pause 500/emote Demetrius 28/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "I apologize, @. It wasn't my intention to ramble like that...$2#$b#I get excited when presented the opportunity to teach someone new things.$2"/pause 700/emote Demetrius 28/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "Well... it's always a pleasure talking to you, @.$2"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Demetrius -375/end dialogue Demetrius "I'm sorry I took up so much of your day at the fountain, @. That won't happen again.$2#$e#%Demetrius looks sad."
Entries.1000015_InformativeConversation: pause 750/speak Demetrius "I'm happy you know more about the valley and where you live!$1#$b#The combined effects of science and history have made Stardew Valley a fascinating place!$1"/pause 200/emote Demetrius 16/speak Demetrius "Oh, look at the time! I didn't mean to keep you so long!$6#$b#I'll let you get back to whatever errands you were running. Have a fantastic day, @!$1"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Demetrius 50/end dialogue Demetrius "I hope our conversation about the valley was informative for you!$1#$b#There are so many wonderous things to disover here.$0#$b#That's why this is where I do my research!$1"

Entries.1000016/f Evelyn 2500/y 2/z winter/z sum: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 29 68 2 Evelyn 34 79 0 Jodi 25 73 3 Olivia 24 72 2 Caroline 23 73 1 Penny 44 77 2/showFrame Penny 34/positionOffset Penny -7 15/pause 300/skippable/viewport 33 79 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Evelyn "What a charming pumpkin!"/move farmer 0 8 2/textAboveHead Evelyn "Pierre outdid himself again!"/move farmer 0 3 1/pause 1150/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 500/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 200/emote Evelyn 16/pause 300/speak Evelyn "Hello, dear! It's wonderful to see you. How is your day?$1"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 evelyn_event1#I'm having a great day. And you?#$r -1 0 evelyn_event2#It's chilly today. I'm trying my best to stay warm.#$r -1 0 evelyn_event3#My day could be better."/pause 1000/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1500/emote Evelyn 28/speak Evelyn "Some pesky crows ruined one of our pumpkins this morning...$2#$b#Pierre was kind enough to give me a replacement.$1"/pause 800/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I passed %farm Farm recently on a morning walk. Your grandfather would be proud of how much progress you've made, @.$0"/pause 1200/speak Evelyn "...$2#$b#I wish Richard was still here. He was an absolute joy to have in the valley.$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead Jodi "How are you and Pierre?"/pause 700/speak Evelyn "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 evelyn_event4#Who is he?#$r -1 0 evelyn_event5#Richard sounds like a good person.#$r -1 0 evelyn_event6#...Richard?"/pause 1250/speak Evelyn "Richard is your grandfather, dear.$0"/pause 250/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Evelyn "You don't know much about him...$2#$b#If you want, I can tell you about Richard. We were close friends when he was living on the farm.$0"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I would love to know more about him.#Perhaps some other time."/fork 1000016_MoreAboutHim/pause 500/speak Evelyn "Of course, dear! Have a wonderful rest of your day.$0#$b#I need to go thank Pierre again for this pumpkin. It's perfect for this haystack.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end
Entries.1000016_MoreAboutHim: pause 650/speak Evelyn "Of course, dear! It would be my pleasure."/pause 1000/emote Evelyn 40/pause 300/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 600/speak Evelyn "Richard was charismatic. He had an exceptional amount of integrity, generosity, empathy, and humility. In many ways, you two are very similar.$1#$b#When Richard first moved to the valley, Pelican Town had just begun to attract residents, and most of the region wasn't developed yet.$0#$b#The land was cheap, so he was able to purchase a large plot of land, that became the farm you inherited.$1"/pause 500/emote Evelyn 40/pause 250/speak Evelyn "Richard never raised any animals. He focused on cultivation. His farm was one of the largest and most bountiful in the Ferngill Republic!$0#$b#When he obtained enough funds, he had a greenhouse constructed on the property.$1#$b#He was overjoyed when it was finally finished. I remember him bringing us handfuls of fresh strawberries and blueberries in the dead of winter.$1#$b#Richard always wanted us to share in his happiness.$0"/pause 700/emote farmer 32/pause 800/speak Evelyn "He met his wife, Amy, here and they had a wonderful child, Jeremy - your father, dear. They were such a lovely family.$1#$b#Richard retired, oh, when he was about sixty, and moved to Pine-Mesa City.$0#$b#He wanted to pass down his farm to your father, but Jeremy had other dreams and wanted to follow his own path.$2#$b#Richard never sold the property. He paid for the land every year and kept the deed.$0"/pause 500/speak Evelyn "With no one taking care of the farm, nature eventually reclaimed it. As you saw when you first arrived, it was completely abandoned.$2"/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I didn't understand why he held onto the land until you arrived, and then I realized he never stopped thinking about the farm as a piece of his family.$1"/pause 1300/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "I'm glad you know more about Richard, dear. I understand you were just a child when he passed away.$0#$b#He was a remarkable person, and I see so much of him in you.$1"/pause 300/emote Evelyn 20/pause 1000/move Evelyn 0 0 0/pause 1200/speak Evelyn "I need to walk over to Pierre's to thank him again for this pumpkin. It's perfect for this haystack.$1"/pause 650/move Evelyn 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Evelyn "Enjoy the rest of your day, sweetie.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Evelyn "Your grandpa would truly be proud of your accomplishments.$0#$b#It brings me joy that you've brought his farm back to life after all these years.$1"

Entries.1000017/f George 2000/y 2/t 1200 1400/d: none/-500 -500/farmer 31 21 1 George 37 18 0/pause 500/viewport 42 18 true/pause 250/skippable/textAboveHead George "Yoba... please.."/move farmer 4 0 0/pause 700/emote farmer 8/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 1/pause 1600/speak George "Hi, @. You caught me in the middle of praying.$0#$b#I don't normally get this close to the altar... but I've had a bad day and I need some guidance.$2"/pause 500/question fork0 "#Say nothing#I'll leave you to your prayers."/fork 1000017_EverythingOkay/pause 500/speak George "...$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue George "*sigh*...I need Yoba's guidance in these times.$2#$e#%George looks sad."
Entries.1000017_EverythingOkay: pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1400/speak George "...I got bad news from Harvey.$2"/pause 800/move George 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic echos/pause 500/animate George false true 999999 16/pause 1500/speak George "I've had more pain than usual in the mornings, but I didn't think it was a big deal.$2#$b#Evelyn forced me to visit the clinic a few days ago. Harvey found cysts that are the result of... cancer.$2"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 1200/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 650/speak George "I told Evelyn and Alex. They didn't take the news too well...$2#$b#Evelyn said we'll find the best surgeon in the Ferngill Republic to remove them.$2#$b#Harvey also recommended some specialists in Zuzu City.$2"/pause 1500/speak George "To tell you the truth, I'm scared, @.$2#$b#In times like these, I can only find solace in praying to Yoba.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation George/pause 650/move George 0 0 0/pause 1300/speak George "Yoba has helped me before when I asked for it. I'm confident Yoba will lend me the power to get through this.$0"/pause 200/question fork1 "#You have friends and family here to support you.#Praying won't make it better."/fork 1000017_GetThroughThis/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 600/shake George 1000/emote George 28/pause 500/move George 0 0 3/pause 500/speak George "...Leave.$2#$b#Talking to you will surely not help.$2"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship George -1000/end dialogue George "Don't dictate what I should and shouldn't believe in, @.$0#$b#Especially when I just told you I'm very sick...$2"
Entries.1000017_GetThroughThis: pause 500/speak George "We both know I haven't always been friendly in the past, but kind words mean a lot to me right now.$0"/pause 1000/emote George 28/pause 1000/speak George "I'm going to pray for a little longer.$2#$b#I appreciate you stopping by and talking with me.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue George "I hate people pitying me, but I have no choice but to lean on friends and family now.$0"

Entries.1001234/y 1/z winter/z summer/z fall/t 8: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 3 13 1 Lewis 9 8 0 Linus 29 8 2 Sebastian 14 31 3 Sam 12 31 1/pause 300/viewport 15 9 clamp true/skippable/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 350/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 750/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 750/move Lewis 0 0 3/pause 350/speak Lewis "Good day, @.$0"/pause 450/move Lewis 0 0 0/pause 400/emote Lewis 28/pause 200/speak Lewis "*sigh*...Morris promised Joja would clear away this rockslide by now.$2#$b#Susan is trapped at home and can't get out except via train.$2#$b#Now he's telling me the cleanup operation is delayed until early summer. My hands are tied...$2"/pause 750/speak Lewis "As the mayor of Pelican Town, it's my duty to ensure everyone is safe.$0#$b#Morris and I will reach a resolution regarding the rockslide soon.$3#$b#I'm just relieved no one was hurt during the rockslide.$2"/pause 1000/speak Lewis "I must be on my way, @.$0#$b#Don't bother using your pickaxe to try to remove these rocks. Entries.1000036/t 600 700/w sunny/y 1/z winter/z: none/-500 -500/farmer 64 15 2 Lewis 64 16 0/skippable/pause 1000/speak Lewis "I was checking your shipping bin.$1#$b#Pierre and Sophia had a large number of products to ship this morning.$0"/pause 800/speak Lewis "@, I'm very happy you're getting situated here in Stardew Valley. Entries.1000025/f Linus 2500/z winter/z fall/y 3: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 57 32 0 Linus 64 21 2/pause 400/skippable/viewport 63 23 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 -4 0/textAboveHead Linus "Good morning!"/move farmer 0 -5 0/move Linus 0 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 1/pause 600/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 200/speak Linus "It's a pleasure to see you, @.$1#$b#How's your morning?$0"/speak Linus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 linus_event1#It's going well. How about yourself?#$r -1 0 linus_event2#I got some work done on my farm.#$r -1 0 linus_event3#I slept in and didn't do much."/pause 1500/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Linus "We've been good friends for a long time, @. I'm happy you moved to Stardew Valley.$1#$b#Your farm, along with the others here in the valley, have had a huge impact on our community.$0#$b#It reminds me of the old days when your grandpa was running %farm Farm.$1"/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 1100/emote Linus 40/pause 1050/speak Linus "I know so much about you, but you don't know much about me.$2#$b#I'm... protective of my past, but since we are such good friends...$2"/pause 750/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm open to telling you my story, @.$1"/pause 500/question fork0 "#I'd like to hear about where you come from.#No thanks. I don't need to know."/fork 1000025_HearYourPast/pause 1000/speak Linus "Oh. I see.$0#$b#That's fine, @. I thought I'd offer you my background because we've been friends for so long.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 2000/speak Linus "Well, I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#Goodbye, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end
Entries.1000025_HearYourPast: pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1750/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 750/emote Linus 40/pause 900/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 700/speak Linus "I moved into the valley some 30 years ago. I left everything I owned behind to connect with nature.$0#$b#My family was very wealthy. I was an only child. Money was never an issue and my parents gave me everything I ever wanted.$0#$b#I was... in a word, spoiled.$2"/pause 800/speak Linus "I mostly kept to myself. You could say I was an introvert. I didn't have anyone in my life I would consider a close friend.$0#$b#My parents... passed away when I was in my mid-twenties.$2"/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 300/speak Linus "I inherited their estate and their money. For a while, I used that money to travel around the world.$0#$b#I met so many wonderful people throughout my travels. I visited almost every major city you can think of, and many smaller places too.$1#$b#One of those places was Stardew Valley.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "There was... a magical feeling in the valley, as if it was calling to me.$0#$b#Of all the places I've been, only this one felt like home. I only expected to spend a week here...$1#$b#That week turned into months.$1#$b#The lush forests, mild weather, the sight of the mountains, the abundance of wild food to forage, the beauty of the shifting seasons...$1#$b#I knew I wanted to stay in the valley for the rest of my life.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I donated the rest of my inheritance to many different charities and orphanages.$0#$b#If memory serves correctly, I believe it was around 3,000,000g.$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 250/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Linus "I thought that money would be better suited to people who needed it. The valley gives me everything I need. Money meant nothing to me.$0#$b#I learned how to live off the land, and to appreciate everything the natural world has to offer that we sometimes take for granted.$1"/pause 400/emote Linus 40/pause 150/speak Linus "I know deep down that my parents would be happy too. The money they worked so hard to earn was used to better the lives of thousands of others.$0#$b#And me? I've never been happier in my life.$1"/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 500/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 2500/speak Linus "People are... quick to judge what they don't understand. Almost everyone thinks I'm a homeless bum.$2#$b#But you didn't assume that, @. You showed me compassion and kindness when we first met.$1"/pause 800/question fork1 "(I know what to say)#I never would have guessed you came from a rich family."/pause 1000/move Linus 0 0 3/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Linus "You never know who people truly are until you really get to know them.$1"/pause 650/emote farmer 32/pause 350/emote Linus 32/pause 1250/speak Linus "I need to go back to my tent and gut the fish I caught.$0#$b#It'll make for a good meal tonight.$1"/pause 1000/speak Linus "I'm happy we've become good friends over the years.$1#$b#I haven't told anyone about my past before.$0#$b#I trust you'll keep this between us.$1"/pause 1100/speak Linus "Take care, @.$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Linus "Thank you for being a good friend, @.$1#$b#I'm happy you know more about where I come from."

Entries.alex_event1: Nice! The sauna is relaxing this time of year.$1
Entries.alex_event2: I sometimes run into her when I come to use the gym and sauna. She's always productive and busy.$1
Entries.alex_event3: Awesome! That sounds like a heck of a leg day!$1

Entries.elliott_event2: Ah, I see! I hope your catch is bountiful!$1
Entries.elliott_event3: We've all had those days, @. Spend some time in the sun and perhaps it will bring your mood up.$2
Entries.elliott_event4: Fantastic! It'll surely be a splendid time.$1
Entries.elliott_event5: Not a problem, @! The sea life isn't for everyone. Perhaps later we can spend some quality time together on land.$1

Entries.harvey_event2: Well, you won't be disappointed. They're top quality, made with all organic ingredients.$1

Entries.sam_event1: Yeah, no kidding it is. It's nice to hear we're both in the same boat.$1
Entries.sam_event2: Whoa! Get real. That's crazy! You're lucky you got that arcade machine. That's worth like... 15,000g at least!$8
Entries.sam_event3: Oh... well, that's all right. To each their own, I guess.$2

Entries.shane_event1: I guess I've been standing here for a while just thinking.$3
Entries.shane_event2: Why am I at the railroad? Just thinking...$3
Entries.shane_event3: Heh, nothing gets past you, does it?$3

Entries.abigail_event1: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event2: I thought I was the only one who could see them! This is crazy!$7
Entries.abigail_event3: That's... that's a good idea.$2#$b#Sorry, I'm still trying to calm down. Ummm... let me think of a question.$0
Entries.abigail_event4: Umm... I do. let me think... oh, so...$6
Entries.abigail_event5: The Wizard told you? I've never met him...$9
Entries.abigail_event6: I see. Maybe I could look at that book sometime too.$0
Entries.abigail_event7: She is! Apples is very vocal. She's always excited to see me when I visit the forest.$1
Entries.abigail_event8: Umm... about a year ago, I think? I came to the forest to practice a song I was learning, and these little spirits confronted me.$6#$b#At first, I was scared. I thought they were going to hurt me... but Apples was the first Junimo to convey to me that they're peaceful.$0
Entries.abigail_event9: That's funny, you thought they were rats! I saw them as walking apples, which is how Apples got her nickname.$1
Entries.abigail_event10: Oh, that was a long time ago. It makes me wonder if I stumbled across them when I was younger too.$9#$b#Maybe I did... but I can't remember.$2
Entries.abigail_event11: I can't read the language...$2#$b#I've seen it, though.$6#$b#Apples has drawn symbols on the ground and pointed to stone slabs written in it.$0#$b#I knew she was trying to tell me something, but I couldn't understand...$2
Entries.abigail_event12: I did tell my mom and she was... shocked?$2#$b#She told me I have an overactive imagination and that I'm just seeing things. She doesn't take me seriously$9#$b#I also told Sebastian. He laughed at me.$3
Entries.abigail_event13: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2
Entries.abigail_event14: The Wizard? Interesting... I don't know that much about him.$6#$b#My mom always told me to not talk to him. She even forbids me to go near his tower. I never understood why...$2

Entries.emily_event1: Oh! This is our signature cocktail. Good choice, @!$1
Entries.emily_event2: You must really love your gin, @. The Lunar Horizon is strong!$1
Entries.emily_event3: The Rosette Nebula is one of my favorites! I'm happy you chose this one.$1
Entries.emily_event4: Oh my! The Big Bang is pretty strong.$6#$b#I'm sure you can handle it, though!$1
Entries.emily_event5: The Red Moon? This is Robin's favorite! Good choice, @.$1

Entries.maru_event1: Let's punch this in and see what happens!$0#$b#Aww it's wrong...$2#$b#That's okay though! I can figure this one out later.$1

Entries.clint_event1: I look up to you Adventurer Guild members. You keep everyone safe from monsters.$0
Entries.clint_event2: ...Yeah. I knew a couple of them. Fine adventurers with amazing skill.$2
Entries.clint_event3: I've hiked up there myself. Some of those adventurers had quite the kill count on their tombstones. They were fine people.$0

Entries.demetrius_event1: Robin told me she constructed some new buildings on your farm. I hope they're working out for you!$1
Entries.demetrius_event2: That's a smart idea! Automating the process should save you time!$1
Entries.demetrius_event3: I ran into Marlon recently and he told me you're an Adventurers Guild member.$0#$b#You must show promise as a skilled swordsman!$1
Entries.demetrius_event5: Haha! You tried to guess at least, @.$1

Entries.dwarf_event3: Yes. There is good in your kind.
Entries.dwarf_event4: Perhaps... but it is still used in a way that causes death and destruction.

Entries.evelyn_event1: My day is well. It's a bit on the chilly side, though.$0
Entries.evelyn_event2: Be sure to wear several layers, sweetie! I wouldn't want you catching a cold.$0
Entries.evelyn_event3: That's unfortunate to hear, dear. I'm optimistic your day will brighten up.$0

Entries.gus_event1: She was here a moment ago. She left to run some errands though.$0
Entries.gus_event2: I see! I was just there. Willy is fishing on the dock right now.$1
Entries.gus_event3: Taking in the view of the Gem Sea, of course!$1
Entries.gus_event4: I always make the effort to visit Sophia when I have free time. She really appreciates it.$2
Entries.gus_event5: Hmm... that's why Sophia hates Joja.$2#$b#She... blames them for the death of her parents.$2

Entries.jodi_event1: ...Yes. You're right.$2#$b#I need to be supportive for Kent. We're in this together, and I need to do everything I can to help him.$2
Entries.jodi_event2: Thank you for the idea, @.$2#$b#I'll talk to Harvey about this. I'm sure he'll be happy to refer us to someone.$2

Entries.kent_event4: Our nation has committed countless attrocities! We've killed thousands!$3
Entries.kent_event5: Our nation has committed countless attrocities! We've killed thousands!$3
Entries.kent_event6: My platoon was decimated in an ambush! I was a coward!!!$3
Entries.kent_event7: My platoon was decimated in an ambush! I was a coward!!!$3

Entries.Jas_event11: I won't wander too far into the forest next time... I promise.$2

Entries.lewis_event1: Great!$1#$b#The residents of Pelican Town would truly appreciate it.$0#$b#You can get right to work on the field. I'll move these barrels and boxes out of the way soon.$1
Entries.lewis_event2: That's fine, @. My offer still stands if you feel differently at a later time.$0#$b#If you do have a change in mind, you can get right to work on the field.$0

Entries.linus_event1: I'm happy to hear that.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event2: Great to hear you're having a productive day.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0
Entries.linus_event3: Haha, I see. Those days are certainly the best.$1#$b#I caught some fish this morning. Dinner tonight will be delicious.$0

Entries.marnie_event1: That's great to hear! I also get my seeds from Pierre.$1
Entries.marnie_event2: Aww, that's lovely, @. I'm happy you're treating them well.$1
Entries.marnie_event3: Oh, wow! That sounds like a lot of work, @!$1

Entries.vincent_event1: They do! I sometimes find some myself and sell 'em to Willy.$0#$b#He gives me enough to buy some ice cream or some games of Prairie King at the arcade.$1
Entries.vincent_event2: I like ocean creatures a lot! These tide pools allow me to get a good close look of all sorts of them!$0

Entries.willy_event1: Good to hear you're still enjoying fishing, @.$0#$b#I'm happy I gave you my old  rod to get you started!$1
Entries.willy_event2: That is marvelous to hear, @! I'm happy I gave you my old fishing rod to get you started!$1#$b#I never imagined you’d turn out to be such a skilled angler.$1
Entries.willy_event3: Sorry to hear it, @. Hopefully you'll pick up fishing again soon!$0

You're here for a particular reason.#$b#BEHOLD!!$1"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/playMusic none/pause 800/speak Wizard "I SAID BEHOLD!$3"/playMusic clubloop/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 19/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo 10 17/specificTemporarySprite junimoCage/pause 3000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/showFrame Wizard 4/pause 2000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You've seen these in the community center, correct?"/move Wizard 0 -1 1/pause 1000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "They call themselves the 'Junimos'...#$b#I have spoken to many spirits in the valley..#$b#But these.. they won't say anything to me..$3#$b#The audacity..$2"/pause 1000/playSound dwop/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite junimoCageGone/playMusic WizardSong/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "They are harmless so there is no reason to be afraid.#$b#They are cute too... <"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 48/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Hmmm? Entries.75002/f Wizard 1000/t 800 2300/d Fri: echos/43 60/Wizard 43 60 0 farmer 26 61 1/pause 2000/speed Wizard 1/move Wizard 0 -2 0/pause 800/emote Wizard 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "Perhaps I should go in...$2"/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer 16 0 1/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 300/speak Wizard "Oh.. @..!#$b#I was thinking about going to buy something..#$b#It appears that I arrived too late."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "...You're still asking me what was on my mind?"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Well... I won't get to full details..#$b#Let's just say I did something that could've destroyed the whole valley.."/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "That mistake would of put everyone at risk...$2#$b#I have been reclused ever since.$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "$q 75002 null#I don't think I could forgive myself..#$r 75002 150 raz_forgive#We all make mistakes#$r 75012 -25 raz_serves#Hah... don't sound so Magnificent now huh?"/fork 75012 raz_serves/pause 1000/textAboveHead Wizard "*Sigh*"/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 800/speak Wizard "Perhaps I should stop beating myself up about it...#$b#Thank you for trying to make me feel better, @.#$b#I know you really don't know what it is I did... but It's kind of something I don't share.#$b#You really are a good man.$1^You're a sweet lady.$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 800/speak Wizard "Oh.. one more thing!"/pause 300/textAboveHead Wizard "Thank you <"/animate Wizard true true 300 23 23 23/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Wizard -2 0/pause 50/showFrame farmer 94/specificTemporarySprite heart 43 59/playSound yoba/pause 500/stopAnimation Wizard 12/showFrame Wizard 12/showFrame farmer 0/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 400/speak Wizard "Y..You're blushing?!$4#$b#OHHHHohoho!! It seems my charm has captivated you.$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 60/pause 500/emote Wizard 20/pause 300/speak Wizard "Well, I best return to my tower... It was nice talking to you again, @."/pause 3000/end
Entries.raz_serves: pause 1000/speak Wizard "Way to knock me down a peg...$2"/speed Wizard 10/move Wizard 0 3 0/move Wizard -12 0 3/emote farmer 40/pause 3000/end

Entries.75004/f Wizard 2000/w sunny/d Fri Sun: WizardSong/6 18/farmer 1000 -1000 0 Caroline 1010 -1010 0 Wizard 7 16 1/showFrame Wizard 19/pause 3000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 9 33 0/move farmer 0 -10 0/showFrame Wizard 4/emote Wizard 16/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 700/speak Wizard "Oh!  It's you @!$1#$b#I thought it was another Dimensional Shambler."/move farmer 0 -3 0/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Wizard "So what brings you to my home today?$1#$b#I can always brew something to make crows spontaneously combust... Not very neat, but fun to watch.$6"/pause 500/stopMusic/emote farmer 40/pause 800/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 200/emote Wizard 40/pause 800/speak Wizard "Oh... You figured me out..."/pause 200/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 100/move Wizard 0 -1 0/pause 800/emote Wizard 40/speak Wizard "...Yes... Abigail is my daughter..."/pause 2000/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I went for a walk on a day like this one...#$b#I think Caroline moved to the valley recently then..."/pause 1000/globalFade/warp farmer 1000 -1000 0/viewport 1000 1000/fade/changeLocation forest/playMusic sadpiano/viewport 1000 1000/warp Caroline 42 13 3/warp Wizard 21 12 1/faceDirection Caroline 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/fade/viewport 35 14/speed Caroline 2/move Caroline -3 0 3/emote Caroline 8/move Wizard 15 0 1/emote Wizard 16/pause 1500/speak Wizard "Oh... Hello there..."/pause 1000/speak Caroline "Hello, do you live in that tower over there?"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/speak Wizard "Why yes... allow me to introduce myself...$1#$b#I am Razolyn the Magnificent!!$6#$b#Mistress of Magic$6#$b#Purveor of Poltergeists$6#$b#Lady of the Leylines$6#$b#... Mother of all... Wait no i'm not..$5"/pause 400/emote Caroline 28/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Are you not afraid of me?"/pause 1000/move Caroline -3 0 3/faceDirection Caroline 0/speak Caroline "Why would I be?  You seem like a gentle lady."/pause 800/emote Wizard 32/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Do you want to chat a while?$4"/pause 800/emote Caroline 20/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/warp Caroline 35 25 2/faceDirection Caroline 2/warp Wizard 33 25 2/speak Wizard "Caroline and I spent a few months meeting in the Cindersnap Forest to talk.#$b#We enjoyed our talks and became close..."/pause 3000/fade/viewport 35 25/pause 1000/speak Caroline "Pierre has become more distant as of late...$2#$b#I don't think he loves me anymore...$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 700/speak Wizard "I am sure he loves you...#$b#...Who would ever fall out of love with a beautiful flower as yourself...$1"/pause 800/emote Caroline 40/pause 800/speak Caroline "Jodi says he still loves me too.. but I have needs..$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 2/showFrame Wizard 18/speak Wizard "I am in an arranged marriage... I never got to seek my true love.$2"/pause 300/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 300/speak Caroline "I feel alone everytime I go home.$2#$b#That's why I come out here... you are my happiness right now."/pause 2000/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 800/speak Wizard "...$4#$b#...Caroline...$4"/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/warp Caroline 6 18/warp Wizard 5 18/faceDirection Caroline 3/pause 800/speak Wizard "After that, our feelings grew...#$b#...until one day, we consummated our feelings for each other..."/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/fade/viewport 13 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "Are you sure you want to do this, Caroline?$4#$b#I love you, but I don't want to push this on you...$4"/pause 300/emote Caroline 20/pause 1000/speak Caroline "We both have the need... I love you Razolyn... please..."/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 500/warp Wizard 1000 -1010 2/playSound doorClose/move Caroline -1 0 3/pause 400/faceDirection Caroline 0 true/pause 400/warp Caroline -1010 -1010 0/playSound doorClose/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/speak Wizard "Our tryst lasted what seems to of been forever.#$b#The way she made me feel... it felt so right.$4"/pause 800/stopMusic/speak Wizard "However, when my wife found out... things took for the worse.$2"/pause 2000/speak Caroline "Is she really that dangerous?!$2"/pause 800/speak Wizard "Yes... she doesn't know who you are... so you must run back to your life... and forget I exist.$2"/pause 1000/speak Caroline "...$2#$b#...No.. I will go back to my life... but deep in my heart you will always be there.$3#$b#I value your love and I will never let that go.$3"/pause 2000/changeLocation WizardHouse/fade/warp Wizard 7 16 2/warp farmer 7 18 0/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Wizard 2/viewport 6 18/fade/playMusic WizardSong/pause 1000/speak Wizard "It seems like years ago...#$b#I do not regret my tryst with Caroline...#$b#I just regret that my wife became the monster she is now...$2#$b#She has made love and happiness her enemy.$2"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I have spent years concentrating on my magic.#$b#I haven't done anything for my need of love or passion#$b#I am afraid to accidentally unleash her upon you and the rest of the town.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "But, after I met you, I feel like things are better now."/pause 400/move farmer 0 3 2/speak Wizard "Oh @!#$b#If you see Caroline... let her know I said hello."/pause 6000/globalFade/viewport 1000 1000/pause 1000/end dialogue Caroline "What?!  You spoke to Razolyn?$2#$b#...$2#$b#Thank you, tell her I miss her company.$1"
