Entries.Forest.1: ` {{FarmName}} Farm^> Pelican Town^> Marnie's Ranch^= Fairhaven Farm^= Blue Moon Vineyard
Entries.Forest.7: There are various kinds of produce stored in here.
Entries.Forest.10: These flower beds are in excellent shape.
Entries.Forest.12: You think to yourself that maybe, just maybe, there's something magical about this place.
Entries.Forest.13: ` Pelican Town^@ Fairhaven Farm^> Blue Moon Vineyard^
Entries.Forest.14: The "Stardrop Saloon" logo is on the bottles.
Entries.Forest.15: Someone has been throwing bottles off the cliff.
Entries.Forest.17: The garbage can has a lock on it.
Entries.Forest.19: Andy’s  trellis crops are growing here.
Entries.Forest.20: It's a bunch of flower beds. They are well taken care of.
Entries.Forest.23: This farm house is abandoned. You see a large collection of various hats inside.
Entries.Forest.24: It’s empty. Farming equipment used to be stored here, probably.
Entries.Forest.25: This crop field is completely overgrown...
Entries.Forest.27: Marnie's silo has 214/240 bushels of hay in it.
Entries.Forest.28: Eww... this green slime smells bad.
Entries.Forest.29: There are bushels of hay everywhere. Marnie probably sells what she doesn’t use.
Entries.Forest.30: It's Andy's shipping bin. There’s some fresh forage in here. He must have gone gathering in the forest recently.
Entries.Forest.31: These wooden boxes have seeds in them.
Entries.Forest.34: You look at your reflection in the water. You're looking dapper today.
Entries.Forest.35: Marnie is storing some of her produce in these barrels.
Entries.Forest.36: Packs of assorted seeds are in these crates. You notice "Pierre's General Store" logo on the seed bags.
Entries.Forest.37: A swing is tied to the branch of this large tree.
Entries.Forest.38: You feel a magical presence here.
Entries.Forest.39: There are some seed bags in this crate. They are from Pierre's shop.
Entries.Forest.40: There's an invisible barrier preventing you from going further...
Entries.Forest.41: It's the remains of a campfire.
Entries.Forest.43: There are directions carved in a strange hand on the stone slab:^^"DOWN"
Entries.Forest.44: Marnie uses home-made fertilizer for her flower beds.
Entries.Forest.45: It's a garbage can. There's a lock on it.
Entries.Forest.46: There are empty paint tubes and scrapped projects in here.
Entries.Forest.47: It's a garbage can. There's a lock on it.
Entries.Forest.50: Everything here is magical because it's right next to the Wizard's tower. Makes sense, right?
Entries.Forest.51: If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around to hear it, does it make a sound?
Entries.Forest.52: Andy has an iron axe in this crate.
Entries.Forest.55: A cheese press. Marnie makes some of the best cheese in the valley.
Entries.Forest.57: Shane's chickens produce high quality eggs that get turned into mayonnaise.
Entries.Forest.58: Some of these barrels have various artisan goods in them. Others have farming equipment.
Entries.Forest.59: This bucket is filled with fertilizer.
Entries.Forest.60: Does Marnie cut wood? Or does Shane?
Entries.Forest.62: There's too much foliage to travel further...
Entries.Forest.63: It's a sculpture Leah's working on
Entries.PelicanTown.1: You can see various coins in the water.
Entries.PelicanTown.2: The plaque on the playground reads:^^"FUNDED BY THE MERRYCHESTER FUNDRAISER"
Entries.PelicanTown.4: These flower beds are well taken care of.
Entries.PelicanTown.5: Emily and Haley have a clean and tidy backyard.^^You notice something off to the right.
Entries.PelicanTown.6: Oh, it's just a garden gnome.
Entries.PelicanTown.7: Someone used high-grade fertilizer on the soil here.
Entries.PelicanTown.9: This boat has equipment in it.
Entries.PelicanTown.10: ---------------------"DEWEY"---------------------^^"He was only a cat, but he was human enough to be a great comfort in hours of loneliness and pain."
Entries.PelicanTown.11: Mayor Lewis has a personal garden.
Entries.PelicanTown.12: This is the Pelican Town Community Garden.
Entries.PelicanTown.14: There are several furnaces and a charcoal kiln.
Entries.PelicanTown.15: I wish I could go over there... perhaps the mod author will update this mod in the future, allowing me to explore this area?
Entries.PelicanTown.16: The plaque on the bench reads:^^"BUILT IN RECOGNITION OF STARDEW VALLEY'S FARMERS"
Entries.PelicanTown.17: There are stacks of shopping baskets.
Entries.PelicanTown.18: These Joja trucks are blocking Pelican Town's natural hot springs.
Entries.PelicanTown.20: Pam probably left these bottles here.
Entries.PelicanTown.21: This truck hasn't budged in ages.
Entries.PelicanTown.22: This little shrine existed well before Pelican Town was built.
Entries.PelicanTown.24: These barrels are full of monster parts. Ew.
Entries.PelicanTown.25: These crates are filled with all kinds of ore.
Entries.PelicanTown.26: This crate is filled with seeds from Joja.
Entries.PelicanTown.27: Jodi grows trellis crops all year around.
Entries.PelicanTown.28: There's a lot going on in his backyard.
Entries.PelicanTown.29: This crate is filled with coal.
Entries.PelicanTown.30: These crates have seeds from Pierre's in them.
Entries.PelicanTown.31: This scarecrow was made by someone with excellent craftsmanship.
Entries.PelicanTown.32: Honey harvested here is used in a variety of dishes served at town festivals.
Entries.PelicanTown.33: There are many trellis crops that are planted here all year around.
Entries.PelicanTown.35: This swing was made for Jas and Vincent.
Entries.PelicanTown.38: Pierre's seeds are stored in here.
Entries.PelicanTown.39: It's Pierre's seed maker. You notice a label:^^"MADE IN THE FERN ISLANDS"
Entries.PelicanTown.40: Pierre's shipping bin has a lock on it.
Entries.PelicanTown.41: Pierre is fermenting wine in these kegs.
Entries.PelicanTown.43: You notice something to the left...
Entries.PelicanTown.44: Oh, it's a sign that says:^^"NO TRESPASSING"
Entries.PelicanTown.46: Evelyn prides herself on decorating the town square.
Entries.PelicanTown.48: The sign is written in bright red text. It reads:^^"DOG"
Entries.PelicanTown.49: There's wood stored in this backyard
Entries.PelicanTown.50: Residents here in Pelican Town use these kegs and barrels to turn their produce into wine and jelly.
Entries.PelicanTown.52: Evelyn takes good care of this flower bed.
Entries.PelicanTown.54: There's a lock on the garbage can.
Entries.PelicanTown.55: -PELICAN TOWN-^^-DATE: 04.17.19XX-^"Built in recognition of Stardew Valley's Elegance."
Entries.PelicanTown.56: -In loving memory of Robert and Alice-
Entries.Beach.1: This wreckage looks like it’s been here for years.
Entries.Beach.4: This bench is worn from the salty air.
Entries.Beach.6: You faintly see the Fern Islands across the Gem Sea.
Entries.Beach.8: This statue resembles an ocean bird.
Entries.Mountain.1: There's nothing but junk in this basket.
Entries.Mountain.2: Linus has his clothes in this crate.
Entries.Mountain.3: There's some dried food and rations in here.
Entries.Mountain.7: You can see the lab where Demetrius and Maru work.
Entries.Mountain.8: It's at least a 20 meter drop to the bottom...
Entries.Mountain.9: There's nothing but stone in this barrel.
Entries.Mountain.10: This barrel is half full of coal.
Entries.Mountain.11: There are several geodes in here..
Entries.Mountain.12: ` Adventurer Guild^` Mine^@ Railroad^@ Pelican Town^> Quarry
Entries.RailRoad.1: @ Bathhouse^> Emerald Farm^` Train Station^` Summit
Entries.RailRoad.4: The garbage can has a lock on it.
Entries.RailRoad.5: Safety first! Look both ways before crossing.
Entries.RailRoad.8: "RED SCAR"^^There's an engraving saying this adventurer slew 1,000 slimes and received an enchanted ring.
Entries.RailRoad.9: It's too faded to read. You can make out a faded outline of the Adventurer Guild Crest on the tombstone.
Entries.RailRoad.12: This is Emerald Farm's crop field. The produce grown here is shipped to various provinces around the Ferngill Republic.
Entries.RailRoad.13: You wonder when the next train will come through Stardew Valley.
Entries.RailRoad.14: There's nothing but trash in here. You don't know what you expected.
Entries.RailRoad.17: This is where Susan cuts her wood.
Entries.RailRoad.18: Susan takes great care of her flowerbeds.
Entries.RailRoad.19: You respect whoever laid their sword here.
Entries.RailRoad.20: It's a rusty sword. Looks like it's been here for decades.
Entries.RailRoad.22: Susan uses a unique homemade fertilizer.
Entries.RailRoad.24: This grave is being swallowed by the mountain.
Entries.RailRoad.25: This large boulder blocks your path...
Entries.Summit.1: -In loving memory of Isabelle-^^"Beloved wife, mentor, and adventurer"^"May you rest in peace, my flower."
Entries.Summit.2: What a spectacular view of Stardew Valley.
Entries.Summit.3: This is a... thing! Yes! A thing!
Entries.Summit.4: You want to sit on this bench and enjoy the amazing view, but your character doesn't have a sitting animation.
Entries.Desert.3: At first, you thought there might have been a snake in this vase. Fortunately, there's nothing but sand in it.
Entries.Desert.4: Looking across the oasis, you see a range of tall mountains. Stardew Valley lies on the other side.
Entries.Desert.5: It looks like someone recently damaged the building on purpose. They might have lost some money gambling...
Entries.Desert.6: This cactus doesn't skip leg day.
Entries.Desert.7: This cactus is huge. Knowing that the cactus will continue to grow larger fills you with assurance.
Entries.Desert.8: The road loops around at a dead end.
Entries.Desert.9: You tried picking up the forage, but it prickled your hand. You decide to leave the forage where it is, instead.
Entries.Desert.10: It's an ancient temple of some kind.
Entries.Desert.11: These are the bones of an ancient dragon. Dragons existed before humans, elves, dwarfs, and even the shadow people. No one knows why they went extinct.
Entries.Desert.12: Skull Cavern... you recall Marlon's stories of other adventurers who went forth into this cave, never to return...
Entries.Desert.13: You shouldn't wander too far into the desert...
Entries.Desert.14: You can see Stardew Valley down the road. It's too far to walk...
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.1: > Pelican Town^@ Blue Moon Vineyard^@ Cindersap Forest^= Beach
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.3: The garbage can has a lock on it.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.5: This vineyard has been here for many years.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.6: Blue Moon Vineyard processes all grapes into wine.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.7: The shipping bin is filled with wine bottles.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.8: This swing is worn from age.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.11: Grapes are cleaned and then stomped into juice in this stone well.
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard.12: You feel the ocean breeze on your face.
Entries.LostWoods.1: There's a faded message on this stone slab:^^"FOLLOW THE MUSHROOMS"
Entries.LostWoods.2: These ruins must be over 100 years old.
Entries.LostWoods.3: What is this tree doing all the way in the forest? There's no possible way it could survive with so little sunlight.
Entries.LostWoods.4: You wanted to read the descriptions on this grave, but they’re in Elvish. You can't read Elvish.
Entries.LostWoods.5: It's too worn from age to make out what it says...
Entries.LostWoods.6: "KONKOR"^^"Shu nok vu dun leim kunar varim"^^...Hmm, this language isn't Elvish or Dwarvish. What could it possibly be?
Entries.LostWoods.7: Someone left this here recently. But who?
Entries.LostWoods.8: "VUNOK"^^The engravings are in a language you've never seen before, so you can't understand it.
Entries.LostWoods.9: This grave has large scratch marks on it, marring whatever the engravings might say beyond recognition.
Entries.LostWoods.12: This sword has Elvish engravings on it
Entries.LostWoods.13: This grave is written in Elvish, and you don't understand the language, but you try to read the engravings anyway:^^"Laurie lantar lassi surinen, yeni unotime ve ramar aldaron! Yeni ve linte uldar avanier mi oromari lisse-miruvoreva Andune pella, Vardo tellumar nu luini yassen tintilar i eleni omaryo airetari lirinen. Si man i yulma nin enquantuva? An si Tintalle Varda Oiolosseo ve fanyar maryat Elentari ortane."
Entries.LostWoods.14: It's a Dwarvish sword. It looks very heavy...
Entries.LostWoods.15: "We trade goods for yellow sparkly rocks!"^^"Pretty floor light sends you back!"
Entries.LostWoods.16: These trees are growing a kind of fruit you don’t recognize.
Entries.LostWoods.17: Ancient fruit plants grow here with ease.
Entries.LostWoods.18: Definitely magic. You're sure of it.
Entries.LostWoods.19: You look across the lake and spot a dozen Junimo huts.
Entries.TownEast.2: I shouldn't wander too far away from town.
Entries.TownEast.3: You want to sit on the bench, but your character doesn't have a sitting animation to use it.
Entries.TownEast.4: This tree must be over 100 years old.
Entries.TownEast.5: It's a shovel. These tools are used to dig up stuff like dirt.
Entries.TownEast.6: This garden space hasn't been used in a long time.
Entries.GrampletonFields.2: @ Stardew Valley^` Train Station^> Grampleton^> Apothecary
Entries.GrampletonFields.3: This wheat field is huge. Grampleton specializes in lumber, wheat ale, flour, and sugar.
Entries.GrampletonFields.4: You see the outskirts of Grampleton.
Entries.GrampletonFields.6: -ORDER OF THE KNIGHTS OF PYTHAGORAS-^^"These lands have been vanquished of monsters. The order will continue to help humanity, paving a way to security and flourishment."
Entries.MarnieShed.1: Marnie is storing various stuff here.
Entries.MarnieShed.2: This must be where Marnie keeps track of her profits and supplies.
Entries.MarnieShed.3: These cheese presses are hard at work.
Entries.MarnieShed.4: Marnie's looms are hand-crafted in Grampleton.
Entries.MarnieShed.5: These are pictures of Marnie's ranch when it was first built. She looks younger and thinner.
Entries.MarnieShed.8: "MANIFEST 3608.25.01-43"^^"EXPENSES: 46,720g"^"INCOME: 94,351g"^"PROFITS FOR 43RD QUARTER: 47,631g"^^"ANIMALS: 14 COWS, 8 SHEEP, 6 PIGS, 18 CHICKENS"^^"SHIPMENT 44.02-1"^"900 GALLONS-MILK"^"120 KG-CHEESE"^"25 KG-WOOL"^"70 KG-PRODUCE"
Entries.MarnieShed.9: The chest is unlocked. You open the chest to see what's inside to satisfy your curiosity... only to find another chest that’s locked...
Entries.MarnieShed.11: It's some kind of machine used for processing wood.
Entries.SophiaHouse.3: You look in the fridge... Wow, there's a lot of orange chicken in here. Sophia must love this stuff.
Entries.SophiaHouse.5: The sink has a plate with leftover orange chicken sauce on it. It hasn't been cleaned yet.
Entries.SophiaHouse.6: There's a single placemat on the table.
Entries.SophiaHouse.7: It's a GE 30 Slide-In Electric Range Stove.
Entries.SophiaHouse.8: This is Settlers of Ferngill, set up for three players. The game pieces are dusty.
Entries.SophiaHouse.14: 'Viticulture: An Introduction to Commercial Grape Growing for Wine Production'
Entries.SophiaHouse.17: This looks like EVA foam. Sophia must be making some armor for cosplay.
Entries.SophiaHouse.19: There's a large collection of different fabrics.
Entries.SophiaHouse.20: Sophia is working on an outfit with dark brown leather.
Entries.SophiaHouse.21: You take a look at the sheet of paper and see notes on complex stitching patterns.
Entries.SophiaHouse.22: It's a collection of various dyes.
Entries.SophiaHouse.23: A moving box blocks your path.
Entries.SophiaHouse.24: It's an old pillow, covered with dust.
Entries.SophiaHouse.25: The bed has a fine layer of dust on it.
Entries.SophiaHouse.26: Dust is all over this couch.
Entries.SophiaHouse.28: It's an article ripped from a newspaper with a breaking headline.
Entries.SophiaHouse.29: Sophia takes good care of her plants.
Entries.SophiaHouse.30: Manga books are scattered around the floor.
Entries.SophiaHouse.31: Sophia has an NVIDIA RIVA 128 graphics card.
Entries.SophiaHouse.32: Several limited edition Tofu Anime dolls are sitting on the shelf.
Entries.SophiaHouse.36: There are creams, lotions and makeup palettes.
Entries.SophiaHouse.37: There's a ripped note underneath the teddy bear...^^"Mom. Dad. I miss you both so much. There isn't a single day where I don't think about you two. Money isn't an issue for me. I wish you two were still here. I miss you, mom and dad."
Entries.SophiaHouse.38: You look at yourself in the mirror. You're looking dapper today.
Entries.SophiaHouse.40: This radio is plastered with anime stickers.
Entries.SophiaHouse.41: A cute sailboat is in the water.
Entries.SophiaHouse.42: It's a picture of the mountain range near Grampleton.
Entries.SophiaHouse.43: Family photos are hung haphazardly along the wall.
Entries.SophiaHouse.44: You see the Ferngill Republic on the globe.
Entries.SophiaHouse.46: This phone console has three unread voicemails.
Entries.SophiaHouse.48: It's a First Slash adventurer cosplay.
Entries.SophiaHouse.53: The chicken statue has a small engraving:^^'Robin'
Entries.SophiaHouse.54: It's a large flat screen television.
Entries.SophiaCellar.1: There's jam being made in this barrel.
Entries.SophiaCellar.4: Sophia is making Blue Moon Vineyard's trademark iridium quality grape wine.
Entries.SusanHouse.1: "!!ASSEMBLY INSTRUCTIONS!!"^^"PAGE 5 - 08.63-02"^"1x4x49-1/2"^"18-1/2x43-1/2"^"1x4x49-1/2"^"Assemble top by drilling pocket holes as shown and screwing together 1-1/4 pocket hole screws."^^Hmm... looks like a manual Susan is using to make a storage chest.
Entries.SusanHouse.2: It's a wooden crafting hammer, made in Grampleton.
Entries.SusanHouse.4: This chest was made by someone with excellent craftsmanship.
Entries.SusanHouse.5: 'Woodworking Basics - Mastering the Essentials of Craftsmanship'
Entries.SusanHouse.8: There are tacks on the globe indicating the places where Susan has traveled.
Entries.SusanHouse.9: The radio is set to a news station.
Entries.SusanHouse.10: It's a replica model of the J.R. Forsont ship. It was famous for charting the entire Gem Sea.
Entries.SusanHouse.12: So many plants! Susan must have a green thumb.
Entries.SusanHouse.13: Susan is taking a quota on next season’s seeds.
Entries.SusanHouse.14: This microwave smells like vegan hot pockets.
Entries.SusanHouse.15: The stove top is crystal clean.
Entries.SusanHouse.16: Most of the food in this fridge is fruits and vegetables.
Entries.SusanHouse.17: You want to take a peek in the dresser, but you know better than to do that.
Entries.SusanHouse.19: This is a Celestron NexsStar LX6000.
Entries.SusanHouse.20: "I'm excited about my trip to the Fern Islands. I had to save up a lot of money to go, but it’ll be worth it. The culture and architecture will be a spectacular experience, not to mention the beautiful weather and beaches."
Entries.SusanHouse.22: These casks are fermenting various wines and juices.
Entries.SusanHouse.23: This is a typewriter. Susan uses it to make reports.
Entries.SusanHouse.27: "EMERALD FARM MANIFEST FOR 39TH QUARTER - 5-32.93"^^"EXPENSES: 81,704G"^"INCOME: 154,306G"^"PROFIT: 72,602G"^^"SHIPMENT TO PINE-MESA CITY: CODE 60-01.06"^"60 KG - Produce"^"7 Gallons - Wine"^"13 Gallons - Juice"^^"SIGNATURE AUTHORIZATION: S.S.R. RONSON"^"TARIFFS: 3069.06 - 9"
Entries.SusanHouse.28: This wood is used for crafting.
Entries.SusanHouse.32: Susan grows small crops in her house.
Entries.AndyHouse.3: "Why Joja Farming is Better Than Organic Methods"
Entries.AndyHouse.5: The radio doesn't have a battery in it...
Entries.AndyHouse.6: This cup smells bad. It hasn't been cleaned.
Entries.AndyHouse.9: Beer is soaked into the carpet.
Entries.AndyHouse.10: Rotten food is spilling out of the can.
Entries.AndyHouse.11: There are some Joja-brand groceries in here.
Entries.AndyHouse.12: The plant is trying its best to grow.
Entries.AndyHouse.14: The sink is filled with dirty dishes.
Entries.AndyHouse.15: This oven hasn't been cleaned in forever.
Entries.AndyHouse.18: It's a Joja shopping basket. Andy never returned it.
Entries.AndyHouse.20: It's a manifest of Fairhaven Farm:^^"FAIRHAVEN FARM REPORT FOR 41ST QUARTER"^^"INCOME: 44,540g"^"EXPENSES: 49,307g"^"NET LOSS: 4,767g"^"NEXT SHIPPING DATE CODE: 305-14.06"
Entries.AndyHouse.21: "My Yoba darn plants keep dyin' and aren't producing enough. I gotta buy more o’ them Joja fertilizers. That ought to do the trick."
Entries.AndyHouseClean.5: Andy's chest has various tools and fertilizers.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.6: The radio is on the 'country music' station.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.12: "Mysterious creatures and where to find them"
Entries.AndyHouseClean.13: It's a replica ship of the R.P. Morson, the ship famous for the first voyage to the Ferngill Republic 200 years ago.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.16: There are barrels and boxes everywhere. They're in good condition.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.17: It's a manifest of Fairhaven Farm:^^"FAIRHAVEN FARM REPORT FOR 44TH QUARTER"^^"INCOME: 94,540g"^"EXPENSES: 38,241g"^"PROFIT: 56,299g"^"NEXT SHIPPING DATE CODE: 216-02.10"
Entries.AndyHouseClean.19: "A Lesson on Self-Reflection - By Morris Tod"
Entries.AndyHouseClean.20: This freshly-cut wood probably came from Cindersap Forest.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.22: It's a trash can. There's nothing in here.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.23: Andy has a meal ready. It smells delicious
Entries.AndyHouseClean.24: The plant has grown into something greater after all this time. Knowing that it'll continue to grow fills you with happiness.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.25: The fridge is filled with fresh forage and groceries from Pierre's General Store.
Entries.AndyHouseClean.27: You take a peek into Andy's dresser:^^He has ten pairs of blue farmer overalls.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.1: "Up, down, right, left, up, up, down: A X B Y B A X X B A A B B B A A A"^^Hmm... it looks like a cheat code for a video game.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.2: Victor has a GoStation 1 and a Super Neendo Entertainment System.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.4: "Game Informer - Best Games of The Year"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.6: "The Legend of Lonk - Ultimate Player's Guide"^^This guide book is worn from age. It's been used quite a bit.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.7: "1001 Video Games to Play"^^You notice a bookmark in this book. Victor must be in the middle of reading this.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.9: "Managerial Accounting - Corporate Applications"^^You notice many notes in this book. It looks like Olivia has read this extensively.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.12: "Mechanical Engineering Reference Manual"^^You decide to open the book and read a few pages. You understand absolutely nothing about this stuff.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.15: "Ecology and Environment - The Plain View of Life"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.16: "Bringing Nature Home - How to Live Sustainably"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.17: "Stardew Valley - Top Tourist Locations"^^This cover art is of the summit here in the valley!
Entries.JenkinsHouse.19: "The Majestic Archipelago of the Fern Islands"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.20: "Legends of Monsters - Tales from Castle Village"^^This book in particular interests you. You take a peek at several pages... Hmm. It talks about many adventurers and their feats in slaying monsters, keeping the desert sands safe.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.21: "Monster Almanac - Edition III"^^You open the book and see many pictures of slimes, shadow brutes, serpents, bats, skeletons and other monsters.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.22: "Venturing into Corneal Mountain - by Marlon Fay"

Entries.JenkinsHouse.24: What a lovely table by the window.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.25: "Joja Stocks - The Insider Trading Guide!"^^Olivia has many bookmarks in this book.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.27: "How to Make Money in Stocks - A Winning System in Good Times or Bad!"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.29: "Strategic Stock Trading - Making your money work for you!"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.32: "Managing Iridium Quality Wine in your Cellar"^^There are some ripped pages in this book.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.33: "Blue Moon Vineyard's Success - by Jason Taylor"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.34: "Elves, Dwarves, Goblins, and Monsters - Arcane Studies VOL XII"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.35: "History of the Shadow People - A Monster Hunter's Story"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.36: (You notice a ripped piece of paper wedged between two books):^^"Secret Wine Fermentation of the Gotoro Empire"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.37: "Mystical Creatures of Stardew Valley - First Edition"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.38: "Grampleton - Travel Guide"^^(This book interests you. You glance through the pages)^^Hmm... there are many images of golden fields of wheat, windmills, artisans, and a large community of happy people. The trees surrounding the city are huge.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.39: "The First Slash - Monster Hunter Clan of Fern Islands"^^The cover of this book depicts five people with blue cloaks. These must be adventurers from across the Gem Sea.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.41: "Stories of the Smoluanu - by M. Jasper"^^This book talks about the Dwarves that used to live in Corneal Mountain over a thousand years ago.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.43: You see Pine-Mesa City on the globe. You wonder how Mom and Dad are doing.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.44: This art is beautiful. Olivia has a knack for painting.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.45: Olivia is painting the palm tree.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.46: There are various oils, paints, and custom-crafted brushes on the shelves.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.47: Used of tubes of paint are scattered on the floor.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.48: Olivia's work desk. The drawer is locked.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.50: There's a piece of paper with notes on it:^^"STOCK TRADE DATE: 04.24.1998-01.5 14:30"^"CONTACT: BARABAR RUSH - (624) 520-10532"^"CURRENCY TRANSLATION: 1G --- 0.845Z"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.53: You were going to look through Olivia's dresser, but you know better.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.54: The bedsheets are made of Gotoro Empire silk.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.55: "Another lovely day in Pelican Town! The stock market has been very kind to me as of late. I made 40,000g from a stock trade I made today! I'll spend this money on more extravagant wine to add to my collection! Or perhaps I'll add to the millions in my trust fund. So many questions. So little time!"
Entries.JenkinsHouse.56: There's incense, candles, fancy towels, and various toiletries.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.59: It's a bathtub. You can clean yourself in these, or so you've heard.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.60: It's another Super Neendo Entertainment System. Victor has two.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.61: This is a miniature G-40 TV.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.62: Victor's sheets are made of silk from the Gotoro Empire.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.63: To satisfy your curiosity, you take a peek in Victor's dresser:^^He has boxers with hearts on them.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.68: "Engineering - Applications in Practice"^^You notice the price tag. This book cost 5,250g.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.71: "It’s been a year since I graduated from Pellcar University with my engineering degree, I'm not... sure what I want to do with my life. I was offered an internship in Zuzu City at a well-known company but I turned it down. I never told Mom. She would be furious if she found out. I need more time to think about what I want to do. Not what others want."
Entries.JenkinsHouse.72: This Gotoran cabinet has china dishes decorated with the pattern of the Gotoro Empire on display.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.73: The microwave has a pizza-flavored hot pocket in it. Victor may have forgotten it?
Entries.JenkinsHouse.74: Wow. This is a Garland series electric range stove.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.75: It's an Algren stainless steel kitchen sink.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.76: You open the fridge and find it packed full of expensive food bought from Pierre's General Store.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.77: This dining room table was built in Grampleton.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.79: This bear statue was hand-carved in Grampleton.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.80: There is an assortment of cookies and tea.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.81: There are many knickknacks. They all look expensive, too.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.83: These are freshly cut logs from Grampleton.
Entries.JenkinsHouse.84: "27 shades of Yellow - The tale of finding the other 23 shades"
Entries.ForestWest.3: This shipping bin is bolted shut.
Entries.ForestWest.4: It's a rusty sword. There are engravings on the blade, but they're too faded to decipher.
Entries.ForestWest.5: A Lava Katana! These swords are forged in pools of churning lava at Mt. Volvos. Only 100 of these exist.
Entries.ForestWest.9: There are various pieces of machinery buried in the ground here. They look expensive. Was someone working on a large project here before abandoning it?
Entries.ForestWest.10: Doesn't look like anyone is home...

Entries.OliviaCellar.2: There are pins locating every vineyard in the Ferngill Republic.  Blue Moon Vineyard is on here too.
Entries.OliviaCellar.3: It's a bunch of expensive foreign wine.
Entries.OliviaCellar.4: These boxes are filled with expensive wine glasses.

Entries.JojaEmployee.1: Joja Employee: "So tired... I wanna go home."
Entries.JojaEmployee.2: Joja Employee: "Welcome to Joja! How can I help ya?"
Entries.Egg-Festival.1: You fill your plate with ham, eggs, greens, and some rolls! You eat it in one sitting and wash it down with some orange juice. It was delicious.
Entries.Beach-Luau.1: You know all the words to this song. You want to sing along, but you're practically tone deaf.
Entries.Beach-Luau.2: You help yourself to some glazed ham, radish salad, and bread rolls. You wash it all down with hand-crafted, iridium-quality grape wine from Blue Moon Vineyard! Yum!
Entries.Beach-Luau.3: Linus sure does know how to slow roast ham.
Entries.Beach-Luau.4: These statues evoke the culture of the Tiki, one of the indigenous peoples of the Fern Islands.
Entries.Beach-Luau.5: You see something moving in the water.^^Hmm, whatever it was, it's gone. Must have been your imagination.
Entries.Town-Fair.1: Tourist: "I think I've eaten around 4,000 calories worth of food so far... Totally. Freaking. Worth. It. This BBQ sauce is to die for, man!"
Entries.Town-Fair.2: Goliath: "HEY THERE, KIDDO. I SEE YOU EYEING SOMEONE YOU FANCY. YOU CAN'T HIDE THAT FROM ME. I, GOLIATH, SEE ALL. THIS STRENGTH GAME WILL SURELY IMPRESS EM, IF YOU HAVE THE STRENGTH THAT IS! HAHAHA!!"
Entries.Town-Fair.3: Clown: "Impressed that I can juggle one ball at a time? Maybe if I got paid another 200g an hour I would juggle two balls at a time with both hands."
Entries.Town-Fair.4: Tourist: "All of these grange displays are impressive. It's amazing how well everyone here in Stardew Valley showcases their expertise."
Entries.Town-Fair.5: Tourist: "I visit Stardew Valley every year for the fair. I brought little Timothy along this time!"
Entries.Town-Fair.6: Tourist: "Hey, you're the owner of that farm down there, aren't ya? I read about you in the paper a while ago. You cleaned that farm up good! Keep up the good work."
Entries.Town-Fair.7: Rebecca: "Hi there! My name is Rebecca. I'm a friend of these two dorks here, hehe. I live in Zuzu City and I came here for the Stardew Festival!"
Entries.Town-Fair.8: Tourist: "Hey there, buddy. I'm taking a break from this rigged slingshot game."
Entries.Town-Fair.9: Tourist: "Shooting Comet cocktail? I sure could go for one of those right now. This festival is making me thirsty."
Entries.Town-Fair.10: Tourist: "I just had my fortune told by this creepy lady right here. She told me I'd get killed in the mines... just what the heck is she on about?"
Entries.Town-Fair.11: Tourist: "You want to take this pumpkin home, boo?"
Entries.Town-Fair.12: Worker: "Oh, hey. I'm just taking a "quick" break from moving these barrels. Can you believe I'm only getting paid 300g an hour for this? pfft..."
Entries.Town-Fair.13: Tourist: "That cheese wheel is huge! I wonder if that lady would be willing to sell it?"
Entries.Town-Fair.14: Tourist: "Ohhh! This is the pumpkin we should bring back home. It'll make the perfect Jack-o-lantern, honey!"
Entries.Town-Fair.15: Tourist: "Dude... That pumpkin doesn't look natural."
Entries.Town-Fair.17: Tourist: "I must say, Stardew Valley is beautiful this time of year. I came all the way from Chestervale just to get a pumpkin! The best crops are grown here in this very valley. The soil is extremely rich because of a long-ago meteor shower!"
Entries.Town-Fair.18: Tourist: "*sigh*... I'm horrible at throwing darts. There goes another 15g."
Entries.Town-Fair.19: Gil: "I see you strayed away from the crowd, farmer... or should I say adventurer? You've been venturing forth deep into the mines, or so Marlon tells me. This is as good an opportunity as any... You're doing the Guild proud. Thank you. Now, you should go back and enjoy yourself, adventurer."
Entries.Town-Fair.20: That creepy old bald man is littering everywhere...
Entries.Town-Fair.21: Someone threw their popcorn onto the ground instead of throwing it away in the trash.
Entries.Town-Fair.22: It's a soda can, but not Joja-brand.
Entries.Town-Fair.23: Pierre has an extraordinary grange display. These are the crops he's been growing all year in his backyard.
Entries.Town-Fair.24: Marnie's grange display is remarkable. These artisan goods are out of this world.
Entries.Town-Fair.25: Willy caught a Dorado!? Wow! That takes some serious skill.
Entries.Town-Fair.26: This pumpkin is massive. Good luck to anyone trying to take this one home.
Entries.Town-Fair.27: Tourists can take pumpkins home with them.
Entries.Town-Fair.28: Yup. This is the best pumpkin here.
Entries.Town-Fair.29: This couple sitting down by the river is having a heated argument... better leave them alone.
Entries.Town-Fair.30: She's trying to use the swing. Should maybe get out of her way or she'll kick you.
Entries.Town-Fair.31: Tourist: "Yo! I'll climb this with just one hand!"
Entries.Town-Fair.33: Someone was playing kickball here recently.
Entries.Town-Fair.34: Clint is displaying high-quality bronze, iron, and gold bars. There are also some weapons he crafted, plus a shield! These are superb!
Entries.Town-Fair.35: Creepy Man: "You cheated to talk to me, didn't you? Well, if you were trying to find a secret by talking to me, too bad."
Entries.Town-Fair.36: Andy's grange display is filled with forage, honey, and produce.
Entries.Town-Fair.38: Susan is showcasing her produce and juice!
Entries.Town-Fair.39: Tourist: "Hello, dear. This is a lovely town."
Entries.Town-Fair.42: Sophia's displaying aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine.
Entries.Town-Fair.43: Freya: "Ah! It's great to visit Stardew Valley again. How's the guild holdin' up these days?"
Entries.Town-Fair.44: Ricken: "Hmm? Can I help you with something?"
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.1: This chest is fake. You've been bamboozled.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.2: You walked past these scary spiders only to find a fake treasure chest. Now you have to walk past the scary spiders again.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.3: X X X WARNING!!! X X X MONSTERS AHEAD!!! X X X^^"Please be wary of deadly monsters in this part of the maze. If you choose to continue further, you are responsible for your own life and wellbeing."^^-M. Rasmodius^^
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.5: This house has weird looking feet...
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.6: You can tell the chest behind the graves is fake.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.7: This cauldron smells like cotton candy.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.8: Jack The Pumpkin: "You did it! Good job!"
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.9: These spiders are fake. You're feeling glad there are no spider monsters in the mines.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.10: Someone is being eaten by spiders. That's what happens if you try to cheat in the maze.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.11: Lanterns around the fountain have ominous blue flames.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.12: You help yourself to some ham, potatoes, greens, and pumpkin pie with whipped cream! Delicious!
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.13: There's a monster blocking the path up ahead.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.14: These skeletons look menacing. If it weren't for this metal cage, they'd be on top of us in an instant.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.15: This pumpkin is blocking the path, and it's not like you can simply walk around it. Best to turn around.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.16: These pumpkins were grown by Pierre, Marnie, Susan, and in Pelican Town's community garden. Emily carved all of them herself.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.17: You open the chest and find a note. You read it:^^"You cheated not only the game, but yourself. You didn't grow. You didn't improve. You took a shortcut and gained nothing. You experienced a hollow victory. Nothing was risked and nothing was gained. It's sad that you don't know the difference."
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.18: It's Marlon's sword. The craftsmanship is superb.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.19: Gil's sword is leaning against the Mullners' mailbox.
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.20: Gil: "Marlon and adventurers from Castle Village caught these monsters. Don't get too close to the cages."
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.21: The Pumpkin King: "Hi. Thanks for taking the time to talk to me. You're a nice person. Happy Spirit's Eve!"
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.22: Aaaahhhh!^^...^^Oh, it's just Dusty. Who's a good boy!? You are!
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.26: The Castle Village adventurer ignores you...
Entries.Spirits-Eve-Festival.27: Scarecrow: Awesome. I'm happy you won!
Entries.Ice-Festival.1: It's the remains of an animal...
Entries.Ice-Festival.2: Looks like someone was drinking here.
Entries.Ice-Festival.3: You want to lick this candy cane, but you shouldn't.
Entries.Ice-Festival.4: It's an igloo. Linus built most of these.
Entries.Ice-Festival.5: Looks like the ruins of a long-forgotten temple.
Entries.Ice-Festival.6: Could this possibly be magic? Maybe, just maybe.
Entries.Ice-Festival.8: Robin built an ice sand castle.
Entries.Ice-Festival.9: This ice statue looks like a pear.
Entries.Ice-Festival.10: The Ice Festival takes place several miles deep in Cindersap Forest.
Entries.Ice-Festival.11: A tent all the way out here in the forest? Linus must have come out here in advance and set it up.
Entries.Ice-Festival.12: Willy already caught several fish. He must be warming up.
Entries.Ice-Festival.13: You warm yourself by the fire.
Entries.Town-Winter-Star.2: You pack your plate full of turkey, mashed potatoes, greens, and some rolls. You eat it all in one sitting, and wash it down with some apple cider. Delicious! Gus really outdid himself!
Entries.Town-Winter-Star.3: You want to lick the candy cane... and you do.^^ Eww! It's plastic. You shouldn't have licked it.
Entries.Town-Winter-Star.4: These presents are wrapped beautifully. You wonder which one is yours.^^Oh, none of them have name tags. You'll have to wait and see who brings you one.
Entries.FarmMod.1: -AMY-^^"BELOVED WIFE AND MOTHER"^"Yoba decided you had to leave me, but you did not go alone. Part of me went with you. Rest in peace, my tiger lily."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.1: Sawyer: "Hmph? What do you want, kid?"
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.2: Brianna: "This place hasn't changed in years. Good to see Marlon is keepin' up with it."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.3: Drake: "No poisonous monsters around here. We combat hordes of poisonous jellyfish called 'Zines' at the islands."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.4: Ekon: "Marlon and I are goin' on an expedition today. The mines of Corneal Mountain are perilous."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.5: Emin: "I use a special totem crafted by our wizard to teleport here. The First Slash supports Stardew Valley."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.6: Gertrude: "I could get used to the nice weather here. I do miss the dry heat of the desert though."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.7: Brock: "Gil is checking over important documentation regarding Castle Village's weapon cache."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.8: Cordelia: "Camilla, our witch, sent me here to seek an audience with Marlon. You know, he's a legend where I come from."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.9: Freya: "Hi, love. We should go adventuring together sometime."
Entries.AdventurerGuildGuest.11: Jerad: "Heh. Monsters here are nothin' compared to the ones we got in the desert. You have it easy here, kid."
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.1: Castle Village Sentry: "How did you get up here!?"
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.2: Castle Village Sentry: "Castle Village is off limits to outsiders. I suggest you turn away."
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.3: A defeated adventurer's sword lays here...
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.4: It's the remains of a Castle Village adventurer...
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.5: Alesia: "Wh-what in the name of Yoba!? Are you a spell caster?"
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.6: Isaac: "Hmph. Figured you'd be the type to cheat."
Entries.CrimsonBadlands.7: The magical barrier prevents you from entering Castle Village.
Entries.SkullCave.1: -MINECART TO CRIMSON BADLANDS-^^- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -^"DANGER: BEWARE OF MONSTERS"^"Authorized monster hunters only"^- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Entries.DesertRailway.2: "THE DESERT SANDS WILL FOREVER BE CORRUPTED"^^-Q
Entries.TreasureCave.1: It's the remains of a Castle Village adventurer...
Entries.TreasureCave.2: The sword is buried in the sand.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.13: "Tales of the Crimson Sands - By Draco M."
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.14: "PHOTO ALBUM"^^You see many of the old adventurers posing for a picture.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.16: "Potion Brewing Vol I - By Camilla Arriens"
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.17: It's an old dusty ledger. Doesn't seem like it's been used for a while.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.18: It's a picture of when the guild building was first built.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.19: "EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES MANIFEST - 10.05.12 - D3"^^"4 MACES"^"6 DAGGERS"^"9 SWORDS"^^----POTIONS----^^"10 HERO ELIXIRS"^"5 ARMOR ELIXIRS"
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.20: Minerals and gems collected from expeditions in the mines.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.21: Adventurer gear is crafted on this table.
Entries.AdventureGuildSVE.22: Shop is closed for the day.^^-Marlon
Entries.ArchaeologyHouseSVE.4: "FIRE COUGAR"^^It was a monster that existed thousands of years ago.
Entries.ArchaeologyHouseSVE.8: The cabinet is full of ornate objects.
Entries.ArchaeologyHouseSVE.9: This was crafted by artisans in the Fern Islands
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.2: Coal used to stoke the fires.
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.4: The barrel is filled with various ores.
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.5: Iron ingots stacked on top of each other.
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.6: There's copper ingots and a single gold ingot.
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.7: Decorative ore nodes that came from a volcano.
Entries.BlacksmithSVE.8: A bunch of paperwork containing shipment details.
Entries.LeahHouseSVE.1: Leah's making a meal out of fresh forage.
Entries.LeahHouseSVE.3: Paintings fill the walls of Leah's house.
Entries.ManorHouseSVE.1: "O.S. Merrychester"^^'Charter ship of the Fern Island Archipelago'
Entries.ScienceHouseSVE.3: The 500ml beaker is full of a strange-colored liquid.
Entries.ScienceHouseSVE.5: Various tools are stored in this storage chest.
Entries.SaloonSVE.2: There's napkins, plates, and utensils in the drawer.
Entries.SaloonSVE.7: There's frozen Grampleton orange chicken in the fridge.
Entries.SaloonSVE.9: The television is set to a cartoon network.
Entries.TrailerSVE.2: There are a bunch of magazines about planes.
Entries.TrailerSVE.3: 'My Life Flying in the Sky'^'By Jackson Simpson'
Entries.SebastianRoomSVE.1: It smells like potent burnt grass.
Entries.SebastianRoomSVE.3: There are stickers on this TV.
Entries.SebastianRoomSVE.4: There's a horror film called 'Grenchin The Destroyer'.
Entries.SamHouseSVE.4: There's a note on the TV with cartoon stations.
Entries.WizardHouseSVE.6: 'Dragon Scroll'^^The paper is made of gold.
Entries.WizardHouseSVE.12: It smells like dirt and moss...
Entries.WizardHouseSVE.14: You feel the warmth of the fire.
Entries.WizardHouseBasementSVE.8: 'Junimo Scroll'^^There are Junimo symbols you've never seen before.
Entries.WizardHouseBasementSVE.16: This tome is made of silver. You don't understand the language it's written in.
Entries.WizardHouseBasementSVE.31: I was told not to come near this...
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.2: It's one of Sophia's teddy bears.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.3: There's jewelry and a hairbrush in the drawer.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.4: An old crafting manual is in the drawer. It's filled with handwritten notes.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.5: There are a bunch cute outfits in the drawer.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.6: There are several different farmer uniforms.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.7: You open the drawer and find several comics:^^'Lion Girl The Leaping Titan - VOL IX'^'Jax Void Heart - Vol I^'Wonder Girl - Vol III'^'Captain Magnificent - Vol II'^^The comics date back many years.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.8: The glass cabinet is filled with trophies.
Entries.GunthersRoom.3: The fridge is filled with food from Pierre's.
Entries.GunthersRoom.4: An array of exotic foreign bottles.
Entries.GunthersRoom.8: 'Origins of Monsters - Findings from Castle Village'
Entries.SandyShop.1: "Visiting friends in Stardew Valley today! The Oasis shop will be open tomorrow!"^^-Sandy
Entries.GrandpasShed.1: One of Grandpa's old record books:^^"FARM MANIFEST 3608.25.01-43"^^"EXPENSES: 121,415g"^"INCOME: 383,671g"^"PROFITS FOR 62ND QUARTER: 262,256g"^^"VEGETABLE SEEDS: 342, FRUIT SEEDS: 342, FRUIT TREES: 16, PROCESSING MACHINES: 43"^^"SHIPMENT 163.04-1"^"150 KG-PRODUCE"^"57 KG-ARTISAN GOODS"
Entries.GrandpasShed.2: It's some Stardew Valley Expanded source code:^^private void OnDayStarted(object sender, DayStartedEventArgs e)^if(MasterPlayer.mailReceived.Contains("ccIsComplete") || Game1.MasterPlayer.hasCompletedCommunityCenter())^Game1.removeCharacterFromItsLocation("MorrisTod");^^private void OnSaveLoaded(object sender, SaveLoadedEventArgs e)^^if (!Context.IsWorldReady) return;^^Multiplayer multiplayer > Reflection.GetField-Multiplayer-(typeof(Game1), "multiplayer").GetValue();^^FarmAnimal whiteCow1 > new FarmAnimal("White Cow", multiplayer.getNewID(), -1L)^^Position > new Vector2(96 Game1.tileSize, 19 Game1.tileSize)^^(Game1.getLocationFromName("Forest") as Forest).marniesLivestock.Add(whiteCow1);
Entries.GrandpasShed.3: --GARDENING AT HOME FOR EXPERTS--^^SOIL PREPARATION^When preparing gardens for vegetables or tomatoes, apply 2.5 lbs. of Garden-tone per 50 square feet and work into the top 4 to 5 inches of soil.^^FEEDING VEGETABLES AND TOMATOES^-Feed seedlings and transplants one week to 10 days after planting.^Single plants: Sprinkle 1/3 cup per plant.^Rows: Sprinkle 1-1/3 cup each side per 5 ft. of row or 10 lbs. each side per 100 ft. of row.^^METHODS AND FREQUENCY^-Apply in a single band around single plants.^-Feed alongside of row. Keep 3 inches from stern.^-Feed monthly throughout growing season.^-Always water thoroughly after feeding.^^NEW PLANTINGS^Garden Beds: Mix 3 lbs. (9 cups) of garden-tone per 50 square feet into the top 4-6 inches of soil with compost, peat moss or Jojo's Organic Plantix Mix.^Individual Plants: Mix 3 tbsp. of Mulch-tone into the soil when planting.
Entries.GrandpasShed.4: "-Keg Assembly Instructions-"^^"PAGE 43 - 03.12-01"^"2x5x10-1/2"^"16-2/3x10-02/4"^"1x3x50-1/2"^"Assemble top by drilling pocket holes as shown and screwing together 1-1/4 pocket hole screws."
Entries.GrandpasShed.8: The chest is filled with the hardwood you collected.
Entries.GrandpasShed.10: It'll be a piece of cake restoring electricity now!
Entries.JojaEmporium.27: The display cabinet is filled with various gems and minerals.
Entries.JojaEmporium.34: Shopper: Are these made of solid gold?
Entries.JojaEmporium.35: Shopper: I bet these would make me a good profit back home on the farm...
Entries.JojaEmporium.36: Shopper: Wait. How many 'speed-gros' did I need to buy again?
Entries.JojaEmporium.37: Shopper: I'm tempted to buy 'lucky lunch'. They bring good fortune!
Entries.JojaEmporium.38: Shopper: To eat soup, or not. Hmm...
Entries.JojaEmporium.39: Shopper: 'Void delight' is too rich for my tastes....
Entries.JojaEmporium.40: Shopper: Will this hatch a dino baby!?
Entries.JojaEmporium.41: Shopper: Maybe she'll like this? Or maybe this? Ugh. Why is this so hard.
Entries.JojaEmporium.42: Shopper: Hmm. These gems could be of use for Camilla's arcane studies...
Entries.JojaEmporium.43: Hamish: Who am I? I guess you could say I'm a huge fan of Joja.
Entries.AxelDialogue: HELLO! I'm the manager of this establishment...#$b#Come find me on the roof another time... I'll make it WORTH your while, kid!
Entries.morrisSpeak: Perhaps a large-scale construction project will be on the table if the Joja warehouse continues to receive materials!$1
Entries.MorrisOffice.1: A blanket and pillow are sitting in the box.
Entries.LanceSpeak: The First Slash could certainly use someone with your talents...$0
Entries.LanceSpeak1: We are the spearhead that'll enforce a safe world, rid of monsters.$0
Entries.LanceSpeak2: I was trained in the magical arts by my master.#$b#You show potential...$1
Entries.LanceBeach1: The ability to walk on water and scale cliffs at such speed...$9#$b#You are certainly full of surprises...$7
Entries.LanceBeach2: Patrolling the islands has its benefits...$9
Entries.LanceBeach3: Patrolling the islands has its benefits...$9
Entries.LanceBeach4: Your abilities are perplexing.$1#$b#I wonder if you're hiding your true power from me...$5
Entries.LanceBeach5: Perfect day for dungeon crawling.$0#$b#Good luck, adventurer.$5
Entries.AdventurerSummit.1: You shouldn't use the boat without permission.
Entries.AdventurerSummit.2: Minerals and gems are packed the barrel.
Entries.AdventurerSummit.3: It's an empty flower pot from Marnie's.
Entries.AdventurerSummit.4: The barrel is stuffed with arrows.
Entries.AdventurerSummit.5: How did you get this location message? That shouldn't be possible!
Entries.AdventurerSummit.6: The crate is stocked with rations.

Entries.1000009/f Haley 1750/w sunny/k 15/u 17 1: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 89 54 0 Haley 97 62 1/pause 300/viewport 97 62 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*... *抽泣*"/shake Haley 800/move farmer 0 7 2/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*..."/shake Haley 800/move farmer 0 2 1/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 300/move Haley 0 -2 0/pause 400/emote Haley 28/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1500/speak Haley "嗨, @...$2"/pause 400/textAboveHead Haley "...*抽泣*"/pause 2250/faceDirection Haley 2/pause 400/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 1200/speak Haley "我刚才有点难过。我来公园是为了冷静。$2#$b#有时候我会很难受，我只想蜷缩成一个球。。。$2"/pause 500/question fork0 "#那真是一种可怕的感觉。。。#有啥好怕的呢?"/fork 1000009_RespectPrivacy/pause 500/friendship Haley -1000/speak Haley "你这么说太刻薄了。$3#$b#我只想一个人。$3"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue "...别告诉别人你看见我哭了。$2#$b#Sometimes I... things happen to me. It's not a big deal. Okay?$2"
Entries.1000009_RespectPrivacy: pause 500/speak Haley "我。。。我不能。。$2#$b#我姐姐永远不会明白。亚历克斯永远不会明白。不过，你可以。$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/pause 400/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*..."/shake Haley 800/pause 2000/move Haley 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Haley "昨天，在博览会上，有人。。。一个陌生人。。。$2"/pause 700/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*"/pause 1000/speak Haley "一个陌生人碰了我。。。$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 300/speak Haley "我离开亚历克斯去买一些格斯的汉堡。马鲁告诉我烧烤酱很好吃，我想尝尝。$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Haley/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 0/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "... *抽泣*"/shake Haley 800/pause 1000/speak Haley "当我走上楼梯时，一位老人向我走来。他。。。他秃顶，身上有酒味。。。$2#$b#他说我穿的。。。可爱的。。。星露谷的女孩们。。。很吸引人。$2"/pause 500/emote Haley 28/pause 350/speak Haley "他真的吓到我了，所以我转身离开，他。。。他。。。$2"/pause 300/speed Haley 4/move Haley 0 -2 0/shake Haley 3000/emote farmer 60 true/pause 350/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*... *抽泣*...."/shake Haley 1000/pause 1500/speak Haley "他抓住我。。。$2#$b#他把手放在我身上，到处摸。$2#$b#我踢了他，对他大喊大叫。我跑去找刘易斯市长，告诉他发生了什么事。$2"/pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*..."/shake Haley 1500/pause 2000/speak Haley "...我们找不到他。他走了。$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#静静地听她#你反应过度了"/fork 1000009_SayNothing/pause 500/shake Haley 4000/pause 500/emote Haley 12/speak Haley "离我远点！！！滚！！永远别出现！$5"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/friendship Haley -1500/end dialogue Haley "我真不敢相信你对我说的话。你是我见过的最麻木不仁的人。$2#$e#我告诉我姐姐我的遭遇。。。还有你对我说的话。现在离开。$2#$e#%Haley不理你。"
Entries.1000009_SayNothing: pause 500/textAboveHead Haley "*抽泣*..."/shake Haley 1000/pause 1500/faceDirection Haley 2/animate Haley false true 999999 22/pause 1000/speak Haley "... 我走回家，洗了个澡来消除那种感觉。$2#$b#我以前从没遇到过这样的事。有时候祖祖城的人会对我说一些。。。但不是。。。不是这个。$2"/pause 500/speak Haley "我不知道发生了什么之后该如何前进。。。我觉得。。。我。$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "(我该说点什么)#你得把发生的事告诉你姐姐。"/fork 1000009_TellSister
Entries.1000009_TellSister: pause 500/speak Haley "...你说得对。我会告诉艾米丽的。我不知道她会不会明白，但她总是听。至少能帮我解决这个问题。。。$2"/pause 1000/speak Haley "我是。。。我要去散散步，拍些照片。那总是让我感觉好些。$2#$b#我想请你帮个忙。$2"/pause 200/question fork1 "今天晚些时候你能来看看我吗？#好#不"/fork 1000009_CheckOn/pause 500/speak Haley "哦。。。我不该对你要求太多。$2"/pause 1500/speak Haley "回头见， @.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Haley "嗨, @. 我把发生的事告诉了艾米莉。她真的很支持我。$2#$b#那是。。。这正是我需要的。我还是。。。感觉怪怪的，但我现在好多了。非常感谢你告诉我这些。$2"
Entries.1000009_CheckOn: pause 500/speak Haley "...谢谢.$2"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Haley/pause 1000/friendship Haley 125/speak Haley "我。。。我要走了。$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail HaleyTalk/pause 700/end dialogue Haley "我把发生的事告诉了艾米莉。她真的很支持我。$2#$b#那是。。。这正是我需要的。我还是。。。感觉怪怪的。谢谢你跟我说了这些。$2#$e#%Haley好多了。她对你微笑。"

Entries.1000012/t 1200 1700/f Penny 1750/k 38/w: spring_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 48 53 1 Penny 61 53 0 Pierre -150 -150 2/pause 300/viewport 61 53 true/skippable/pause 250/textAboveHead Penny "蒂莫西..."/move farmer 7 0 1 true/pause 3000/textAboveHead Penny "我应该做得更多..."/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 800/emote farmer 8/move Penny 0 0 3/emote Penny 16/pause 300/speak Penny "下午好, @.$2"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#你今天看起来有点沮丧。#我只是漫步而过。回见。"/fork 1000012_EverythingAlright/pause 500/speak Penny "再会, @...$2"/pause 300/end
Entries.1000012_EverythingAlright: pause 500/speak Penny "对不起，我有点发呆...$2"/pause 550/playSound doorClose/warp Pierre 44 57/move Pierre 0 1 2/move Pierre 4 0 0 true/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 0/move Pierre 0 -8 3 true/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/pause 1000/emote Penny 28/pause 400/emote farmer 60/move Pierre -2 0 0 true/speak Penny "我路过詹金斯家，突然想起了很久以前的事。$2#$b#那是在你来到山谷之前。$3#$b#在詹金斯一家搬进来之前，这里曾经住过一家人。。。$0#$b#他们有一个儿子叫蒂莫西，我曾经和贾斯、文森特一起辅导过。$3"/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 3/pause 1000/move Penny 0 0 2/pause 350/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1000/speak Penny "你介意我们走到桥那边吗， @?$2"/pause 500/question fork1 "#当然，潘妮。#当然，但最好快点。"/fork 1000012_WalkBridge/pause 500/speak Penny "我尽量不占用你太多时间。$2"/switchEvent 1000012_WalkBridge
Entries.1000012_WalkBridge: pause 500/speak Penny "我们走到桥上去吧。$2"/pause 500/stopAnimation Penny/pause 500/move Penny 7 0 2 true/pause 1200/move farmer 7 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp farmer 73 54 2/warp Penny 74 54 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Penny 2/positionOffset farmer -5 25/stopMusic/pause 600/viewport 73 54 true/pause 1500/animate Penny false true 999999 23/pause 1200/playMusic echos/pause 1700/speak Penny "蒂莫西是个可爱的孩子。他热衷于学习和帮助他人。他、贾斯和文森特都是好朋友。$2#$b#一天，蒂莫西在图书馆上课迟到了。他是。。。异常安静。$2#$b#蒂莫西上课总是那么兴奋，我觉得很奇怪。$2"/pause 1100/emote Penny 28/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Penny "...然后我发现他手臂上有瘀伤。。。我。。。我立刻知道发生了什么事。$2"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 28/pause 300/speak Penny "我不知道该怎么办。。。我一直在教书，直到我。。。。$2#$b#我给了贾斯和文森特一个特殊的问题来解决，我把蒂莫西带到书架后面的一边。$2#$b#我问瘀伤是从哪里来的，说他告诉我的任何事都会瞒着我们。$2#$b#他突然哭了起来。他爸爸叫他不能告诉任何人发生了什么，这是个秘密。$2#$b#如果他告诉别人，他爸爸会发现的，蒂莫西会再次受到伤害。$2"/pause 1000/shake Penny 2000/pause 650/speak Penny "我想直接走到蒂莫西的家里，警告他爸爸。$5#$b#但是。。。我知道那只会引起更多的问题，甚至可能把蒂莫西置于危险之中。$2"/pause 400/emote Penny 28/pause 200/speak Penny "我做完了今天的工作，送孩子们回家。$2#$b#我通常先送蒂莫西下车，因为他家离图书馆最近，但这次我先送文森特和贾斯回家。$2"/pause 1250/speak Penny "贾斯和文森特安全回家后，我告诉蒂莫西我会帮忙，我保证他父亲再也不会伤害他了。我保证过我的生活。$2"/pause 1500/speak Penny "我带蒂莫西去市长家，解释了发生的事。刘易斯市长目瞪口呆。他打电话给祖祖市警察，他们派了一个小组去蒂莫西家。$2#$b#警察带走了他的父亲，把蒂莫西带到了保育所。$2"/pause 2000/stopAnimation Penny/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 650/speak Penny "他们的房子不久就要出售了。我不知道是他的父亲，或者他的母亲要把这房子卖了。$2#$b#无论蒂莫西在哪里。。。我希望他没事。。。$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 600/question fork1 "你认为我做的对吗？#你已经尽力了。#你不该插手他们家的事。"/fork 1000012_BetterNow/pause 500/stopMusic/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 250/emote Penny 12/shake Penny 999999999/pause 700/speak Penny "你是说当一个无辜的孩子被他父亲虐待时你会袖手旁观！？$5#$b#你太让我失望了的！离我远点，@!$5"/emote farmer 28/friendship Penny -1500/end dialogue Penny "难以置信。$5#$e#%Penny不理你。"
Entries.1000012_BetterNow: pause 700/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 500/speak Penny "谢谢你, @.$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 0 0 2/pause 1000/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 800/speak Penny "我很抱歉。我不是故意耽误你这么久的。$2#$b#我已经想了很久了。我很感激你听了我的话。$0"/pause 1000/speak Penny "我希望你过得愉快。$2"/pause 700/move Penny 6 0 1 true/pause 400/friendship Penny 125/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1000/end dialogue Penny "嗨, @.$0#$b#嗯...$2#$b#请不要和其他人说这事，我不想让其他人再次伤害蒂莫西...$2"

Entries.1000022/f Kent 2500/e 1000018/w sunny/z: none/14 16/farmer 8 26 0 Kent 11 14 0/stopMusic/playMusic winter_day_ambient/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 1500/faceDirection Kent 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Kent 2 true/pause 1600/faceDirection Kent 1 true/pause 250/faceDirection Kent 0 true/pause 1800/speak Kent "我没想到会在这里碰到人。$0"/pause 1350/speak Kent "...$0"/pause 2000/emote Kent 40/pause 1000/speak Kent "...$2#$b#要坐一会, 吗?$2"/pause 1000/question fork0 "#默认#对不起，我马上走！"/fork 1000022_AreYouOkay/pause 1000/speak Kent "好的，再见！$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogueWarpOut Kent "有时我去山顶只是想...$2#$b#偶尔一个人呆着。$0"
Entries.1000022_AreYouOkay: pause 1000/faceDirection Kent 1 true/pause 200/faceDirection Kent 2 true/pause 800/speak Kent "一起欣赏这风景吧，@。$2"/pause 650/faceDirection Kent 1 truw/pause 250/faceDirection Kent 0 true/pause 800/viewport move 0 -2 2500 true/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 2500/speak Kent "告诉我。你对哥托罗帝国了解多少？$2"/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 850/speak Kent "$q -1 null#(你因该说点什么)#$r -1 0 kent_event1#我们在和他们再打仗。#$r -1 0 kent_event2#哥托罗帝国是我们的敌人。#$r -1 0 kent_event3#我对他们不太了解。"/pause 850/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 1400/speak Kent "好吧。你不像我一样了解哥托罗帝国。$2"/pause 1000/speak Kent "我所看到的很多。$2"/pause 1200/speak Kent "我经历过的事情。$2"/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Kent "那些死去的人...$2"/pause 1650/speak Kent "这么多善良无辜的人...$2"/pause 1500/emote Kent 12/pause 500/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 700/shake Kent 1500/pause 800/speak Kent "！！！$3"/pause 500/shake Kent 25000/playMusic shaneTheme/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/speak Kent "无数无辜的人！死了！啊！？$3#$b#很多多士兵！很多好人，男人，女人，小孩，老人！！！$3#$b#我们只是棋盘上的棋子！！！对他们来说，我们不算人！！$3"/pause 500/speak Kent "$q -1 null#(我应该说点什么)#$r -1 0 kent_event4#沉默#$r -1 0 kent_event5#让肯特冷静"/shake Kent 25000/speak Kent "我们炸了村庄！！！我们拆散了无数家庭！！！$3#$b#哥托罗的平民被谋杀！！！$3#$b#在那里...有一个像星露谷这样的小镇...我们烧了它！$3"/pause 500/speak Kent "$q -1 null#(我应该怎么做)#$r -1 0 kent_event6#让肯特冷静下来#$r -1 0 kent_event7#沉默"/speak Kent "我为了保命，脑里只有自己，我抛弃了帮我挡下子弹的...$3#$b#我抛弃了我的战友！！！应该死是我而不是他！！$3#$b#威廉！我很抱歉！$3"/shake Kent 20000/pause 1000/speak Kent "折磨...尖叫声...饥饿...离别...$3"/shake Kent 6000/pause 2000/speak Kent "我... 我...！！！！！！$3"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1000/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 500/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 2000/speak Kent "...$2"/pause 1500/question fork1 "#看到你这样我很伤心。#你吓到我了..."/fork 1000022_ScaredAndConfused/stopMusic/pause 1200/speak Kent "...$2"/switchEvent 1000022_ScaredAndConfused
Entries.1000022_ScaredAndConfused:
pause 2000/emote Kent 28/pause 300/move Kent 0 0 2/pause 700/animate Kent false true 999999 16/pause 1100/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Kent "医生说我有严重的创伤后应激障碍...$2"/pause 1300/speak Kent "离开山谷后那个肯特就变了。在这一切发生之前的肯特是一个好丈夫，好父亲...但是他回不来了。$2#$b#我永远不能原谅哥托罗帝国，杀害我的朋友，战友。$2#$b#但是，他们也不是每个人都是坏人。$2#$b#新闻台里面把我们渲染成好人，美化战争。$2"/pause 1500/speak Kent "说实话，我觉得我是刽子手。$2"/pause 2000/speak Kent "我们给帝国带来的屠杀和死亡是前所未有的。所有这些都是现代科技的‘功劳’。$2#$b#与此同时他们轰炸宝石湾也造成了大量的伤亡。"/pause 1200/speak Kent "...我希望这场战争能很快结束。$2"/pause 1000/playMusic spring_day_ambient/pause 1250/stopAnimation Kent/pause 1250/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "我觉得你是个好人。谢谢你听我说完。我感觉好多了。$0#$b#我知道这让你很震惊，我有时...$0#$b#只是需要有人倾听。我看新闻，他们散布谎言，我的家人不明白...
   。$2"/pause 1500/move Kent 0 0 2/pause 1500/move Kent 0 0 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "我需要多花点时间陪我的妻子和孩子。$0"/pause 600/move Kent 0 1 2/move farmer 0 0 2/move Kent 0 3 2/pause 1100/emote Kent 40/pause 200/speak Kent "我说的一切，请保密， @。$0#$b#如果被上面的人知道了，他们很有可能会把我关起来。$2#$b#我相信你。$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 36/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail KentSummit/pause 700/end dialogue Kent "谢谢你听我诉说， @。$2#$b#当我独自一人时，可能处理不了这些问题。我很高兴我有你这样的好朋友。$1"

Entries.1050034/e 1000034/j 30/k 1090501/f Marlo: MarlonsTheme/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 MarlonFay 4 11 2/pause 1000/viewport 6 14 true/skippable/pause 3000/warp farmer 6 19/playSound doorClose/pause 500/textAboveHead MarlonFay "啊。你回来了。"/pause 330/move farmer 0 -5 3/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "@， 我一直想和你谈谈。#$b#我相信你对我们是谁，我们做什么，以及这个公会的历史有一些疑问。#$b#如果你愿意到我的住处来，我将向你解释这一切。"/pause 500/question fork0 "#我想听听公会的历史。#听起来像是一场长谈。还是不用了，谢谢。"/fork 1050034_GuildHistory/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "嗯。我明白了。如果这是你的选择，那就这样吧。$2"/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "你需要新武器吗？来看看我们的存货。"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end position 4 13
Entries.1050034_GuildHistory: pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "跟我来。"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/warp farmer 4 5/warp MarlonFay 6 5/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 250/viewport 7 6 true/pause 1500/speak MarlonFay "嗯...从何说起呢..."/pause 600/emote MarlonFay 40/pause 200/speak MarlonFay "我就从公会的历史说起吧。#$b#在得到毕达哥拉斯骑士团的认可后，我在25年前创立了探险家公会。#$b#你现在所属的这个组织是由遍布世界各地的50多个公会和氏族组成的，遍布每一个大陆。#$b#我们的任务是保护人类免受被古代黑暗魔法侵蚀的怪物伤害。没有人知道这种侵蚀是从何开始的，又是如何开始的。#$b#一些古老的传说讲述了过去怪物和人类和平相处的时代。如果那些时光曾经真实存在过，那么现在它们只存在于故事中。#$b#所以，我们，毕达哥拉斯骑士团，发誓要保护人类不受这些怪物的伤害。在某种程度上，我们是怪物猎手。"/pause 1050/speak MarlonFay "这个公会与拉斯莫迪斯先生合作密切。你可能知道他是“法师”。#$b#每个公会都有一个支持他们的法师或女巫。最重要的是，我们的武器充满了魔力，可以灭杀怪物的生命。#$b#你可能想知道为什么我们用剑而不是常规武器。#$b#要彻底摧毁一个怪物的生命，你必须在挥砍动作中刺穿它的生命力网。#$b#这是确保怪物被击败的唯一方法，否则它将重生。#$b#不幸的是，抛射武器不能奏效。他们可以击晕怪物，但仍然需要一个大力劈砍终结他们。#$b#如果你用过抛射武器，你就会明白我的意思，除非你使用炸药或铱弹。"/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "阿莱西娅是一个有天赋的狙击手，她使用充满魔力的箭。在她搬到沙漠中的城堡村之前，她曾是这个行会的成员。#$b#她用她的箭击晕怪物，然后用随身携带的匕首终结它们。"/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 800/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "你可能已经注意到你是第23位冒险家，但这里只有我们几个人。我们过去有更多的成员。#$b#随着时间的推移，人们离开去加入其他的公会和...而我们..."/pause 500/showFrame MarlonFay 19/pause 650/speak MarlonFay "这些年来，我们失去了很多优秀的战士。我们所做的是危险的，而且是吃力不讨好的工作。#$b#谢谢你加入我们的事业。非常感谢你在保护山谷方面的帮助。我感觉我们又成了一个功能齐全的公会。"/pause 800/speak MarlonFay "$q -1 null#(我应该说什么)#$r -1 0 marlon_event2#我会尽我所能保护人们。#$r -1 0 marlon_event5#这种高危的事总需要有人来做。"/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 0/pause 1000/showFrame MarlonFay 18/pause 500/speak MarlonFay "听到你这么说我很自豪。你有潜力成为一名出色的剑客。"/pause 1250/speak MarlonFay "你可能想知道为什么矿井入口没有被封起来。#$b#不幸的是，乔家拥有矿山的所有权，不允许我们封存它。#$b#这非常奇怪。尽管有大量的矿石，他们也没有以任何方式利用这些矿藏。#$b#因此，我们必须冒险进入矿洞，在怪物大量聚集之前杀死它们。"/pause 600/speak MarlonFay "$q -1 null#(我应该说什么)#$r -1 0 marlon_event4#在矿井深处一定有强大的怪物...#$r -1 0 marlon_event3#我会清除掉它们！"/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "我必须告诉你，并不是所有的怪物都是堕落和充满敌意的。#$b#下水道里住着一个影族生物。他的名字叫“科布罗斯”。法师和我一直在庇护他。#$b#这是一个秘密。你很快就会见到科布罗斯了。在我把你介绍给他之前，我需要看到你证明你的价值。$2"/pause 1200/speak MarlonFay "我想今天的谈话就到此为止吧。我很快会再和你谈其他的事情。#$b#我需要检查一下我们刚从城堡村的新铁匠那里收到的武器。"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue MarlonFay "记住我说的话。科布罗斯的事情一定要保守秘密。如果有人听到关于他的任何风声，将会招致可怕的后果。"

Entries.0002577/y 2/b 1/f MarlonFay 2000: winter_day_ambient/15 20/MarlonFay 20 25 0/skippable/pause 3000/speak MarlonFay "...$2#$b#很抱歉我最近没来。我的伤腿...给我造成了一些麻烦。$2#$b#登山的路对我来说越来越困难了。我不得不服老了。$2"/pause 2200/speak MarlonFay "我和吉尔回忆起当初在一起的那些老成员...$2#$b#乔纳森，鲍里斯，阿莱西娅，巴林，凯特拉，戈塔...$2#$b#我回忆起当初你在我身边的那些时光，不由既内疚又快乐..."/pause 800/shake MarlonFay 1000/pause 1000/speak MarlonFay "我又做噩梦了，伊莎贝尔...$2#$b#...$2#$b#在我失去你的那一刻...$2"/pause 2000/speak MarlonFay "...很快，我就能再见到你了。但在那之前，我还有必须要完成的事。$2#$b#下次再见，亲爱的。$2"/pause 1500/faceDirection MarlonFay 3 true/pause 800/speed MarlonFay 2/move MarlonFay -7 0 3 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/end dialogue MarlonFay "...$2#$e#...$0#$e#嗯？$0#$b#我...我只是回想起了过去。$2#$e#%Marlon转身离你远去。"

Entries.6663410/k 191393/f MorrisTod 50/w sunny/: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 30 58 1 Morris -200 -200 2 Penny 32 55 1 Andy 37 67 3 Alex 53 69 0 Jodi 25 63 1 Olivia 27 63 3/showFrame Penny 18/animate Andy true true 100 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 32 33 34 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 34 33 32/viewport 35 57 true/viewport move 1 0 5200 true/skippable/move farmer 10 0 1/playSound doorClose/warp Morris 43 57/pause 400/speak Morris "哈哈哈！又一个客户投入乔家的怀抱！$5"/pause 200/move Morris 0 1 2/pause 300/emote Morris 40/pause 150/faceDirection Morris 3/pause 150/emote Morris 16 true/pause 200/speak Morris "*呃哼*...$4#$b#乔家商超！$1#$b#低于皮埃尔处售价的种子！$5#$b#现在还有特别限时优惠和奖励！$1"/pause 400/move Morris 6 0 1 true/pause 200/textAboveHead Morris "哈哈哈！"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/halt/end dialogue Pierre "*叹息*...莫里斯不断地圈走我的顾客。$2#$e#我该何去何从？...$2"

Entries.1000510/w sunny/f Marnie 1000/z spring/z: summer_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 69 25 3 Marnie 54 21 0 Wizard 4 23 3 Andy 64 70 0 Shane 89 24 0 Leah 112 39 0 Lewis 86 54 3/pause 1000/skippable/viewport 65 29 true/viewport move -1 -1 7300 true/move farmer -7 0 3/move farmer 0 -4 3/move farmer -5 0 3/pause 1200/move Marnie 0 0 1/pause 400/emote Marnie 16/pause 150/speak Marnie "噢，@！你好！$1#$b#我在检查我的瓜，有些快熟了！$0"/pause 800/move Marnie 0 0 2/pause 1300/move Marnie 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Marnie "几年前，在你搬到星露谷之前，我在这开垦了一块小小的农田。$0#$b#我一直想要一个自己的小花园。它确实是我想要的！$1#$b#皮埃尔的肥料对提高农作物品质有奇效。$1"/pause 600/move Marnie 1 0 1/pause 600/speak Marnie "你夏天过得如何，@？你的庄稼长得好吗？"/pause 500/question fork0 "#这一季度我守护颇丰。#我的农场收成不大好..."/fork 1000510_GreatSeason/pause 1000/emote Marnie 60/speak Marnie "很抱歉这个夏天你过得不大顺利，@。$2#$b#希望下个季度你的情况能出现好转。$2"/pause 500/switchEvent 1000510_MarnieMelon
Entries.1000510_GreatSeason: pause 500/speak Marnie "听到这个我很高兴！今年夏天到目前为止都还算顺利。$0#$b#我的庄稼还未干枯过。$1"/pause 500/switchEvent 1000510_MarnieMelon
Entries.1000510_MarnieMelon: pause 200/speak Marnie "谢恩最近在照顾牲畜上花费了更多的时间，这样我才得以腾出时间来照料庄稼。$0#$b#我很感谢他的帮助。$1"/pause 500/move Marnie 0 0 0/pause 800/move Marnie 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Marnie "我快结束了，@。我喜欢和你闲聊！$1"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1200/friendship Marnie 50/end dialogue Marnie "嗨，@。我很感激早些时候在花园里你和我攀谈。$1"

Entries.Andy_Text: 我想在我的房子下面建一个地窖，用来保存罐子。有人愿意帮我吗？
Entries.Andy_Objective_1_Text: 在安迪房间的储物箱里放入木头。
Entries.Andy_Objective_2_Text: 在安迪房间的储物箱里放入硬木。
Entries.Andy_Objective_3_Text: 在安迪房间的储物箱里放入石头。
Entries.Andy_Objective_4_Text: 在安迪房间的储物箱里放入铁锭。

Entries.5407915/e 5404269/n AndyCellar: kindadumbautumn/-500 -500/farmer 13 17 1 Andy 18 15 0/pause 1000/viewport 12 16 true/move farmer 3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 750/faceDirection Andy 3 true/pause 300/speak Andy "啊，@。我正想找你呢！$0#$b#我终于有了自己的地窖，太谢谢你了。你为什么不来看看我的新地窖呢？$1"/pause 350/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playSound stairsdown/changeLocation Custom_AndyCellar/playSound stairsdown/pause 500/warp farmer 8 5/warp Andy 6 5/faceDirection farmer 2 true/faceDirection Andy 2 true/viewport 7 7 true/pause 1800/emote farmer 16 true/pause 1250/speak Andy "我想我现在能靠这里保存的罐子赚更多的钱了。$0#$b#我在这件事上花了所有的钱，希望一切都是值得的。$0"/pause 750/faceDirection Andy 1 true/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 500/speak Andy "作为对你的感谢，我要把我的特制草莓酱的配方给你！$0#$b#答应我你要保存好这个配方并且将它物尽其用。$1"/pause 500/move Andy 1 0 1/pause 400/shake Andy 500/showFrame Andy 37/pause 250/playSound newRecipe/showFrame Andy 38/pause 500/showFrame Andy 37 true/pause 200/move Andy 0 0 1/pause 300/playSound reward/message "我收到了安迪的草莓酱配方！现在，草莓比以前值钱了百分之二十五！"/pause 250/emote farmer 32 true/pause 500/friendship Andy 250/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/end dialogue Andy "简直不敢相信我现在有一个地窖了！$1#$e#你很快就会开始做草莓酱的吧，农夫？$0#$b#用我的食谱，人们会乐意付更多的钱给你！$1"

Entries.Olivia_Text: 我希望在镇广场为尊贵的客人和朋友举办招待会。当地有没有农民可以提供一些高档的杂货？    -奥利维亚
Entries.Olivia_Objective_1_Text: 在奥利维亚家地窖的储藏柜里放入杨桃果酒。
Entries.Olivia_Objective_2_Text: 在奥利维亚家地窖的储藏柜里放入奶酪。
Entries.Olivia_Objective_3_Text: 在奥利维亚家地窖的储藏柜里放入山羊奶酪。

Entries.Susan_Text: 我现在想买一些新做的高级肥料。我的小宝贝们需要更多营养！    -苏珊
Entries.Susan_Objective_1_Text: 把高级肥料放入苏珊的储物箱里。

Entries.Sophia_Text: 从我还是个小女孩时，我就希望能拥有一个玫瑰仙子花园。有人能帮帮我吗？
Entries.Sophia_Objective_1_Text: 在索菲亚的储物箱内放入玫瑰仙子种子。

Entries.5407918/e 5515272/n SophiaFairyGarden/w: none/-500 -500/Sophia 16 24 0 Scarlett 15 24 0 Pierre 24 55 2 Caroline 25 55 2/pause 500/playMusic playful/pause 500/viewport 16 25 clamp true/pause 1750/jump Sophia/pause 1000/jump Sophia/pause 300/faceDirection Scarlett 1 true/pause 1200/faceDirection Sophia 3 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "所以，斯佳丽！你觉得我的“仙子花园”怎么样？$9"/pause 500/speak Scarlett "这些花好好闻啊，它们都好漂亮！$0#$b#我觉得这个地方太适合拍角色扮演的照片了！$1"/pause 400/speak Sophia "你说得对！$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 500/end dialogue Sophia "嘿！真是超级无敌感谢你帮助我建好了我的花园。我会报答你的！$1"

Entries.5407919/e 5515272: continue/-500 -500/Sophia -20 -20 0 farmer -20 -20 0/pause 1100/speak Sophia "嘿，你。额，我只是想说我真的很感谢你帮助我建好了我的仙子花园。我超爱它！$1#$b#为了回报你，我联系了一位新的洒水器的供应商。你现在可以从我这里买新设备了。$9"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playSound reward/message "我现在可以在索菲亚的角色扮演房间里从她的置物单上买到铱洒水器和加压喷头了！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "铱洒水器和加压喷头真的很贵...但我会按成本价卖给你。$0#$e#我知道它们对你在农场里的工作会有帮助的，呆瓜。$1"

Entries.5407918/e 5515272/n SophiaFairyGarden/w: none/-500 -500/Sophia -10 -10 0 farmer -10 -10 0/pause 2000/speak Sophia "早上好，呆瓜！$9#$b#我的仙子花园今天应该建好啦！如果你想看葡萄园的话，今天下午找个时间去看看吧。$1"/pause 500/end dialogue Sophia "仙子花园！耶！$9#$e#%索菲亚难以抑制住兴奋。"

Entries.5407919/e 5515272/e 5407918/z winter/t 1: none/-500 -500/Sophia 15 24 0 farmer 16 24 0 Pierre 24 55 2 Caroline 25 55 2/pause 500/playMusic kindadumbautumn/pause 500/positionOffset Sophia 7 -7/viewport 16 25 clamp true/pause 1750/jump Sophia/pause 800/jump Sophia/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 900/faceDirection Sophia 1 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "我好爱它！谢谢你，谢谢你，真是超谢谢你！！！$9#$b#你过来！$4"/pause 600/showFrame farmer 101 true/showFrame Sophia 28 true/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite heart 16 23/pause 2000/move farmer 0 0 3/showFrame Sophia 4 true/pause 500/speak Sophia "当我还是个小女孩时，我第一次看“粉红公主十字军”，我就梦想着拥有一座仙子花园。$4#$b#你让我的梦想成真了，真的成真了！$9"/pause 600/showFrame farmer 97 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 400/speak Sophia "额，我本来想保守这个秘密，但我现在要告诉你。$1#$b#你可以从我的置物单上买到新设备！$9#$b#他们真的很贵，我不想通过卖它们来赚钱...$2#$b#但我知道你会好好用它们的！$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/speak Sophia "让我们在这个花园里多享受一会，呆瓜...$4"/pause 800/faceDirection Sophia 0 true/pause 750/faceDirection farmer 0 true/pause 500/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 750/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sophia 1 0/pause 50/pause 600/emote Sophia 20/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/pause 1000/playSound reward/message "我现在可以从索菲亚的置物单上买到铱洒水器和加压喷头！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "我要把Scarlett邀请来。我知道她一定会爱上这个花园！$1#$e#这里会成为绝妙的角色扮演的拍照地点！$4#$e#*拥抱* 我好爱你！$9"

Entries.Clint2_Text: 我需要这些材料来制造一种威力足以摧毁阻塞山顶的巨石的炸药。
Entries.Clint2_Objective_1_Text: 把铱矿石放在克林特的箱子里。
Entries.Clint2_Objective_2_Text: 把煤放在克林特的箱子里。

Entries.2554903/H/e 2554902: none/-500 -500/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 7 18 2 Maru 27 9 1 Sebastian 29 9 3 Demetrius 19 18 0/playMusic jaunty/viewport 7 21 true/skippable/speed farmer 1/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 300/jump Robin/pause 900/faceDirection Robin 3 true/pause 250/faceDirection Robin 0 true/pause 300/speed Robin 4/move Robin 0 -1 3/speed Robin 4/move Robin -2 0 2/speed Robin 4/move Robin 0 3 1/speed Robin 4/move Robin 1 0 2/pause 400/speak Robin "嘿！我知道我需要什么材料！所以让我们开始谈正事吧。$1#$b#我估计要150块硬木，600块石头，50铁块，20个电池组。。。$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Robin "小屋有很多腐烂的木头和铁锈，这些都需要翻新。$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 200/speak Robin "这个规定没有急迫， @. 你可以自己收集材料！$1#$b#我在屋子里放了一个箱子，你可以把材料放进去。$0"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Robin "我要用这个项目来证明我的手艺！$1#$e#我正在为这个小屋制作一样特殊的东西。所以我需要的不仅仅是硬木和石头。$0"

Entries.2554906/n ShedRepaired: continue/-500 -500/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 7 18 2/skippable/pause 1000/speak Robin "我检查了你收集的所有材料，干得好！$1#$b#你做了你该做的，现在我来做我该做的。我工作很快，所以棚子明天应该翻新！$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 300/end dialogue Robin "%Robin现在很忙。"

Entries.2554907: none/-500 -500/farmer -200 -200 0 Robin 13 13 0/skippable/viewport 16 9 true/playMusic jaunty/pause 2500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 16 16/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 0 true/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 600/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speak Robin "嘿 @!$1"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 700/speak Robin "所以。。。你觉得怎么样？$0#$b#你可以在屋顶上看到了新的窗玻璃。#$b#现在那里可以种植作物了。"/pause 500/jump farmer/pause 1000/speak Robin "如果没有你收集的所有材料，我不可能把它修好。$1#$b#我其实也很开心，学到了一些新东西。$0"/pause 1000/faceDirection Robin 0/pause 750/speak Robin "有一些剩下的硬木，所以我做了一些木桶！$1#$b#这层楼很适合酿酒。。。$0"/pause 750/faceDirection Robin 1 true/pause 700/speak Robin "好吧，好好享受翻新的小屋吧，@!$1"/pause 500/end dialogue Robin "哦，我差点忘了！楼上已经有一些植物了，苏珊送的礼物。她想你一定会喜欢的！$1#$e#嗯，我想知道她是否想要自己的温室？$0"

Entries.Apples_Text: 精灵泉水正在寻找洋桃。
Entries.Apples_Objective_1_Text: 在极光葡萄园的Junimo牌匾上留下洋桃。
